story:
The Introduction

Most water bottles are rather uninspired. They’re throwaway marketing materials from companies, or cheap containers that get moldy too quickly. And the ones that are great are either terribly expensive or filled with too many unnecessary features to count.

That’s why we are starting Calabash: A beautifully designed, minimalist water bottle with a cause.

The Calabash Bottle

First, it’s light and portable, perfect for fitting in the side of a backpack or the cup holder of your car. Its matte outer coating makes it easy to grip and handle. An eco-friendly stainless steel interior ensures that your water will taste exactly as it should, whether it’s hot or cold. But if you don’t want it to taste like water, then an included removable infused filter will let you add flavoring or brew your coffee or tea in it. And wouldn’t you want your ice chilled smoothie or your hot coffee to stay the same temperature throughout a long day? Calabash uses double walled vacuum insulation technology to retain the temperature of whatever you place in the bottles for over 48 hours. 

However, the part that we’re most excited about Calabash is our cause.

The Inspiration

Years ago, as a child in Africa, I went everywhere with my grandmother. We went to our vibrant local market, to the butcher who always had jokes and smiles for us, to the fried plantain seller who gave me an extra plantain because I could speak the local dialect. 

One day, on one of our many trips, we passed by a group of school kids who were drinking what looked like coffee from a small calabash which they passed around. For those of you who may not be familiar with what a calabash is, it is a wooden gourd used to carry water in most parts of sub-Saharan Africa. It’s a part of our rich culture.

My grandmother always chastised me whenever I even looked at anything with caffeine, like coffee. Seeing that these kids were my age, I asked her why they were allowed to drink coffee and why I wasn’t allowed to. She dragged me along and replied, “It’s not coffee, it’s dirty water”. 

It was on this very day that the idea for Calabash was born.

When you look at the images of Africa that you see on Western news, you’re looking at images of where I grew up as a child. Some of those images aren’t very flattering. 

But I also lived through seeing the beautiful African prints displayed in my local market every day, the butcher who woke up at 5 am every morning to open his shop, the plantain seller who also engineered local transformers, the school children who walked miles just to educate themselves each day. Too often as African youth our patriotism blinds us from seeing the negative conditions in our countries. Too often the Western media loves to only show the negative aspects of my home. We need to admit that these unfortunate situations exist and address them, but we cannot only rely on the Western media to show the positive aspects of our continent.

We need to do that ourselves too. 

Fourteen years ago, when I saw those kids share that calabash, I decided to do everything that I could to support the continent that raised me. 

I dreamt of the idea of Calabash, as I went through middle school in Accra. 

I dreamt of it as I took the entrance exam that gained me admission to a high school in the United States.

I dreamt of it as I read my acceptance letter from Emory University. 

Now, my team and I continue to dream this idea as our team embarks on this campaign. Together, we dream that we can provide clean drinking water and sanitation training to many African villages. With Calabash, we’re starting this mission with Mayuge, Uganda. 

We’re dedicated to improving the lives of rural communities that don’t have access to something as basic as readily available, clean water. To achieve that, we’re partnering with Lifewater, a clean water organization working to end the global water and sanitation crisis through its construction of wells and other-related infrastructure projects.

As part of our Kickstarter, we’re donating $7,000 of the proceeds to go towards building a well in Maguye with Lifewater. 

So, I ask you all today to please help us finally make that dream come true and always remember this: Africa is not a single story! 

The Specs

  • 500 ml holding capacity
  • Length: 23 cm
  • Diameter: 6.5 cm
  • Stainless steel container
  • Matte outer coating
  • Vacuum insulated technology

Stainless steel container
Matte outer coating
Vacuum insulated technology

story:
The ProseccoEarth e-commerce project

The ProseccoEarth project has been developed in the Veneto region between the Prealps and the sea. It is right here that thanks to their particular characteristics of this land one of the most famous sparkling wines is made i.e. Prosecco wine. Prosecco represents happy times, cheerfulness and laughter. However in order to really enjoy it we need to be sure that every single glass we raise has been made in total respect of the environment according to the organic approach whose aim is to preserve nature. That’s why we have chosen to promote the territory of Valdobbiadene, Conegliano and Asolo hills through the sale of its high quality wine the Organic and Vegan Prosecco D.O.C.G.
Join us and together we can sustain this land and preserve it for the future generations.

What we need for the land...

Our initial goal is to be able to collect 10,000 GBP in order to support the project and the sales platform in the UK willing to expand thereafter at an international level by showing the value of the green philosophy and of the Organic and Vegan Prosecco D.O.C.G. in the world. We wish to tell the story of our lands through the Organic wine, certain that you will be drawn to visit the Veneto region to discover the beauty of this land.

... and what it can give to you

All our perks are linked to our land and aim to reward whoever sustains the organic approach with either Organic and Vegan Prosecco D.O.C.G. , subscriptions for free delivery or even trips so you can see for yourself these spectacular lands and to understand better why it is important for us to preserve them!

 

Be part of the story

You can add pieces to build up our story by posting a comment on social networks such as Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, find out what goes on behind the scenes and discover fascinating areas of sun blessed hills and learn more about topics linked to the cultivation of the grapes and the eco-friendly production.

 

Prosecco with a different approach

You can click on https://wwww.proseccoearth.co.uk and find out about our project, get a taste of our wonderful lands and get into detail on the theme of certifications as well as finding what makes Prosecco D.O.C.G so special and why Organic and Vegan Prosecco stands out from the rest.

Spread the word

How can you help? If you can’t afford to make a donation but nevertheless believe in our project there are many different ways to show your support! You can share the ProseccoEarth project in Facebook, invite your friends to follow our page, simply add a comment with your thoughts. Your support means a lot to us!

   

 

Certified Product Guarantee

story:
Bubbles Made from Plastic?!  Vs. Real Ingredients

With growing popularity of bubble tea, concerns of whether it is healthy arise.  There are kids who love to drink bubble tea, but some of them are getting bubbles made from plastic or tea made from chemicals only because some business owners want to lower their costs. 

We want to start an initiative of introducing the authentic bubble tea made from scratch with real ingredients to share it with people all over the world.   Arezo Tea proposes to make the tapioca with real cassava and sweet potato starch instead of the store bought variety, and assembles the bubble with real milk and high quality Arezo Tea.  We are currently trying to experiment with different recipes and ratios in order to make delicious Arezo bubble tea that showcases those high quality ingredients.  And we want your help to share the bubble tea to the communities, and our first stage is to bring it to the kids who are just beginning to distinguish between natural and artificial flavors.

Base Tea

The original bubble tea from Taiwan uses black tea to be the base, but in recent years, different kinds of tea is used to create different flavors.  Arezo Tea collection currently has a total of 8 varieties of tea.

English Breakfast Tea

A select blend of finest quality Ceylon teas is perfect for anytime of the day.  This robust and full-bodied tea is excellent to drink by itself or enjoy it with milk, honey, or sugar. 

Earl Grey Tea

The oil extracted from the rind of the bergamot is infused to our quality tea from Sri Lanka, which creates an amazing aromatic flavor that is elegant and distinctive.

Uda Black Tea

A high-grown tea from the Uda Pussellawa region of Sri Lanka, this black tea is exquisite with blessing from the mountains.  The cold condition yields a gentle taste with rosy undertone. 

Green Tea

A smooth and fresh green tea from Sri Lanka with a light nutty taste is also intense and rich in flavor.  It is a perfect finish of any meal.  

Rose Black

The full-bodied Ceylon black tea infused with the fragrant rose petal forms this romantic and elegant blend of Rose Tea, a perfect choice for a calm and relaxing tea time.

Apple Black Tea

An aromatic mix of rich Ceylon black tea and apple has a slight tangy flavor.  Our blend of Apple Black Tea is truly a refreshing delight. 

Raspberry Black Tea

Tangy raspberry is blended with selected rich black tea from Sri Lanka creating a mystic depth to its flavor.  This luscious and refined tea is perfect for special occasions.

Chamomile Tea

This caffeine free herb infusion is a serene and soothing drink with a soft aroma.  The gentle and calming chamomile is perfect for any time of the day.

 

 

Origin of Arezo Tea

The founder of Arezo Tea, with ancestors involving in the tea industry in the 1800's, started drinking tea at the age of three. Coming from generations of tea lovers, tea drinking has become part of the family's lifestyle and only the teas with the finest quality are accepted.

story:
My name is Tom, and I love crafting the perfect drink. I started bartending the day after I turned 21, and there’s something deeply rewarding about bringing flavors together in a way that’s perfectly, uniquely yours.

Like a lot of you, I began experimenting with barrel aging - both at home and as part of a bar program. I quickly discovered that barrel-aging, as we do it today, just didn’t make sense. Mini barrels for home and bar use are expensive, leaky, and hard to use. I wanted to find a better way. 

As a lifelong woodworker, I started experimenting with different woods and different sized containers. I even made a 750ml bottle out of white oak, lightly charred inside. They were beautiful, but they leaked through the knots in the wood. 

I went to visit some Amish craftsmen who I’ve worked with on other projects. Daniel, one of the family’s sons who I had come to know and respect, began working with me to solve this… and we did.

 

 

What we created is a thin slice of Missouri white oak (or cherry, sugar maple, or hickory) that’s charred on both sides, then steamed and curled to fit in a jar. When placed in a jar with your drink of choice, the wood rehydrates and the coil expands to fill the jar. This solution has many advantages over traditional barrels:

  • No leaks, no headaches - Barrels need to be hydrated and conditioned before use, and often still leak. With the glass jar, you only get a small amount of evaporation.
  • Experiment with different woods - With barrels, you get oak. That’s it. Don’t let our name fool you - try Fifth In Oak kit using sugar maple, cherry wood, or hickory to add another layer of flavor to your creation.
  • See the progress - The glass jar allows you to see your beverage changing color inside, so it’s easier to track the progress and see how much is left inside.
  • Way more versatile - The glass jar is easier to fill and empty, and it’s wide enough to add things like fruit so you can infuse your spirit as it ages.
  • Fits in a fridge - Want to experiment with perishable ingredients? Stick your jar in the fridge while it’s aging.
  • Multiple uses - the wood coils are good for about 3 uses. Make the same thing 3 times or mix things up - the flavor of your first batch will add depth to your next creation.

 

 

This is Fifth in Oak… barrel aging with all the taste and none of the time, cost, or waste.

We’re especially excited about all the unique ways we’re already seeing people use (and re-use) Fifth in Oak! Here are just a few ideas that inspired us…

  • Manhattans barrel-aged in cherry wood jars
  • Cigars stored in jars that had been used for aging whiskey
  • Margaritas aged in hickory with fresh sliced jalapenos
  • Aging whiskey in a maple wood jar with sliced apples and cinnamon for holiday cider cocktails. (What would you do with that jar afterward?)


Through social media and our website, we’ll be cultivating the best barrel-aging experiments from our incredible, creative community!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here’s the good news: we have thoroughly tested the coils (we’ve made dozens of our own aged spirits, as well as had several extremely talented and picky mixologists use them in their bar programs). Plus, we've already had a successful production run. So why do we need your help? 

Because disrupting the traditional barrel aging process takes more than one successful production run, your contribution will help us get ahead on production, get a handle on volume packaging, get the 3 liter jars and coils into production, and finalize all of our marketing activities. Here's what you get:

1-liter Barrel-aging Kit

$35 $30

Our 1-liter Barrel-aging Kit includes a coil of your choice (oak, cherry, sugar maple, and hickory) and a 1 liter jar. This set up will let you experiment with the barrel aging process in your home. You could oak-age some whiskey or tequila. You can mix and match and add some complexity to the process, like taking the oak-aged whiskey coil you just made and aging some cold brew coffee in it. There's really no limit to what you can do. Each coil will last for three agings...so go wild.

3-liter Barrel-aging Kit

$45 $40

Our 3-liter Barrel-aging Kit just amplifies your experimentation and favorites. Barrel age some wine before a party, make a larger batch of your favorite sugar maple-aged bourbon. And, if you're running a bar program, the 3 liter kit has you covered.

Twice the Creativity

(1L) $70 $60
(3L) $90 $80 

What if you want more options or more variety? We've got you covered there as well. You can get our Twice the Creativity perk, in both 1 & 3 liters, that send you two jars and two coils of your choice so you can try different batches at a time.

Creative Journey

(1L) $150 $125
(3L) $180 $150

And if you really want to go on a Creative Journey, you can get a year long subscription that will send you new coils every 2 months for a year.

Mixologist

$1000 $500

If you want even more, we have two of the most unique aged spirits and cocktail perks you will ever see. Our Mixologist perk will let you work with a talented mixologist to create your very own aged  spirit. Then, the two of you will work together to come up with a unique cocktail using your spirit, name it, and see it featured on the cocktail menu of the mixologist's establishment. 

Mix Master

$2500 $1500

But wait...if even that's not enough...if you love the minutiae, we'll make you a Mix Master. You will get the full Mixologist experience and add to it with a trip to Kansas City, a visit with the Amish craftsmen, and tours of your choice of local distilleries, breweries, and roasters. Perks don't get much more intimate than this.

 

The Impact

This project is very personal to me. While I have started (and continue to run) several other businesses, I am a cocktail nerd at my core. With Fifth in Oak, I feel I’ve been able to make something for every other cocktail nerd like me. This brings me real joy.  

Risks & Challenges

  • As we have already manufactured and prepared the perks for shipping, we are ready to ship the 1 liter jars and coils today! The 3 liter jars and coils will ship 60 days after the campaign ends.
  • We are unable to ship outside of the United States. 
  • Please note that your travel and accommodation are your own responsibility (unless specifically part of the perk).
  • You must provide sufficient notice for any visits relating to perks. Sufficient notice being no less than 30 days. These may be subject to availability and must be agreed with the provider.
  • The provider reserves the right to revoke perks.
  • In the event of unforeseen circumstances, the provider is under no obligation to continue perk fulfillment.
  • Perks must be claimed within 180 days from the date of purchase.

story:
Level Up With Our Nootropic-Based Energy Drink and Protein Bars!

Esports Nutrition is a gaming nutrition and wellness company that provides nutritional products, dietary services, as well as physical training and recovery plans for professional esports athletes and casual gamers.

We set out to enhance the overall health and performance of the gamer and, in so doing, create a sustainable gaming experience. This is our creed, our virtue by which we hold ourselves accountable and our promise to always bring you the best products and wellness tips that'll keep you smurfing on the noobs!

 

HAX Formula

Our brain-boosting formula was developed using the finest blend of nootropics. Nootropics are compounds, supplements, and/or foods that enhance the cognitive abilities of humans. Many types of nootropics occur in nature, and while others are manmade.

 

 

The OP Energy Drink

This gummy bear-flavored drink is designed to keep you charged for hours of scrimming and loot hunts. With less than 10% of sugar found in regular energy drinks, our beverage will prevent sugar spikes and replace that energy crash with a balanced and lasting release of performance.

The OP drink contains an impressive stack of our HAX formula that is safe for everyday consumption and contains no banned substances:

L-Theanine - This great nootropic stacked with OP's dose of caffeine is the perfect duo lane

L-tyrosine - This has been used in alternative medicine as a possibly effective aid in improving mental performance, alertness, or memory.

Rhodiola Rosea - This has been reported to significantly reduce the fatigue and burnout that come from stress and anxiety

Ginseng - This is said to strengthen the immune system, enhance brain function, and fight fatigue

 

The REKT Protein Bar

Our REKT Protein Bar is formulated to rek your snack craving and so much more. It comes in two delicious flavors, Dulce de Leche and Chocolate Praline. This dessert-snack is so tasty you wouldn’t think it’s packed with nutrients!

Like our energy drink, the REKT bar is also filled with a great duo of our HAX formula:

Alpha GPC - Shown to improve mental and physical performance by enhancing learning, memory, and endurance

Noopept - Enhances cognition, provides significant neuroprotection and has anti-anxiety properties. 

 

Let's find out more about this HAX Formula that our mad scientists have cooked up...

 Our game carrying HAX Formula was developed using the finest blend of nootropics. Nootropics are compounds, supplements and/or foods that enhance the cognitive abilities of humans. Many types of nootropics occur in nature and some are enhanced and created in world-class labs. Some are even found inside your body and are actually there as you are reading this. 

 

Why You Need It

Our team understands your need to play longer, refine your skills, and reduce pain and stiffness, which is why all our products are specially made for you. Additionally, we designed nutritional and fitness programs and created our unique range of OP supplements to turn you into a human, gaming JUGGERNAUT!

Time to GET FED and HF!!!

story:
We study and create ready-to-use ice cream basis with a new and revolutionary concept.

After two years of research and development, we have created a line of ready-to-use ice cream basis for ice cream , both dairy and vegan, that allows to easily create an excellent artisanal Italian ice cream – all you have to do is adding the liquid part to the powder basis, mix everything together and put everything in a traditional batch freezer.  

We have produced 9 basis and with them you can realise more than 40 flavours.

We have exhibited our products at the last Sigep in Rimini, which is the most important exhibition for ice cream in the world. We are overwhelmed by the positive feedback we received as people described our ready-to-use basis as extremely innovative and of excellent quality.

    Given the peculiarities of our product, we have decided to open a chain of Italian ice cream shop in Europe. 

    The healthiness aspects and the fact that everything is natural should be the main motif of the shop to offer something that keeps in consideration the wellness of consumers. Every product offered in the shop (food and beverage) will be selected to respect the criterias and uniqueness of the shop.

    We are sure that an ice cream shop created with this criteria will be very appreciated from the customer.

Given the peculiarities of our product, we have decided to open a chain of Italian ice cream shop in Europe.

We are sure that an ice cream shop created with this criteria will be very appreciated from the customer.

story:
Our Beer

Our behind-the-scenes brewing process combined with our secret family recipe’s, handed down from generation to generation, has led us to develop 10 uniquely distinguishable aromas & flavors for beer that when kept cool can be enjoyed at the end of a long grueling day. Our recipes are simple, yet different enough to separate themselves from any other beer on the market.  You have never tasted anything like a Bandy Family Brew!

Despite our 10 diverse offerings, we are aiming to launch with the first 5 (our most requested recipes by family and friends).  These 5 will include:

1. The Bandy Family Brown

Tasty Brown Ale

Can be considered a bigger, maltier, hoppier interpretation of Northern English brown ale or a hoppier, less malty Brown Porter, often including the citrus-accented hop presence that is characteristic of American hop varieties.

6.8% ABV - 29 SRM

 

 

2. Sinistercity IPA

Premium IPA

A decidedly hoppy and bitter, moderately strong American pale ale. An American version brewed using American ingredients and attitude. Very clean and smooth, after tasting this you taste buds are going to be bitter at you. Using six different hops makes this beer a one of a kind.

7.1% ABV - 9.6 SRM

 

3. One Night Amber Ale

Premium Amber Ale

Like an American pale ale with more body, more caramel richness, and a balance more towards malt than hops. One of my favorites to make and drink. Love how everything comes together to make a great beer.

5.5% ABV - 15 SRM


 

 

4. Seal the Deal Pumpkin Ale

Pumpkin Spice Ale

A harmonious marriage of ingredients, this beer will fill like October every time you drink it. Judge the beer based on the pleasantness and harmony of the resulting combination. The overall uniqueness of the process, ingredients used, and creativity. Overall harmony and drinkability are the keys to presenting a well-made specialty beer.

6.0% ABV - 18.5 SRM

 

5. Betty Stout Box

Vanilla Stout

A hoppy, bitter, strongly roasted American style Stout. Roasted malt profile, malt sweetness and flavor, and the amount of finishing hops used. Burnt or charcoal aromas are low to none. Medium to very low hop aroma. With a touch of Vanilla added to get a very smooth taste.

6.0% ABV - 35 SRM

 

 

Our Process

Brewing process is our best kept secret so we can’t share much, but we can tell you that we take it very seriously in order to achieve the highest possible quality and taste. Our brewer has spent years working with his family’s recipes to make lively flavors the finest grain, water, hops, and yeast to create a strong backbone to hold everything together.

Our Brewer

Todd Miller learned to make beer at an early age and loves the process and the product. It’s his dream to make it available for anyone and everyone and is confident you will enjoy the beer every bit as much as he does.

As a highly skilled and immensely passionate Beer Brewer, Todd has been extensively working in the beer brewing industry for a span of more than 10 years. He owns his own distinctive brewing business which he formulated with a single objective in mind which was to provide one of the best-brewed beers to the locals of Southern Nevada. Todd hails from the city of Henderson, Nevada and always had an immense passion for brewing beer. With the passage of time and as his brewing skills and abilities enhanced he decided to take his passion for brewing to the whole new level. Deciding to pursue his passion as a profession, Todd indulged himself into the field of professional beer brewing.

Todd’s primary objective is to build a highly successful business through the aid of his beer brewing skills and experience. Todd believes providing for and giving back to his community is one of his greatest moral obligations. Todd wants to serve the community through the assistance of his product and the sales of his product. Todd is always on the lookout for opportunities to enhance his current skills and attributes and is seeking chances to learn new skills on the go. Todd’s aim is to help his local customers explore different sort of beer and he loves experimenting with his brewing skills to craft an impeccable creation of his own. Join us and be part of the family!

Why Southern Nevada?

If you haven’t guessed already, we love our city and surrounding areas.  We want to bring something different to the Las Vegas area than what is currently available in the micro brew market. With pride in our family’s decades-old rich brewing tradition, we believe we can accomplish this through our high-quality products that we’ve made for everyone to come together and enjoy. Just ask one of our favorite supporters, and friend, Kalani Kokonuts!

Todd, a native of Southern Nevada, has a strong desire to give back to his community.  With the success of this business, he hopes to be able to support local charitable programs that provide services to those in need throughout Las Vegas, Henderson and the surrounding areas.

This is part of the core belief system of the Bandy Family Brewery which is to:

"Drink Local. Support Local."

How We’ll Use The Funds

As part of our long-term plans to grow this brand and bring our unique product to market, we are going to need to make a substantial investment in a commercial facility and equipment.  We will be looking for a 2000 – 5000 s.f. facility to house the brewing equipment and stock of products.  This equipment would include brewing vessels, canning equipment and the associated cleaning equipment.  We will begin to sell and ship our product to local establishments and allow the publish to purchase kegs for pickup.  Within 24-36 months, we envision building out a tap room in our commercial facility to allow patrons the opportunity to enjoy our product with their close friends and family just as we have.

We are fortunate enough to have already secured the financial backing to help obtain the facility which for means closing the funding gap with this campaign to help raising the capital needed to purchase the equipment which we have outlined below.

  • 3 BBL Electric 2-Vessel Brewhouse base price (include fermentation and bright tanks): $85,000
  • Keg Cleaner $10,000
  • Draft System: $5,000
  • Walk-in Cooler: $10,000

Rewards/Membership

To show our thanks for your support we are prepared to offer up some amazing rewards for our backers.  The more funds you give, the bigger the Reward!  Checkout our Perks to learn more!

Help us achieve our goal by being an early backer for a new brand of micro brew just for Southern Nevada.  We look forward to your support to help us take this to the next level!

Membership Disclaimer: This offer is limited to just 50 lucky backers and is subject to the success of this campaign and other funding efforts.  Members will have to come to the Bandy Family Brewing location to pick up their growler each month as growlers will not be shipped under any circumstances.

story:
Thank you so much for taking the time to browse through the details of our campaign. 

I got my start in the wine space as a novice bartender while in college. Back then we were constantly pouring out wine as it would go bad after a few days since patrons ordered by the glass. As I grew older, I started enjoying wine much more than other spirits, especially when paired with great food. While I loved having a glass of wine with dinner, I grew increasingly frustrated with the gadgets I was using and their limitations. This frustration ignited my obsession to design a better wine experience. 

I decided to focus on reinventing the traditional aerator while adding the combined benefit of a preserver. Both of these products individually enhanced the wine drinking experience but were designed for the patient, traditional wine connoisseurs and not the general public. No matter how much money I spent on aerators or preservers that claimed to be the best, they all had the same problems, so I knew I was onto something. After a ton of research, prototyping and engineering over the last 20+ months, I am confident that you will love the Godinot as much as I do. 

As a technical engineer, entrepreneur and advisor to startup accelerators and companies I have a diverse background in the development and design and manufacturing of a variety of software and hardware products.

In exchange for your contribution, you will be one of the elite few to receive the Godinot before the general public at a heavily discounted rate from the MSRP.

As this isn't my first entrepreneurial experience, there is a factor of safety in the minimum amount for the campaign to account for any unforeseen expenses. 

We're seeking the very minimum amount required for our first production run, which is going 100% towards having the minimum order quantity of units produced and shipped to first customers in custom boxes. 

My passion for product design and thoughtfully crafted wine drinking experiences provided the foundation for Godinot.  With the help of the crowdfunding community, we will launch not only our flagship product but also a company that designs and manufactures products that empower you to create unforgettable wine drinking experiences.

Cheers, 

Kyle Collier

story:
//English Below //

Was ist ZuckerPapi?

Lena und ich leben seit 15 Jahren im Neuköllner Schillerkiez direkt neben dem Tempelhofer Feld. Hier im Kiez gibt es wirklich alles - nur kein Geschäft für erlesene Schokolade oder Süßigkeiten. Das möchten wir ändern. Wir denken dabei nicht an ein Süßigkeitengeschäft im herkömmlichen Sinne, sondern haben vielmehr vor, moderne DIY-Fertigungs- und Produktionsmethoden in unseren Prozess einzubinden. Denn dann können wir: unsere eigenen, individuellen Formen und damit auch einzigartige Designs herstellen, zeitnah reagieren, sowie Fertigungs- und Produktionsdienstleistungen für kleine Auflagen in der Nachbarschaft anbieten. Ganz egal, ob Sie nach etwas Süßem für die Kleinen suchen, nach einem Geschenk für den Liebsten oder die beste Freundin oder ob Sie vielleicht eine eigene Idee haben, die Sie umsetzen möchten - ZuckerPapi ist die Lösung!

 

 

Was wir brauchen

Da ich über fundierte Berufserfahrung im Design und 3D-Modellieren verfüge könnten wir mit den richtigen Geräten unsere eigenen Gießformen anfertigen. Dadurch könnten wir unsere Kosten drastisch reduzieren und darüber hinaus langfristig eine Dienstleistung für die Nachbarschaft anbieten. Zur Erreichung dieses Ziels müssen wir die folgenden HAUPT-Anfangskosten decken: Miete: Ladenlokal/Küche, Ausstattung, Inventar (erlesene Schokolade aus aller Welt, Nostalgie-Süßigkeiten), Kakaobohnen: UTZ-zertifiziert, Direktbezug vom Amsterdamer Hafen sowie andere, natürliche Zutaten. Dann muss noch Bienenwachs und biologisch angebauter, individuell bedruckter Baumwollstoff angeschafft werden.
 

Was Sie bekommen... Unser erstes Marken-Schokoladen-Produkt

 

SchokoKiez

Schokoladentafeln in der Form Ihres Kiez

Haben Sie Ihren Kiez zum Fressen gern? Nun... das können Sie jetzt wörtlich nehmen! Unsere erste SchokoKiez-Tafel ist unserem Heimat-Schillerkiez gewidmet (siehe unten). Während der letzten paar Monate haben wir dieses Produkt von Grund auf entwickelt und Prototypen hergestellt. Wir sind jetzt soweit, dass wir es auf den Markt bringen können. Rechtzeitig zur Weihnachtssaison 2019 werden wir alle SchokoKiez-Tafeln herausbringen (vollständige Liste siehe unten).

 

Schillerkiez verpackt in Bioplastik

 

Vollständige Kiez-Liste - 10 verschiedene Berliner Kieze (Bergmannkiez, Boxhagener Kiez, Brunnenstrkiez, Kollwitzkiez, Körnerkiez, Nollendorfkiez, Reuterplatz, Rixdorf, Schiller & Wrangelkiez)

 

 

Die Schokolade

Wir sind uns bewusst, dass Ihnen Qualität und Geschmack wichtig sind. Wir werden ausschließlich UTZ-zertifizierte Kakaobohnen kaufen, damit wir uns sicher sein können, dass unsere Schokolade nur aus den besten Kakao-Anbaugebieten der Welt kommt. Denn dort beherrscht und pflegt man die Kunst der Schokoladenherstellung seit Jahrhunderten. Bei uns haben Sie die Wahl zwischen Bitter-, Zartbitter- und Milchschokolade. Unsere derzeitige Sorte zeichnet sich in der 81-83% VEGANEN Bittervariante durch einen reichhaltigen, leicht rauchigen Schokoladengeschmack mit milder Säure aus. Der Abgang ist weich und ausgewogen, mit fruchtigen bis bitteren Noten. Die Zartbittervariante mit 51-58% Kakaogehalt schmeckt unverkennbar schokoladig und besticht durch nachhaltige Vanillenoten, abgerundet mit einem Hauch von Karamell . In unserer Milchschokolade mit einem Anteil von 35-40% Kakao schmeckt man die gelungene Mischung aus Zucker, frischer Milch und Vanille.

 

Der Effekt

Hallo...? Schokolade! Aber mal im Ernst... Schokolade! Okay, Spaß beiseite. Wir möchten ganz einfach einzigartige Schokolade herstellen die Spaß macht und dabei unsere Kohlenstoffbilanz so niedrig wie möglich halten. Im Moment gibt es kein Geschäft dieser Art im Schillerkiez, das Premium-Schokolade oder Fertigungs- und Produktionsdienstleistungen für kleine Auflagen anbietet, einschließlich speziell angefertigter Schokolade und anderen Esswaren.

 

Wie können Sie uns helfen?

Teilen Sie dieses Projekt mit Ihren Freunden und Ihrer Familie auf Ihren Social Media-Plattformen. Je mehr Leute davon erfahren, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass wir unser Projekt umsetzen können. Daher bedanken wir uns schon um Voraus für jede Hilfe bei der Verbreitung.

 

Risiken und Herausforderungen

Mit der Anschaffung unserer Premier Stein-Mühle und dem Erlernen des Schokoladen-Temperier-Prozesses haben wir die Voraussetzung geschaffen, Schokolade selbst herzustellen. Unser größtes Hindernis ist demnach die Fein-Abstimmung der Werkzeugausstattung und Fertigung unserer eigenen Spritzgussteile. Jetzt gilt es zu ermitteln, ob wir ein Gusswerkzeug aus Aluminium brauchen, oder ob es vielleicht auch mit 3D-gedruckten ABS-Formen funktioniert.  Obwohl ich im Umgang mit Programmen wie TinkerCAD sehr versiert bin, werde ich mich weiterbilden, um künftig auch Fusion360 zu erlernen. Unsere Ausstattung und Geräte werden wir selber bauen. Die Open-Source-Pläne dazu findet man online: Precious Plastic. Hilfe bei der Anfertigung holen wir uns von der Berliner Firma für Kunstproduktion s-hamacher. Als Studenten der Youtube-Universität für uns kein Problem. Darüber hinaus ist die Anzahl an informativen Videos und Tutorials für alles Mögliche schier unendlich. Wir müssen unseren Recycling-Prozess durch die EFSA - europäische Behörde für Lebensmittelsicherheit genehmigen lassen.

 

D.I.Y.

Abschließend möchten wir betonen, dass bei diesem Projekt der Aspekt des Selber-Machens, der DIY-Spirit, im Vordergrund   steht. Heutzutage kann man tatsächlich (fast) alles lernen. Wir haben zwar hinsichtlich der Herstellung von Schokolade oder dem Spritzgussverfahren keine Berufsausbildung genossen - doch der Zugang zu dieser Art von Wissen ist heute wesentlich einfacher als noch vor ein paar Jahren. Mit diesem Projekt möchten wir beweisen, dass man mit den richtigen Werkzeugen und der entsprechenden, fundierten Information alles umsetzen kann.

 

 

What is ZuckerPapi

Lena and I both have lived in the Schillerkiez in Neukölln, Berlin - adjacent to Tempelhof Airport, for over a combined 15 years and realised there is no premium chocolate or candy shop in the neighborhood. We'd like to change that. Not a traditional candy making shop but a shop focused on integrating contemporary DIY manufacturing and production methods such as 3D-printing and CNC milling into our maker process. This allows us to: manufacture our own molds, produce a variety of unique designs, be more timely and provide small-scale manufacturing and production services to the community. Whether you want to buy a sweet for your little one, a gift for a friend or loved one or have your own idea you'd like to visualise, ZuckerPapi is for you!
 

 

What We Need 

Having a background in design & 3D-modeling, with the proper equipment, we could machine and make our own molds. If we did all the mold production internally, we would lower our cost drastically and be able to provide a service to the community long-term. Our CORE initial cost to accomplish this goal: Rent: storefront/kitchen, Equipment, Inventory (International Premium Chocolates, Nostalgic candies), Cacao Beans: UTZ certified from the Port of Amsterdam and other natural ingredients. We'll also need to purchase beeswax and custom printed organic cotton fabric.

 

What You Get... Our first branded chocolate product


 

SchokoKiez

Chocolate in the shape of your neighborhood

Have you ever wondered what It'd be like to Eat your Kiez? Wonder no more... now you can. Our first SchokoKiez design is of our home Schillerkiez. Over the past few months we've developed and prototyped this product from top to bottom. We're now ready to bring it to market with your support. We'll produce all SchokoKiez neighborhoods by holiday season 2019. (See full list below.)

 

Schillerkiez in Bioplastic packaging

 

Full Kiez List - 10 different Berlin Kiezes (Bergmannkiez, Boxhagener Kiez, Brunnenstrkiez, Kollwitzkiez, Körnerkiez, Nollendorfkiez, Reuterplatz, Rixdorf, Schiller & Wrangelkiez)

 


 

The Chocolate

We know quality and taste are important to you. We will only buy UTZ certified beans so we know our chocolate is sourced from the finest cocoa growing regions of the world; where making chocolate has been an art and an industry for centuries. You’ll have a choice of either dark, milky dark or milk chocolate. Currently, our 80-83% VEGAN dark chocolate has a rich, smokey chocolate flavor with a mild acidity. The finish is mellow and balanced between fruity and bitter notes. Our 51-58% cacao milky dark chocolate has a pronounced taste of cacao with long lasting vanilla end notes, along with a hint of caramel. Our 35-40% cacao chocolate is well balanced providing a delicate blend of sugar, fresh milk and vanilla.


The Impact

Chocolate... Duh! But seriously... Chocolate! Just kidding. Simply put, we want to make fun and unique one-of-a-kind chocolate with as little carbon footprint as possible - in the most sustainable way. Currently, there are no other businesses of this kind in Schillerkiez - providing premium chocolate sales as well as small-scale manufacturing & production service including personalised custom chocolate and other edibles.

 

Risks & Challenges

We recently purchased our own Premier stone-grinder and are confident in making and tempering chocolate. Our biggest obstacle looking ahead will be fine-tuning the process of tooling and machining our own injection molded parts. We'll need to determine whether aluminium tool cast will be necessary or of 3D printed ABS molds work. ​In addition, I'm proficient using TinkerCAD but I'll need to familiarise myself more with Fusion360 looking forward. We'll build equipment based on open-source plans found online at www.preciousplastic.com. We'll employ the production assistance of Berlin art house s-hamacher. We're pretty good at utilising Youtube University. There's a wealth of informative videos and tutorials online for virtually anything we'll need. We will also need to have our recycle plastic process approved by EFSA - European Food Safety Authority.

 

What can you do to help?

Share this project with your friends and family on social media. We need to spread the word to as many people as possible so anything you can do to pass it along is very much appreciated.

 

D.I.Y.

In closing, we'd like to highlight this project is about the D.I.Y.  spirit. Today, anyone can do anything. We didn't go to culinary school for chocolate making or injection molding but access to the knowledge to make all of this is far more accessible today. This project shows with access to tools and information you can do anything.
story_txt:
//English Below //Was ist ZuckerPapi?Lena und ich leben seit 15 Jahren im Neuköllner Schillerkiez direkt neben dem Tempelhofer Feld. Hier im Kiez gibt es wirklich alles - nur kein Geschäft für erlesene Schokolade oder Süßigkeiten. Das möchten wir ändern. Wir denken dabei nicht an ein Süßigkeitengeschäft im herkömmlichen Sinne, sondern haben vielmehr vor, moderne DIY-Fertigungs- und Produktionsmethoden in unseren Prozess einzubinden. Denn dann können wir: unsere eigenen, individuellen Formen und damit auch einzigartige Designs herstellen, zeitnah reagieren, sowie Fertigungs- und Produktionsdienstleistungen für kleine Auflagen in der Nachbarschaft anbieten. Ganz egal, ob Sie nach etwas Süßem für die Kleinen suchen, nach einem Geschenk für den Liebsten oder die beste Freundin oder ob Sie vielleicht eine eigene Idee haben, die Sie umsetzen möchten - ZuckerPapi ist die Lösung!  Was wir brauchenDa ich über fundierte Berufserfahrung im Design und 3D-Modellieren verfüge könnten wir mit den richtigen Geräten unsere eigenen Gießformen anfertigen. Dadurch könnten wir unsere Kosten drastisch reduzieren und darüber hinaus langfristig eine Dienstleistung für die Nachbarschaft anbieten. Zur Erreichung dieses Ziels müssen wir die folgenden HAUPT-Anfangskosten decken: Miete: Ladenlokal/Küche, Ausstattung, Inventar (erlesene Schokolade aus aller Welt, Nostalgie-Süßigkeiten), Kakaobohnen: UTZ-zertifiziert, Direktbezug vom Amsterdamer Hafen sowie andere, natürliche Zutaten. Dann muss noch Bienenwachs und biologisch angebauter, individuell bedruckter Baumwollstoff angeschafft werden. Was Sie bekommen... Unser erstes Marken-Schokoladen-Produkt SchokoKiezSchokoladentafeln in der Form Ihres KiezHaben Sie Ihren Kiez zum Fressen gern? Nun... das können Sie jetzt wörtlich nehmen! Unsere erste SchokoKiez-Tafel ist unserem Heimat-Schillerkiez gewidmet (siehe unten). Während der letzten paar Monate haben wir dieses Produkt von Grund auf entwickelt und Prototypen hergestellt. Wir sind jetzt soweit, dass wir es auf den Markt bringen können. Rechtzeitig zur Weihnachtssaison 2019 werden wir alle SchokoKiez-Tafeln herausbringen (vollständige Liste siehe unten). Schillerkiez verpackt in Bioplastik Vollständige Kiez-Liste - 10 verschiedene Berliner Kieze (Bergmannkiez, Boxhagener Kiez, Brunnenstrkiez, Kollwitzkiez, Körnerkiez, Nollendorfkiez, Reuterplatz, Rixdorf, Schiller & Wrangelkiez)  Die SchokoladeWir sind uns bewusst, dass Ihnen Qualität und Geschmack wichtig sind. Wir werden ausschließlich UTZ-zertifizierte Kakaobohnen kaufen, damit wir uns sicher sein können, dass unsere Schokolade nur aus den besten Kakao-Anbaugebieten der Welt kommt. Denn dort beherrscht und pflegt man die Kunst der Schokoladenherstellung seit Jahrhunderten. Bei uns haben Sie die Wahl zwischen Bitter-, Zartbitter- und Milchschokolade. Unsere derzeitige Sorte zeichnet sich in der 81-83% VEGANEN Bittervariante durch einen reichhaltigen, leicht rauchigen Schokoladengeschmack mit milder Säure aus. Der Abgang ist weich und ausgewogen, mit fruchtigen bis bitteren Noten. Die Zartbittervariante mit 51-58% Kakaogehalt schmeckt unverkennbar schokoladig und besticht durch nachhaltige Vanillenoten, abgerundet mit einem Hauch von Karamell . In unserer Milchschokolade mit einem Anteil von 35-40% Kakao schmeckt man die gelungene Mischung aus Zucker, frischer Milch und Vanille. Der EffektHallo...? Schokolade! Aber mal im Ernst... Schokolade! Okay, Spaß beiseite. Wir möchten ganz einfach einzigartige Schokolade herstellen die Spaß macht und dabei unsere Kohlenstoffbilanz so niedrig wie möglich halten. Im Moment gibt es kein Geschäft dieser Art im Schillerkiez, das Premium-Schokolade oder Fertigungs- und Produktionsdienstleistungen für kleine Auflagen anbietet, einschließlich speziell angefertigter Schokolade und anderen Esswaren. Wie können Sie uns helfen?Teilen Sie dieses Projekt mit Ihren Freunden und Ihrer Familie auf Ihren Social Media-Plattformen. Je mehr Leute davon erfahren, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass wir unser Projekt umsetzen können. Daher bedanken wir uns schon um Voraus für jede Hilfe bei der Verbreitung. Risiken und HerausforderungenMit der Anschaffung unserer Premier Stein-Mühle und dem Erlernen des Schokoladen-Temperier-Prozesses haben wir die Voraussetzung geschaffen, Schokolade selbst herzustellen. Unser größtes Hindernis ist demnach die Fein-Abstimmung der Werkzeugausstattung und Fertigung unserer eigenen Spritzgussteile. Jetzt gilt es zu ermitteln, ob wir ein Gusswerkzeug aus Aluminium brauchen, oder ob es vielleicht auch mit 3D-gedruckten ABS-Formen funktioniert.  Obwohl ich im Umgang mit Programmen wie TinkerCAD sehr versiert bin, werde ich mich weiterbilden, um künftig auch Fusion360 zu erlernen. Unsere Ausstattung und Geräte werden wir selber bauen. Die Open-Source-Pläne dazu findet man online: Precious Plastic. Hilfe bei der Anfertigung holen wir uns von der Berliner Firma für Kunstproduktion s-hamacher. Als Studenten der Youtube-Universität für uns kein Problem. Darüber hinaus ist die Anzahl an informativen Videos und Tutorials für alles Mögliche schier unendlich. Wir müssen unseren Recycling-Prozess durch die EFSA - europäische Behörde für Lebensmittelsicherheit genehmigen lassen. D.I.Y.Abschließend möchten wir betonen, dass bei diesem Projekt der Aspekt des Selber-Machens, der DIY-Spirit, im Vordergrund   steht. Heutzutage kann man tatsächlich (fast) alles lernen. Wir haben zwar hinsichtlich der Herstellung von Schokolade oder dem Spritzgussverfahren keine Berufsausbildung genossen - doch der Zugang zu dieser Art von Wissen ist heute wesentlich einfacher als noch vor ein paar Jahren. story:
Hi! My name is Liam, co-founder of L Bros CBD.  What is a CBD?  Well in our case, it stands for Cancer Battling Duo.  I am 9 years old and this is my story. 

Almost 2 years ago, when I was young, I started growing my hair so I could donate it to kids with cancer.  It was miserable.  Hot during the summers, it's always in my face, the pain of brushing it out in the shower and my parents yelling at me because of the knots…  I also hated being called, “sweety”, “honey” and “little girl”.  Finally, when it reached 10 inches all around, I  got it cut.  I needed to find an easier, quicker, and less painful way to help kids my age.    

I thought to myself, what else can I do to help?  So, I enlisted my younger brother Leo to help me start a new company to help kids.  Leo’s favorite thing is candy and what kid doesn’t like candy?  The doctor’s office always gives me a lollipop when I leave, so it must make kids get better, right?  I read a lot of articles about something called CBD’s and how they are REALLY helping people.  Let’s put CBD’s into candy.  So, Leo and I came up with our slogan, CANCER BATTLING DUO. 

I asked my parents to help me make a lollipop that tastes good and has CBD’s in it.  Something a kid my age would want to eat that could also help them.  So, with EVERY lollipop sold, we will donate the equivalent of one lollipop to a children's cancer charity. 

Hi!  My name is Leo, co-founder of L Bros CBD.  My brother already told you a little bit about our company.  I am 6 and a half years old.   I will tell you my story and how I learned about this amazing thing called CBDs.   

About two years ago, my Nana was diagnosed with cancer and a brain tumor.  After surgery on the brain, she suffered from a stroke.  My family had to move to California from New York City to take care of her.  I saw the nurses rubbing cream on my Nana.  I asked about it because it seemed to help her.  They told me it has something called CBD in it.  I did not know what that was, but I saw it made a huge difference.  

I went to my big brother Liam and told him about it…  He told me that he has been doing research on CBD and thinks they will help people.  I told him about what the nurse told me and Nana’s CBD cream and how it works for her. 

Liam told me of his idea and asked if I would help.  Ummm… of course!  I told him I liked candy and I think most people do to…  Why don’t we make a candy.  Then Liam said that lollipops must be good for you since we get one from our doctor on the way out.  So, we looked at each other and said, YES!  Lollipops with CBD!  We can help so many kids now!  That is when the L Bros Cancer Battling Duo first started.  We are just finishing our new websites:  LBrosCBD.com  and LBrosConfections.com   WE ARE DOING THIS OURSELVES WITH VERY LITTLE HELP FROM OUR PARENTS!  Help us  - help kids - making healing a little sweeter!™ 

We are not making any health claims! 

ALL OUR PRODUCTS ARE MADE IN AMERICA  

ALL OUR PRODUCTS ARE ARTISANALLY MADE 

SOME OF OUR PRODUCTS ARE GLUTEN-FREE 

LOOK FOR OUR PRODUCTS THAT ARE CERTIFIED ORGANIC AND PROJECT NON-GMO VERIFIED

SOME OF OUR PRODUCTS ARE KOSHER AND HALAL 

ALL OUR PRODUCTS ARE TASTY AND GOOD!

Please follow us on Instagram and Facebook!   @LBrosConfections

story:
What We Do

The product

The journey

The result

 
 

our CRYOGENIC SUBLIMATION process perfectly preserves taste, nutrients, and smell

endless possibilities

In late 2018, I somehow became so addicted to coconut water. Not just any coconut water, but one from a specific strain. Distinctively aromatic and sweet. Almost like a flower or fruit nectar, but clearer, and more delicate.

 

So this idea of turning it into some kind of portable product so I could carry it everywhere suddenly became one of my top priorities. And so it begins. Those few months after were  nothing, just binge visiting coconut plantations to find the best supplier. That's is also a reason why I've decided to use the scene of a river canal near the coconut plantation as an integral part of the packaging design. It reminds me of the journey. Eventually, the perfect grower was found. They are a small grower who harnessed technology enhanced harvest technique to produce consistently harvest the right coconut. 

 

Here comes the most difficult part, turning it into a viable, portable, drinking solution. 

 

Over the past year, I've been peeking through every corners of the food science realm; oven-dried, sun-dried, spray dried. None work quite like this latest discovery, the cryogenic sublimation process. Even with the right method, we were failing to yield a high quality fine-grained flakes because coconut water is a delicate subject. Slightly wrong temperature and the difference in flavor is blatantly noticeable. The only way to comprehensively preserve the taste is that the super delicate coconut water must never been exposed to excessive heat. (Video below)

 

After initial testing,  it is super exciting to finally be able to share this wonderful drink!

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding will go directly into sourcing a large batch of high quality aromatic coconut water and get the machine up and running
  • All fundings will be returned if we don't reach our goal

Risks&Challenges

  • The proposed delivery is in March 2021, but delay is possible considering how COVID-19 situation is affecting the global logistic industry. We will try our best :)

Other Ways You Can Help

Help share our project with Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hello 

My name is Jucia Nyembo Bwalya ,I am 27 years old born in Lubumbashi DRCongo 

As fact I have came to investigate and analyzed the first necessities needed a cross the REPUBLIC DEMOCRATIC OF CONGO 
I JUCIANYEMBO BWALYA Had studied and began this project to achieve and deliver the basics the Congolese people need, to contribute to development of the country 
This business is breakdown into two part which is: *hospitality and 
                                                                                           *Agriculture 
My responsibility as an entrepreneur in this business , will be to follow all the steps and stages according to the plan to make this business to existence 
I will be explaining and elaborate the steps needed to make the project to existence but 
                                              Agriculture 
Description 
As a citizens of the Congo I come to realize that agriculture is the first path to the development of the RD.congo 
Since the Congolese people still independent on fresh and local fresh food 
Agriculture is the keys and very profitable business to be established in Congo whereby the vast land are unexploited and opened to every individual interested in agriculture 
In the following page I will be explaining advantages and disadvantages of agriculture in Congo 

AGRICULTURE ADVANTAGES:
-According to the investigation and analysis of agriculture in the DRC 
The Agriculture business still not existing in DRC and this is the first advantage to whoever wants to invest in this business 
-98% of the products consumed by Congolese people are exported which mean there is not existence of local production around the country which reduced challenges and competition in the market 
- Agriculture is a long term investment which as many natural of products which can be delivered to the people on a daily routine 
The hearth depends on it this is a booming to the one first investor in the business 
Disadvantages
According to the situation of road structures in Congo there is possibilities of facing problems to deliver the products to difference city of the country 
Whatsoever there is no many disadvantages in this business platform 
AGRICULTURAL BREAKDOWN
We have two type of agriculture to go for 
Breeding and plantation 
BREEDING ITEMS:Cows, goats,chicken and Porcs 
PLANTATION: fruits and vegetables 


BREEDING:
At least 2 to 3 hectares to be occupied with enclosures to breed different types of animals 
Each animal kind will be breaded in their own enclosure 
Which goes to 4 enclosures to be build 
- Cows enclosure 
-Coast enclosure
-chickens enclosure 
-Porcs enclosure 
Amount of animals needed for a start:
- 9 femmes cows and one male cow

story:
In CHEEZUS we trust!

I'm Ross and I'm a cheese-o-holic. Yes, they say the first step to overcoming your problem is admitting it. So there we have it. In fact, my whole family is a bit cheese mad. We're from the UK but based in France, two of the best countries for cheese in the whole world. 

I always say I have ADBD (attention deficit business disorder) because, like a poorer, less famous Elon Musk, I can't stop thinking of things that the world needs. So with a family of cheese nuts, and equally wine lovers, we found ourselves questioning why CHEEZUS doesn't currently exist? 

Having worked on many start ups, this ain't my first rodeo. 

What is CHEEZUS?

As previously everything was the "Uber of X" I am hailing this the Vivino of cheese. You take a picture of your precious cheese laid out on your plate, the Cheezus app will tell you what that cheese is, and more importantly what goes with that cheese. 

- What to eat with it; such as fruit pairings, pickles and chutneys as well as which bread and cracker types.

- What to drink with it; whether it's red, white or port, we have suggestions for the best cheesegasm experience. 

On top of this, there are opportunities to provide suggestions on similar types of cheese to you. You know you're a Brie lover, but did you know of Rochebaron? A mild and creamy blue that will knock your cheese socks off. Great with a drop of New World Pinot Noir! 
 

Other features of the app include: 

Cheese events near you

Highlighted cheese restaurants of note

Cheese recipe suggestions 

Cheese blog posts from contributors and sponsors

This has now developed into more of a family project, too. My 14 yr old son has been doing the feature analysis between free and pro versions of the app, while he's also helping me get the website up and running. 

 

What Are We Raising & Why?

We're looking to raise €25,000 so we can bathe in cheese and create a family of cheese monsters to take over the world. OK, not true, but the €25,000 is. 

So how WILL it be used? That's simple: 

Development of the iOS app v1.0 - €5000: This also includes all the backend functionality that can be used for the next step Android app, to such as; user profile Db, image recognition API (work out what cheese is what) and recommendation engine. 

Development of Android app v1.0 - €2500: With the backend stuff already being handled, this will be an easier undertake but still an important step, we can't have Android peoples missing out on CHEEZUS! 

Corporate Setup - €2500: The boring stuff. Apparently if you build something you have to do it properly, and this means a corporate structure and legal entity that Cheezus sits under. World domination requires serious planning, and we have this covered. 

Marketing - €10,000 : Organic growth is one thing, but when you've run out of growthhacking blogs to read to try and get your app out there, and your friends and family block you on all social platforms for forcing them to download Cheezus, you need to bring out the big guns! 

Further App Development €5000 : But you've already built it? Yes, but getting it out there is one thing, the development needs to make sure we can have both free and paid versions of the app. This requires some further feature development and that requires some coinage. 

What will YOU get for investing in CHEEZUS? 

Apart from bringing something to market that the world needs, we wanted to line up some unique offerings to you guys as well. 

BRIETA Testers! Yes, I just used that pun. You guys will have the chance to be the first to use and test the apps. With this it will give you a chance to make suggestions on new features and ideas for the Cheezus app. 

Access to the exclusive CHEEZUS community. We're creating a whole space where people can help us make this everything the world needs, and you'll be at the forefront of that as Chief Cheese Officers. Ambassadors of cheese. A role like no other. This will open you up to opportunities within the Cheezus model; You can be a cheese contributor within the app, promoter in your area, city, or country. Cheese event team? You got it. These opportunities will come to all of you guys first! 

Free CHEEZUS Pro: Goes without saying, that you get the app as a part of your amazing contribution, right? 

Cheezus Merch: We have to have merch and nothing quite says Cheezus without great items. You have the choice between tshirts, hoodies and stickers with such great taglines as: In Cheezus We Trust, and ALL HAIL CHEEZUS, Y'all need CHEEZUS... Oh yes, we spent some time on those! 

 

What Happens If You Don't Hit Your Goal?

Like all good plans, you always need to make sure you build different scenarios into this, so we've done that. We will always aim to deliver the app as a no.1 priority. We can scale back first features and ensure we get a release out. Let's face it, as soon as Buzzfeed gets an eye full of the Cheezus goodness, we've got viral written all over us. 

Without YOU, The World Won't See CHEEZUS!

That's right, we need you. As much as we can do on our own, to get this out there and fully built, we can't do it without you. 

How many times have you been in the position where you as a cheese lover, doesn't know what cheese to pick in a restaurant, or store? Or, you're tired of the same old cheeses you eat but don't know where to turn next? 

Don't even get me started on what to eat and drink with our cheeses. Bored of the same pickles and Tuck biscuits? You'll become a next level cheese boss with the help of your cheesy friend, Cheezus.

We're obviously very lighthearted through all of this, but the fact remains we have total belief in this, it's no joke and we have the experience and expertise to get this amazing opportunity out there, we just need that little (read: huge) kick to get this into peoples' hands, and to the top of the app store! (It's happening, I'm telling you!) 

Risks?

The main challenges we face are technology challenges, but my background is IT and also product/ project management, so technical problem solving is kinda my bag. If something comes up that throws a challenge, there is always a solution and way to make it work. 

I have planned out exactly what technologies and backend the app will use and all of it has been utilised in other projects I've delivered (an app that uses image recognition to analyse goats, yes, you read that right, as well as educational analytics that use facial expression recognition to analyse students engagement - yea, we've got this one!)

Another potential challenge is funding and scaling, but the technology will be developed to allow scaling for user growth, and the product development will be built using lean product development where we can ensure we continue to deliver at the most efficient and cost effective way. I've bootstrapped every startup I've worked on, so working to tight budgets is what I do.

Other Ways to Help?

I know asking for investment is not always easy for everyone, we get that, we really do, but it's more than just about the financial help. A big part of any launch is about the marketing help, too and that is where everyone can contribute. All it takes is a share of this campaign on your social feeds, or the odd #Cheezus mention and tag, and we'll spread faster than hot butter on a crumpet.

Remember you can use the Indiegogo sharing functionality to help us get this project around the world.

story:
In America, we have a problem with the food cycle. It's in reverse.

My name is James Williams and I'm the co-founder of Good Food Direct. Good Food Direct wants to make healthy food affordable to all Americans, and we need your help to make it happen. We believe that through technology and innovation, we can reverse the food cycle in America; help our environment and improve the lives of millions of Americans in the process. Let me tell you how I learned about the value of good food.

I have been an athlete for the majority of my life. My college weight was around 175lbs and 4% body fat. After college I was fortunate to land a good job. That good job lead to the good life. Before I knew it, after one year I had ballooned to 256lbs. I had gotten fat. I had less energy, I couldn't think as clear, and wanted to stay home more than I wanted to go out. Then something happened that would change my life forever. I got a job offer to work and live in Asia.

I had been working and living in Asia for year before I came home for the holidays. I didn't know the shock I was in for. Upon arriving home my mother looked at me in anguish and couldn't believe her eyes. She had asked me if I was ok and if everything was alright. Puzzled, I asked her why. She said "because you lost so much weight." I hadn't realized it, but when I jumped on the scale, I had lost 80lbs. In one years time, without any exercising, I had returned to my normal weight. My mom thought they were starving me. In reality, I had never eaten so much in my life. I routinely ate 5-6 meals a day. I began to analyze how I managed to lose the weight. That's when it hit me. It was the food. While living in Asia, I always ate good healthy food daily. Fruits and vegetables picked that day. Fish caught that morning. Chicken slaughtered in the noon market. Fresh food made all the difference in the world.

That's when  I began researching and learning about the relationship between food and health. I learned that eating good healthy food was not only good for the body, but also for the environment. I realized that like most American's, I had the food cycle in reverse.

 

Now we need your help to get American's back on track, and to reverse the food cycle.

Who We Are:

Good Food Direct believes that every American should have access to affordable good food. There are two big obstacles that stand in the way of Americans having affordable good food:

1. Cost – Good food is not expensive. Unnecessary cost are added to the food chain that makes it more expensive to obtain by some Americans.
2. Access – How do we get affordable good food to All Americans

Good Food Direct (GFD) has a solution to the problem. We cut cost to the bear minimum by buying directly from the producers and manufactures, passing that savings directly to our customers. Our customers will save between 20-45% of grocery store prices. We also use an affordable delivery model to get Americans good food at the least delivery cost. We also use proprietary data analytics to empower you to make better buying decisions.

Our Technology:

GFD utilizes a proprietary Data Algorithm we call ADAM. Think of ADAM as your intelligent shopping guide that only gets smarter the more you and your family uses it. By filling out a short registration form, ADAM will save you time and money, and help you reduce your food cost, and more importantly your food waste.

This is an example of how it works. As you begin to place your order, our algorithm records the types of food you buy, how often you buy the food, how much you spend on your food and the frequency at which you buy it. Every time you shop online, instore or though the app, ADAM will inform you of any special deals, allow you to view and/or order from previous orders, alert you if you can save money by buying an item(s) in bulk or by the case and alert you if your spending or buying is outside of your norms. This is just a small example of what ADAM can do.

You will be able to shop our grocery store in person, online, or via our app. All with equal efficiency.

Our Social Mission:

At GFD we believe that charity begins at home. By home we mean the communities were Americans live and work. We belief that Good affordable food should be made available to ALL American’s, because all American’s benefit from a health society. Therefore we strive to:

- Offer Affordable food to all Americans by buying direct from Producers
- To eliminate Food Deserts across the USA by providing direct access to affordable good healthy food online, and through our warehouse through direct delivery and pick up
- Reduce food waste by 75% over the next 3 years
- Reduce the number of Americans that go to bed hungry from 1 in 7, to 1 in 3, in 3 years
- To partner with Food Banks all across America to allow our excess food to be delivered to families in need all across our Country on a weekly basis
- To save the lives of 3.5 Million Americans

Please Support Our Indiegogo. Helping Us, Helps You, Help America!

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to raise at least $50,000. This is what we will be using with the money we raise:

- Finish and test the GFD App to ensure it's robust and expandable
- Buy refrigeration equipment for the grocery store and warehouse
- File the patents for our Algorithm and Delivery system

 

For pledging to help this is what you will get:

- Discount/Credit to shop online, via app, or for those that live in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, in person.
- Discount/Credit on our Meal Prep Service
- Discount/Credit  on our Bulk Food Service
- A Good Food = Good Health Tee|
- The Good Food Direct Grocery Tote
- Be a guest cook in our online healthy cooking community
- Chance to pick the next food desert we will try to eliminate

 

The Impact:

Your contribution will not only improve your own health and life, but also the life of millions of Americans, and the environment we all live in. You will be contributing to making the world a better place for all, and more important, the future.

 

Risks and Challenges

Sadly, doing good can come with it's own challenges. Whether they be governmental, societal indifference and/or any host of things. The one thing we don't have is apathy. We are actively working to bring our hybrid vision of good affordable healthy food to ALL Americans. We see 3 challenges we are prepared to overcome.

1. Cost - We have been actively negotiating with over 100 direct producers of good food. These products range from fresh produce, to organic products, to ready made meals. We have already been given good pricing. However our pricing would be even less with volume. So we are constantly preparing for growth and hopes that our Indiegogo campaign will be that catalyst.

2. Technology - There are some technological hurdles we've been working on for the last 4 months. We have a good team, and will be looking to adding a couple more post Indiegogo. We are building a dynamic ecommerce site and companion app that is more intuitive than anything currently available. We hope to start testing our technology in December 2017.

3. Delivery - One of he biggest hurdles for most ecommerce companies is overcoming delivery and delivery cost. We will be overcoming this obstacle in 4 ways.
a. Using our own reusable grocery totes for shipping and pickup where applicable through our tote exchange program
b. Using our patent pending delivery platform that enables us to deliver more grocery boxes to more locations.
c. Micro warehousing. Setting up small strategic warehouses in locations that utilize local food producers and communities.
d. Limiting delivery days to 2 time per week.

This is why we can offer flat rate shipping

Other ways you can help

We understand that everyone may not want to buy groceries, tees and/or make a financial contribution. However, you can still do your part by getting the word. IN addition to telling your family, friends and co-workers, please post and share on your social media, our infographics, our videos, and most important, our Indiegogo link. :)

Then something happened that would change my life forever. I got a job offer to work and live in Asia.
I had been working and living in Asia for year before I came home for the holidays. I didn't know the shock I was in for. Upon arriving home my mother looked at me in anguish and couldn't believe her eyes. She had asked me if I was ok and if everything was alright. Puzzled, I asked her why. She said "because you lost so much weight." I hadn't realized it, but when I jumped on the scale, I had lost 80lbs. In one years time, without any exercising, I had returned to my normal weight. My mom thought they were starving me. In reality, I had never eaten so much in my life. I routinely ate 5-6 meals a day. I began to analyze how I managed to lose the weight. That's when it hit me. It was the food. While living in Asia, I always ate good healthy food daily. Fruits and vegetables picked that day. Fish caught that morning. Chicken slaughtered in the noon market. Fresh food made all the difference in the world.
That's when  I began researching and learning about the relationship between food and health. I learned that eating good healthy food was not only good for the body, but also for the environment. I realized that like most American's, I had the food cycle in reverse.
 
Now we need your help to get American's back on track, and to reverse the food cycle.
Who We Are:
Good Food Direct believes that every American should have access to affordable good food. There are two big obstacles that stand in the way of Americans having affordable good food:
1. Cost – Good food is not expensive. Unnecessary cost are added to the food chain that makes it more expensive to obtain by some Americans.2. Access – How do we get affordable good food to All Americans
Good Food Direct (GFD) has a solution to the problem. We cut cost to the bear minimum by buying directly from the producers and manufactures, passing that savings directly to our customers. Our customers will save between 20-45% of grocery store prices. We also use an affordable delivery model to get Americans good food at the least delivery cost. We also use proprietary data analytics to empower you to make better buying decisions.
Our Technology:
GFD utilizes a proprietary Data Algorithm we call ADAM. Think of ADAM as your intelligent shopping guide that only gets smarter the more you and your family uses it. By filling out a short registration form, ADAM will save you time and money, and help you reduce your food cost, and more importantly your food waste.
This is an example of how it works. As you begin to place your order, our algorithm records the types of food you buy, how often you buy the food, how much you spend on your food and the frequency at which you buy it. Every time you shop online, instore or though the app, ADAM will inform you of any special deals, allow you to view and/or order from previous orders, alert you if you can save money by buying an item(s) in bulk or by the case and alert you if your spending or buying is outside of your norms. This is just a small example of what ADAM can do.
You will be able to shop our grocery store in person, online, or via our app. All with equal efficiency.
Our Social Mission:
At GFD we believe that charity begins at home. By home we mean the communities were Americans live and work. We belief that Good affordable food should be made available to ALL American’s, because all American’s benefit from a health society. Therefore we strive to:
- Offer Affordable food to all Americans by buying direct from Producers- To eliminate Food Deserts across the USA by providing direct access to affordable good healthy food online, and through our warehouse through direct delivery and pick up- Reduce food waste by 75% over the next 3 years- Reduce the number of Americans that go to bed hungry from 1 in 7, to 1 in 3, in 3 years- To partner with Food Banks all across America to allow our excess food to be delivered to families in need all across our Country on a weekly basis- To save the lives of 3.5 Million Americans
Please Support Our Indiegogo. Helping Us, Helps You, Help America!

What We Need & What You Get
We are trying to raise at least $50,000. This is what we will be using with the money we raise:
- Finish and test the GFD App to ensure it's robust and expandable- Buy refrigeration equipment for the grocery store and warehouse- File the patents for our Algorithm and Delivery system
 
For pledging to help this is what you will get:
- Discount/Credit to shop online, via app, or for those that live in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, in person.- Discount/Credit on our Meal Prep Service- Discount/Credit  on our Bulk Food Service- A Good Food = Good Health Tee|- The Good Food Direct Grocery Tote- Be a guest cook in our online healthy cooking community- Chance to pick the next food desert we will try to eliminate
 

The Impact:
Your contribution will not only improve your own health and life, but also the life of millions of Americans, and the environment we all live in. You will be contributing to making the world a better place for all, and more important, the future.
 

Risks and Challenges
Sadly, doing good can come with it's own challenges. Whether they be governmental, societal indifference and/or any host of things. The one thing we don't have is apathy. We are actively working to bring our hybrid vision of good affordable healthy food to ALL Americans. We see 3 challenges we are prepared to overcome.
1. Cost - We have been actively negotiating with over 100 direct producers of good food. These products range from fresh produce, to organic products, to ready made meals. We have already been given good pricing. However our pricing would be even less with volume. So we are constantly preparing for growth and hopes that our Indiegogo campaign will be that catalyst.
2. Technology - There are some technological hurdles we've been working on for the last 4 months. We have a good team, and will be looking to adding a couple more post Indiegogo. We are building a dynamic ecommerce site and companion app that is more intuitive than anything currently available. We hope to start testing our technology in December 2017.
3. Delivery - One of he biggest hurdles for most ecommerce companies is overcoming delivery and delivery cost. We will be overcoming this obstacle in 4 ways.a. Using our own reusable grocery totes for shipping and pickup where applicable through our tote exchange programb. Using our patent pending delivery platform that enables us to deliver more grocery boxes to more locations.c. Micro warehousing. Setting up small strategic warehouses in locations that utilize local food producers and communities.d. Limiting delivery days to 2 time per week.
This is why we can offer flat rate shipping

Other ways you can help
We understand that everyone may not want to buy groceries, tees and/or make a financial contribution. However, you can still do your part by getting the word. IN addition to telling your family, friends and co-workers, please post and share on your social media, our infographics, our videos, and most important, our Indiegogo link. :)
