story:
Hello people, this is our first experience in crowdfunding so do not judge us too strictly.

Who we are?

Let me introduce our team. My name is Patrice, my partner's name is Alexey and we are FunLogics. I used to be working as marketing manager in a number of companies and ended-up as a head of marketing department in a beer distribution company, Alexey runs an IT business since 2004, his team helps us with development.

Both of us spent a lot of time working on tasks of different customers, though most of them were completed successfully, we had feeling that we can start our own project, this is how BrewMapp was born!

What we do?

When I started working with beers, I fall in love with the drink… I wanted to know more about it and finally stumbled across name of Michael Jackson (he is also a king but in beer statistics). He was the first author to classify beer styles from different countries. In 70's his works were perfect source of knowledge for budding home-brewers on the verge of craft revolution as well as ordinary beer lovers from all over the world.

Michael’s work inspired me I wanted to spread the knowledge beyond beer professionals and brewers, down to the ground where bars and fun is. That is how BrewMapp was born, it helps people to navigate in a world of beers, bars and breweries and educate one selves as well as share their experience with others.

What‘s new?

We’re doing our best to think big! BrewMapp is quite a complex project, but we believe we have enough guts to succeed, here are few features we already have:

  • BrewMapp Navigator© - helps to find a nearest pub with your favorite beer by the best price.
  • BrewMapp Interactive© - allows you to comment and rate bars, beers and breweries as well as add new ones.
  • BrewMapp Social© - chat with bros from both sides of the bar desk, post your experience, find out latest news.
  • BrewMapp BeerOpedia© - database of beers and breweries where you can learn more about your fav brews.
  • BrewMap Aggregator© - source of latest news and special offers from bars breweries and distributors.
  • BrewMapp Recruting© - looking for a job in a bar, post a resume in your profile and apply, need an employee, post a vacancy. Discuss details online or arrange an off-line meeting.

Nothing special? May be, but It’s all in your pocket in one single app! Simply download it in AppStore and no, Android version is not available yet, actually this is one of the reasons we are here.

Few more things are coming soon with updates:

  • BrewMapp Check-in© - share your experience faster, post, rate, comment, receive awards!
  • BrewMapp Rates© - most active users (these who would be hitting tops in check-ins, comments, adding beers and breweries, posting news with high amount of likes) shall be receiving special awards.
  • BrewMapp Games© - fun beer games with real prizes, sponsored by bars breweries and other professional users.
  • BrewMapp Global© - we’re working on addition of every bar in 46 most beer loving countries.

Why we are here?

We’re developing and perfect BrewMapp for more than two years and our resources start running low, so we decided to ask for your support people.

Our goal is 63 400 USD, it’s an equivalent of 4M rubles. That is two thirds of what we already invested in the project. We plan to spend this money three major purposes.

•             Development of android version, it’s almost there, but we need additional chips to polish it and set it sail.

•             Promotion, we do our best to make beer lovers hear our voice through various methods from personal recommendations at beer fests and meetings with bar owners to SMM and BTL campaigns but profound digital campaigns are quite pricey.

•             Updating and management of our database of beers and bars. BrewMapp concept is quite simple, we provide a platform and users upload data, but management and moderation of a global database takes resources.

Rewards

We would conduct a couple of private online tastings of interesting beers together with @PUBSMOSCOW one of the most thorough pub, beer and liquor expert blogs. Get your link for donation over 10$

Together with our friends from Tweed & Stout® we prepared stylish t-shirts for these who would contribute over 50$, as well as link to online tasting broadcast.

These who would contribute over 100$ shall receive a personal gratitude post in BrewMapp as well as in all our social accounts and of course all listed above perks!

Nevertheless, any donation would be a great help for us, thank you very much in advance.

It’s all about the money?

Though BrewMapp was born in Russia, but doubtlessly it’s a global project! If you are in Memphis, Malaga, Perth, Nimes, Bruges, Moscow or Reykjavik simply add a bar you love or brews brewed by your neighboring brewery as well as some info about the brewery itself, make a couple of check ins and share a BrewMapp link in your social accounts, this would be a great contribution also!

We are looking for partners globally, so if you know how to support the project, please feel free to contact us.

Let’s share the diversity of beers together!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jeff Stadler and I am the Owner of The DraftBox. I am a 100% Volunteer Firefighter and own a small service company. I was in the bar business (beer and wine) in the late 90's and was successful during my time in it.

 The DraftBox is a mobile tap room made from a shipping container. The DraftBox is a fun, new, and exciting concept of turning a shipping container into a bar that can be taken to any event where alcohol can be sold, served, and consumed, e.g., Fairs, festivals, City/County events, private, corporate, etc. It can also be used as a beach bar!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are creating a brand that is The DraftBox. We need your help to get this to the next level. Although the cost is relatively low compared to a "brick and mortar" bar build it is still costly especially in the early stages. Some of the costs associated with this are shipping container purchases, modifications, roll-off truck for pick up and delivery of containers, marketing, custom paint work, uniforms, insurance, website development, etc. If our goal is not reached we will take all of the funds and continue to build the business by purchasing additional containers and modifying them in addition to some marketing. 

As a "Thank You" for your support and contribution we have some really cool gifts which include a "HOGG" 20 oz stainless steel beer mug with our custom-designed logo on it and a T-shirt with our custom-designed logo on the front and "I'd tap that" or "My Hoppy Place" on the back!

The Impact

The DraftBox is completely mobile and provides 8 beers on tap at a temperature between 36-38 degrees! It also features a walk-in cooler that will store up to 26 kegs of beer allowing us to serve thousands of ice-cold beers from one of our five serving windows. It can also be operated on or off grid. We will also be working with local craft breweries to feature their products and offer a "Beer of the Month" on tap. This helps support our community and local businesses. We are local but want to expand in our region and to other states and bring a DraftBox to your area and events! Please help us build our brand and make this the next big thing!

story:
Short Summary

After observing that a lot of products claim to be healthy but they sacrifice taste, I gave up my banking job to found Dolce la Dolce.

As a new business, we are working hard to ensure we give every customer an opportunity to have access to our snacks. We receive huge demand daily and we think this platform could help create an opportunity to reach more customers than we currently reach. 

By contributing and pre-ordering our snacks, we will get these snacks in your hands and your contribution will help us deliver quality to our customers.

What We Need & What You Get

  • To deliver the next shipment of our products to our customers and get our snacks in more customer's hands, we need £100,000.
  • You will receive 12 packs each of Almond Pecan Crunch clusters, Cashew crunch clusters, Cashew with Coconut, Cashew with Cocoa nibs.
  • If we do not reach our target fund, we will still serve you by delivering the snacks to your chosen address. 

The Impact

  • The funds received from contributors is important to the progress of Dolce la Dolce. 
  • Although we have some popular business customers, we want to ensure that everyone has the opportunity to enjoy our products. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Although it is highly unlikely to happen, our products may not match your interest. In such case, we will make sure you receive your money back. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

  • It is possible that this opportunity is not for you however, you could still help by putting the word out there. Please spread the word.

story:
Introducing Panai freeze-dried fruit crisps

 

A healthy on-the-go snack. All-natural and bursting with nutrients & exotic flavors!

Our vegan-friendly, sustainably sourced organic snacks are made with one ingredient only:

Fresh fruit in all its glory!

Our current starting range consists of exotic fruit sourced from the lush jungles of southern India; banana, coconut, mango, pineapple

 

Our mission

Our brand Panai was launched with the goal to source the most delicious & nutritious foods from across the globe and bring them to our audience for an other-worldly and exotic tasting experience.

We actively travel to the most exciting & beautiful places in search of local culinary secrets, always prioritizing healthy products with an interesting story to tell.

As notorious snacking addicts ourselves, we always found it difficult to find healthy options that were tasty, nicely branded & not breaking the bank. Through Panai, we want to offer alternatives to conventional sugar-loaded & over-processed snacking options, and allow people to keep on munchin' in a guilt-free way.

The first products we're launching are our organic, freeze-dried fruit crisps, brought to you from the beautiful mountaintops & misty foothills of south India.

True island vibes with our coconut crisps!

More than just a pizza topping!

Let's go bananas

All bow down to the king of fruit!

 

The origins

These fruits are grown by small-time farmers in the Kerala region, who apply sustainable practices, respecting nature and their local communities.

After visiting the region on a work-related trip, we were introduced to their local cooperative organization, who offered us a healthy snack during the meeting. Blown away by the explosion of flavors & aromas in these crispy fruit chunks, we immediately started dreaming about bringing these products to our markets and giving them the ⭐ spotlight ⭐  they deserve!

We decided there and then to partner up to source the most incredibly tasting fruits, which we then turn into delicious fruit crisps through a process called freeze-drying*. This basically implies that nearly all the water content is taken out of the fruit through sublimation (going from a solid to a gaseous state without passing through the liquid stage), making them crispy while retaining their fresh flavors, aromas, & nearly all of their nutrients.

*This process is very different to conventional fruit drying, which keeps the fruit moist and typically requires a lot of added sugar to get to a satisfying and lasting taste.

After processing the fruit crisps, we then package them in beautifully designed premium packaging here in our facility in the EU.

These 100% natural snacks are

✔️ Additive-free

✔️ Sugar-free

✔️ Preservative-free

✔️ Gluten-free

✔️ Vegan 

✔️ & Most of all absolutely delicious.

They're ideal for on-the-go snacking or as an add-on to many healthy dishes.

Also, these are the ideal playground snacks for kids, replacing sugar-loaded & over-processed sweets while also offering a fun alternative to their daily fruit requirements.

A healthy mind in a healthy body, it all starts with what you eat!

 

What we've done so far

Our first batch of 30,000 packs is currently on its way to Europe, and is planned for market launch in early October.

So far we've been self-supporting, managing to design the packaging, order the raw materials, order primary & secondary packaging and initiating limited marketing efforts while also supporting daily operations.

✔️  February 2021: The idea was born! While visiting the beautiful lush surroundings of Southern India, we were introduced to locally made & organic freeze-dried fruit crisps  -- the products were just too good ! 

✔️  March-April 2021: Competitive analysis & market research -- Nothing even comes close to our products, taste- & quality-wise! ⭐

✔️ May 2021: Assemble an international team of qualified partners (packaging design, web design, packaging production, local logistics) 

✔️ May 2021: Ordered the first batch 1MT from India -- Harvesting could then start!

✔️ June 2021: organic certification obtained, allowing us to import & distribute our beloved organic products

✔️ June 2021: Packaging designed! Website live (www.panaifoods.com) Harvest complete & processing done!

✔️ June-September 2021: All set! raw materials are ready to be shipped, packaging ready to be filled, but.... ⚠️COVID ⚠️ --> Delays, delays, delays... 

✔️ July-August 2021: Raising client interest by setting up shop on online wholesale platforms, potential client outreach, social media set-up & initial tasting sessions

MARKET LAUNCH PLANNED 

October 2021

 

Why we need you ?

As an independent & privately run operation, we've almost reached our current financial limits, keeping us from taking the next essential steps. Covid-related delays have pushed our market launch with several months, putting us in an uncomfortable situation where we need to be more frugal with planned expenditure.

We now need your support to proactively pre-order the next batch of raw materials and to scale up our marketing & daily operations, so we can successfully grow our brand to become a household favorite! 

Specifically, we're raising funds to do the following:

✔️ Increase online marketing expenditure (SEO, social, content) to grow faster

✔️ Improve our current online presence (website, content, socials) to look better 

✔️ Lay the groundworks for successful international expansion (labeling & packaging compliance, certifications) to reach further

 ✔️ Pre-order a second batch of raw materials, good for another 30,000 sales units to reach more happy customers & fulfill our potential trade partners' future orders 

 

Building a new brand is expensive, but oh so rewarding at the same time.

We hope that through your support, you'll be able to find our delicious & nutritious fruit snacks in retailers near you very soon! 

Together with you we will grow a positive brand with a positive message, and make this world a better place, one crunchy fruit chunk at a time! 

 

In addition, we've got several exotic product extensions already bubbling in our minds to grow the brand range, but first let's focus on our freeze-dried fruit snacks!

 

Are you ready to be part of this adventure ?

Follow us on Instagram: @panaifoods 

 

Much love,

The Panai Team

Through Panai, we want to offer alternatives to conventional sugar-loaded & over-processed snacking options, and allow people to keep on munchin' in a guilt-free way.The first products we're launching are our organic, freeze-dried fruit crisps, brought to you from the beautiful mountaintops & misty foothills of south India.True island vibes with our coconut crisps!More than just a pizza topping!
Let's go bananasAll bow down to the king of fruit! The originsThese fruits are grown by small-time farmers in the Kerala region, who apply sustainable practices, respecting nature and their local communities.After visiting the region on a work-related trip, we were introduced to their local cooperative organization, who offered us a healthy snack during the meeting. Blown away by the explosion of flavors & aromas in these crispy fruit chunks, we immediately started dreaming about bringing these products to our markets and giving them the ⭐ spotlight ⭐  they deserve!We decided there and then to partner up to source the most incredibly tasting fruits, which we then turn into delicious fruit crisps through a process called freeze-drying*. This basically implies that nearly all the water content is taken out of the fruit through sublimation (going from a solid to a gaseous state without passing through the liquid stage), making them crispy while retaining their fresh flavors, aromas, & nearly all of their nutrients.*This process is very different to conventional fruit drying, which keeps the fruit moist and typically requires a lot of added sugar to get to a satisfying and lasting taste.After processing the fruit crisps, we then package them in beautifully designed premium packaging here in our facility in the EU.These 100% natural snacks are✔️ Additive-free✔️ Sugar-free✔️ Preservative-free✔️ Gluten-free✔️ Vegan ✔️ & Most of all absolutely delicious.They're ideal for on-the-go snacking or as an add-on to many healthy dishes.Also, these are the ideal playground snacks for kids, replacing sugar-loaded & over-processed sweets while also offering a fun alternative to their daily fruit requirements.A healthy mind in a healthy body, it all starts with what you eat! What we've done so farOur first batch of 30,000 packs is currently on its way to Europe, and is planned for market launch in early October.So far we've been self-supporting, managing to design the packaging, order the raw materials, order primary & secondary packaging and initiating limited marketing efforts while also supporting daily operations.✔️  February 2021: The idea was born! While visiting the beautiful lush surroundings of Southern India, we were introduced to locally made & organic freeze-dried fruit crisps  -- the products were just too good ! ✔️  March-April 2021: Competitive analysis & market research -- Nothing even comes close to our products, taste- & quality-wise! ⭐✔️ May 2021: Assemble an international team of qualified partners (packaging design, web design, packaging production, local logistics) ✔️ May 2021: Ordered the first batch 1MT from India -- Harvesting could then start!✔️ June 2021: organic certification obtained, allowing us to import & distribute our beloved organic products✔️ June 2021: Packaging designed! Website live (www.panaifoods.com) Harvest complete & processing done!✔️ June-September 2021: All set! raw materials are ready to be shipped, packaging ready to be filled, but.... ⚠️COVID ⚠️ --> Delays, delays, delays... ✔️ July-August 2021: Raising client interest by setting up shop on online wholesale platforms, potential client outreach, social media set-up & initial tasting sessionsMARKET LAUNCH PLANNED October 2021 Why we need you ?As an independent & privately run operation, we've almost reached our current financial limits, keeping us from taking the next essential steps. Covid-related delays have pushed our market launch with several months, putting us in an uncomfortable situation where we need to be more frugal with planned expenditure.We now need your support to proactively pre-order the next batch of raw materials and to scale up our marketing & daily operations, so we can successfully grow our brand to become a household favorite! Specifically, we're raising funds to do the following:✔️ Increase online marketing expenditure (SEO, social, content) to grow faster✔️ Improve our current online presence (website, content, socials) to look better ✔️ Lay the groundworks for successful international expansion (labeling & packaging compliance, certifications) to reach further ✔️ Pre-order a second batch of raw materials, good for another 30,000 sales units to reach more happy customers & fulfill our potential trade partners' future orders  Building a new brand is expensive, but oh so rewarding at the same time.We hope that through your support, you'll be able to find our delicious & nutritious fruit snacks in retailers near you very soon! Together with you we will grow a positive brand with a positive message, and make this world a better place, one crunchy fruit chunk at a time!  In addition, we've got several exotic product extensions already bubbling in our minds to grow the brand range, but first let's focus on our freeze-dried fruit snacks! Are you ready to be part of this adventure ?Follow us on Instagram: @panaifoods 
 Much love,The Panai Team

story:
En Rayuela somos una familia de gente apasionada por lo que hace, y comprometida con el objetivo de  nuestro negocio: ofrecer a nuestros clientes momentos memorables entre amigos, música en vivo y los mejores cocteles.

Debido a la situación actual que atravesamos, tuvimos que cerrar nuestro bar por casi 1 mes, hace 2 semanas abrimos nuestras puertas nuevamente con mucha alegría y todas las precauciones de bioseguridad para ofrecer una propuesta interesante de Menú Delivery. Sin embargo esto no es suficiente y es por esto, que hoy solicitamos tu ayuda.

Con tu colaboración de $15 obtienes un cupón del 50% de descuento en nuestras jarras de sangría y súper mojitos, para usar ilimitadamente por 3 meses, una vez regularizada nuestra actividad comercial. De esta forma, no sólo disfrutas de nuestras bebidas icónicas al mejor precio, sino que apoyas a las 8 familias que dependen del funcionamiento de nuestro bar.

 

En Rayuela es nuestro deber precautelar por la integridad de nuestra familia, y debido a la situación actual que atravesamos, esa tarea se hace cada vez más, y más difícil. Hay muchas formas de apoyar, ya sea comprando nuestros cupones, ordenando nuestro menú a domicilio o contándole a otras personas sobre nuestra petición.

 

La #familiaRayuela te agradece y espera con ansias abrir sus puertas nuevamente para seguir atendiéndote scomo siempre.

story:
Our Story:

Monica and I have been presented with an opportunity to purchase American City Diner in Chevy Chase, DC.

Our campaign would help us preserve a piece of neighborhood history and build American City Diner back into what was once a popular family gathering spot. 

The diner has been on the decline over the years and will soon be on it's way out if we don't step up and take the wheel. Replacing this landmark with another bank or business would be a blow to the spirit of our neighborhood.

With over 10 years of experience operating a high volume restaurant, we're the team for the job! 

Our Ask:

What we're asking and what we'll deliver.

  • We need $100,000.00 to purchase the business outright
  • Once we purchase the restaurant we will improve all areas from menu, operations and decor (without ripping away the original charm). 
 

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word to friends and family!

About us

The Tea Poetry company was founded in 2017. We have been a tea supplier in Taiwan for more than twenty years. We dedicated to the goal of spreading the quality tea and introducing its healthy benefits and the art of tea culture to the world. Now we want to introduce you our new product, ten series of Taiwan best high mountain tea. We guarantee you receive only the best quality Taiwan tea with the beautiful and fashion gift box we designed.

story:
About the Product 

    Use Blowout Pal to showcase that perfect birthday cake so that the celebrants will enjoy the presentation. The high quality transparent plastic allows the party goers to perfectly view the cake without touching or breathing on it. The lighted candles further highlight the occasion with a grand, sparkling, and shimmering enhancement of the celebration. No need to fear candle wax dripping on the cake or unsightly candle holes in the icing because Blowout Pal prevents this. The guest of honor can now huff and puff and entertain the guests without showering the cake with a spray of saliva. The guests will appreciate this especially in this time of viruses and colds. 

     The birthday cake sits upon the white scalloped-edge platter, and it is protected by a high quality, transparent, hospital grade plastic cake cover; which allows a full transparent view of that perfect birthday cake. The detachable candle deck is also a high quality plastic and it slides and locks into and sits upon the cake cover. When the celebration concludes, the candle deck is unlocked from the cake cover and stored below the platter where it slides and locks into the underside of the platter and it stores there until the next celebration. You now have a kitchen counter- top food storage cover perfect for storing pastries, bread, and fruit which will adorn your kitchen environment. 

     I am launching this campaign to cover the costs of securing a plastic induction mold et al for the manufacture of Blowout Pal. Estimates range from $55,000 to $ 104,000 for aluminum or steel respectfully. Since I do not possess these funds, I am therefore utilizing Indiegogo crowd funding to cover the mold cost, production product run, packaging, perks (rewards), insurance, and the like. When I attain my goal of at least $ 55,000, I will have the product ready for sale this Spring or Summer. Blowout Pal may be subject to some manufacturing improvements. Thus, I would highly appreciate your supporting this campaign and telling your family, friends, associates, acquaintances, coworkers, et al, and together let’s fight the spread of diseases while enjoying our food. 

     Blowout Pal is a dual purpose product when: 

1. The cake is shielded from the guest of honor’s saliva while they blow out the candles, and

2. The food (pastries, fruit, and bread) is stored within Blowout Pal between celebrations. 

     In closing, my grandchildren love to plan the candle design layout on the candle deck and spend much time and discussion with their peers brainstorming the perfect candle design. Whenever there is a family cake celebration, my grandchildren always demand Blowout Pal. Now, I know Blowout Pal is a winner!

     

(This is Blowout Pal with the removable candle deck!)

 

The Idea

     Hi, I am Brian Donnelly, inventor of Blowout Pal. I am a retired NYC public school teacher with an honorable discharge from the US Marine Corps. I have a lovely wife, three wonderful children, and five beautiful grandchildren. I have spent many years in retirement coaching youth basketball, founding and training public school marching bands, founding and developing the US Coast Guard Aux Marching and Concert Band in (first in the Nation) Northport, New York, and the Northport Jazz Big Band (now Gold Coast Jazz Band). Also, I served at the Northport VA hospital as a volunteer in the Recreation Therapy Dept. dealing poker for the Vets.

      The Blowout Pal idea came to me one day, like a bolt from the blue, as I was driving down Main Street in my hometown. I went home and produced a mock-up in my basement workshop. I then engaged the services of a patent agent, a graphic design artist and filed a provisional (one year) utility patent application. Shortly thereafter, I hired a prototyper and after a year of creative and collaborative effort, we produced the prototype called Blowout Pal. I then retained a patent attorney, and he filed a non-provisional (20 year) utility patent which was granted a year later. After several product improvements, I was granted a total of four non-provisional patents.

   

     (This is Blowout Pal without the removable candle deck!)

 

     The purpose of this invention is to heighten the joyful party experience of blowing out the candles while: 

  1. Stopping mouth fluids from reaching the birthday cake when the guest of honor blows out the candles, and
  2. Serving as a kitchen countertop food storage cover protecting food between birthday celebrations. 

      Please view the "full" scientific study and/or the short "abstract" thereof by Prof. Paul L. Dawson from Clemson University that describes the Bacterial Transfer Associated with Blowing Out Candles on a Birthday Cake. Blowout Pal would surely be a solution to this dangerous problem.

     To view my interview about Blowout Pal, please click here. 

      After many months of conducting focus groups, surveys, Facebook comments, posts, and consults, I am convinced that the public wants this product. To bring this product to the market, I need funding of at least $55,000 for a plastic induction mold, a finished two thousand product run, packaging, product fulfillment, product insurance, accounting services, warehousing, and the like.

     Funding is a big challenge, however, if the folks get out the word and trumpet this campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools, I believe Blowout Pal will make it to the market.

      ***** Many thanks to my teen-age grand daughter, Caroline, who volunteered and starred in this campaign banner video, edited and organized the video, and served as an IT expert for this campaign.

 

Cast and Crew!

Names from left to right: Patrick, Amelia, Jack, Carson, and Caroline.

Many thanks to my grandchildren for those memorable and humorous moments preparing and shooting this promotion. I felt the love. It was a blast!   -Brian (Inventor of Blowout Pal)

 

Family Mascots!

                                     Teddy                                                                                      Otis

story:
Story 

Hi, my name is Sean. I am Dual-Ph.D. student at Liverpool John Moores University, UK and University of Malaya, Malaysia. I am pleased to introduce a robotic cooking system called Bionic Cuisinier. Cooking is a must do daily activity during my study in Liverpool. One of my favourite dishes is Bak Kut Teh which is a pork herbal soup, it is very famous delicacy in Malaysia and Singapore. One day during my cooking, i realise that the cooking process is repeatable. I started to study the feasibility of making such a cooking mechanism since then. From my research and experiment, i came out with the design of Bionic Cuisinier (BENC-115).

The Bionic Cuisinier consist of a robotic arm with stirrer, water dispenser, induction cooker, platform, ingredient containers and  cooking pot. Please check out our video on what is the functionality of this device.

 

BENC-115, how to use it ?

We will provide you the menu and instruction how to make your lovely food.  Firstly, you have to insert all the ingredients into the designated cups. For example garlic, meat, herb package, mushroom and seasoning. Select the menu and press start button, the machine will carry out the cooking sequence without human interference. It can cook many dishes including:

1. Bak Kut Teh (Must eat food in Malaysia and Singapore)

2. Korean Instant Noodle

3. Tom Yum Soup

4. Kimchi Soup

5. Red Bean

6. Green Bean

7. Barley

8. Curry Chicken

9. Ginseng Chicken Soup

10. Many Kind of Instant noodles and many more.

This robotic cooking system is simple, easy to use, low cost, portable and most importantly it works!

 

Why use BENC-115?

This system will help to reduce cooking time and provide healthy food for working adults, students and families. There are two basic procedures to prepare a dish, prepare the ingredients and cooking process. This invention will replace half of the cooking workload by taking over the cooking process. Once all the ingredient is in place, this robotic cooking system will start the cooking sequence and you can walk away until the food is ready to serve.  What's more? It will definitely reduce the workload of our beloved mothers.

As seen on:

http://3dadept.com/meet-bionic-cuisinier-the-robotic-cooking-system-of-sean/

 

My Goal

This is a working prototype and ready for production. However, as i am still a student, an amount of start up fund is needed for small scale production. These include renting a work space, set up a proper facility and employ engineers and researchers. With a proper work space and strong team, we will be able to produce this robotic cooking system with higher production standard, aesthetics and better services.

 

BENC-115

To help my research, backers can pre-order the Bionic Cuisinier for self, family or business use. The BENC-115 is a solution for student accommodation, office's pantry, school, university and home cooking. It will be a major help and assurance to our product before it became a fully commercialised (It is currently patent pending). All the contributor's name will be remembered and put on the founder page.

 

EVERY LITTLE HELPS

A huge thank you for your help, be a part of the thriving Bionic Cuisinier community! All backers get a place on the Bionic Cuisinier community page, the warm feeling that comes from supporting cooking automation, and access to all discussions and project updates.

 

FOUNDER + SURPRISE! 

Please join our Bionic Cuisinier Founders page for more updates and excitement. Plus, surprise gift at end of the campaign! 

 

EARLY BIRD: BENC-115 - MAKER

Early bird discount and be the first to get BENC-115. This is the only place to get the new Benc-115. We will provide all the drawings (Makers need to prepare the structure), robotic arm, processor, induction cooker, grips and electronics parts. Come with 30 days of online support.

 

BENC-115 - MAKER

This is the only place to get the new BENC-115. The BENC-C 115 is a solution for student accommodation, office's pantry, school, university and home cooking. We will provide all the drawings (Maker need to prepare the structure), robotic arm, processor, induction cooker, grips and electronics parts. Come with 30 days of online support.

 

EARLY BIRD: BENC-115 FULLY ASSEMBLE

Early bird discount and be the first to get BENC-115. This is the only place to get the new Benc-115. Fully assembled, tested and ready to use BENC-115 will be sending to your door step. Just minor touch up, simply plug in and ready to cook. Come with 30 days of online support.

 

BENC-115 FULLY ASSEMBLE

This is the only place to get the new BenC-115. Fully assembled, tested and ready to use BENC-115 will be sending to your door step. Just minor touch up, simply plug in and ready to cook. Come with 30 days of online support.

 

BUNDLE 3 - MAKER

You will get three new BENC-115. The BENC-C 115 is a solution for student accommodation, office's pantry, school, university and home cooking. We will provide all the drawings (Maker need to prepare the structure), robotic arm, processor, induction cooker, grips and electronics parts. Come with 30 days of online support.

 

5 BUNDLE - FULLY ASSEMBLED

You will get three new BENC-115. Fully assembled, tested and ready to use BENC-115 will be sending to your door step. Just minor touch up, simply plug in and ready to cook. Come with 30 days of online support.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends about Bionic Cuisinier! Like and share the campaign, our website or our social media pages with the people you know.

Sign up to our Bionic Cuisinier platform! Join the Bionic Cuisinier community and  add your own favourite dishes to the database.

With a proper work space and strong team, we will be able to produce this robotic cooking system with higher production standard, aesthetics and better services. BENC-115To help my research, backers can pre-order the Bionic Cuisinier for self, family or business use. The BENC-115 is a solution for student accommodation, office's pantry, school, university and home cooking. It will be a major help and assurance to our product before it became a fully commercialised (It is currently patent pending). All the contributor's name will be remembered and put on the founder page. EVERY LITTLE HELPSA huge thank you for your help, be a part of the thriving Bionic Cuisinier community! All backers get a place on the Bionic Cuisinier community page, the warm feeling that comes from supporting cooking automation, and access to all discussions and project updates. FOUNDER + SURPRISE! Please join our Bionic Cuisinier Founders page for more updates and excitement. Plus, surprise gift at end of the campaign!  EARLY BIRD: BENC-115 - MAKEREarly bird discount and be the first to get BENC-115. This is the only place to get the new Benc-115. We will provide all the drawings (Makers need to prepare the structure), robotic arm, processor, induction cooker, grips and electronics parts. Come with 30 days of online support. BENC-115 - MAKERThis is the only place to get the new BENC-115. The BENC-C 115 is a solution for student accommodation, office's pantry, school, university and home cooking. We will provide all the drawings (Maker need to prepare the structure), robotic arm, processor, induction cooker, grips and electronics parts. Come with 30 days of online support. EARLY BIRD: BENC-115 FULLY ASSEMBLEEarly bird discount and be the first to get BENC-115. This is the only place to get the new Benc-115. Fully assembled, tested and ready to use BENC-115 will be sending to your door step. Just minor touch up, simply plug in and ready to cook. Come with 30 days of online support. BENC-115 FULLY ASSEMBLEThis is the only place to get the new BenC-115. Fully assembled, tested and ready to use BENC-115 will be sending to your door step. Just minor touch up, simply plug in and ready to cook. Come with 30 days of online support. BUNDLE 3 - MAKERYou will get three new BENC-115. The BENC-C 115 is a solution for student accommodation, office's pantry, school, university and home cooking. We will provide all the drawings (Maker need to prepare the structure), robotic arm, processor, induction cooker, grips and electronics parts. Come with 30 days of online support. 5 BUNDLE - FULLY ASSEMBLEDYou will get three new BENC-115. Fully assembled, tested and ready to use BENC-115 will be sending to your door step. Just minor touch up, simply plug in and ready to cook. Come with 30 days of online support. Other Ways You Can HelpTell your friends about Bionic Cuisinier! Like and share the campaign, our website or our social media pages with the people you know.Sign up to our Bionic Cuisinier platform! Join the Bionic Cuisinier community and  add your own favourite dishes to the database.

story:
Eines Tages

Es war ein mal ein heißer Sommerabend und sieben müßige Freunde trafen sich, um gebührlich Gin Tonic zu trinken. Natürlich sollte so ein Kelch mit edlem Tonicum und noch viel edlerem Gin nicht ohne Schmuck dargeboten werden. Da sprach einer der Freunde mit viel Scharfsinn: "Eine Gurke!". Ein Anderer "Ein Streifen davon!". Und viele weitere "Oh ja!" und "Hossa". Aber der verständigste Genießer unter ihnen sagte: "Ohne Schwur, ihr dürft mir glauben, vom Standpunkt des Wohlgeschmacks und der Ästhetik aus hat es Sinn, die Gurke in Wellen auf einen Spieß zu bringen".

Derjenige unter ihnen mit der trefflichsten Schicklichkeit wurde erwählt, sieben Gurkenspieße zu verfertigen. Allein, es gelang ihm nicht, in kurzer Zeit tolle Spieße zu erschaffen. Dies erzeugte tiefe Schwermut und Unzufriedenheit, da doch die Qualität der Cocktailspieße von der Qualität des Trunks eben soweit entfernt war, wie der Himmel von der Erde.

Es wurden von allen hinreichend die Ursache ergründet und ihr Geist erzeugte eine Idee, die vorher noch nie jemand beigefallen. So wurde kurzerhand das erste Gurken-Wellen-Werkzeug am 3D-Drucker materialisiert und am nächsten Abend auf die Probe gestellt. Es gelang vortrefflich! Alle Spieße sahen zum Entzücken aus, dass jedem das Herz im Leibe lachte. Die Gäste riefen "schön", "bene", "Gurke", "Cucumber", "Cucu" usw, und "beneCUCU", kurz *beneQQ*, ward geboren. Und so wurde der Gin Tonic fruchtbar.

So kam dieser Abend zur Ruhe, ward fürderhin ein angenehmer Aufenthalt, die pure Lieblichkeit in Scharen und eine Heiterkeit des Himmels. Alle tranken glücklich und zufrieden und wenn sie nicht gestorben sind, genießen sie noch heute!

 

 

 

Gin Tonic Enthusiasten

Mit beneQQ kann jeder in kürzester Zeit, ganz einfach und mit viel Spaß den perfekten Gurkenspieß zaubern.

Als Spieß könnt ihr alles verwenden, was lang und dünn genug ist, zB. Schaschlik- oder Bambus-Spieß. Der Durchmesser des Tunnels beträgt ca. 6mm. Somit passen idR alle handelsüblichen Spieße.

Eure Gin Tonics und alle anderen Gurkencocktails, werden einen geschmacklichen und optischen Boost erleben.

 

 

 

Andere Liebhaber

Ihr könnt auch anderes Gemüse in Streifen schälen und zum Garnieren verwenden.

 

 

 

Mit eurer Hilfe

Ihr helft dabei die Werkzeuge herzustellen, die nötig sind, um beneQQ im Spritzgussverfahren herzustellen.

  • Verwendet wird hochwertiger Kunststoff (ABS)
  • Geeignet für Lebensmittel und beständig gegen Öle und Fette
  • Farbe: schwarz

​

 

 

Making Of 

Viel ist passiert ehe beneQQ das geworden ist, was es heute ist.

 

 

Risiken

Die einzige Herausforderung ist die Finanzierung der Werkzeuge, da diese am meisten kosten. Die Produktion der beneQQ Parts ist dagegen super preisgünstig. Angebote sind eingeholt, nun benötigt beneQQ nur noch eure Unterstützung. Bitte helft mit dieses hilfreiche Gurkenspieß-Tool bekannt zu machen und sagt es allen Cocktailfreunden weiter.

 

--------------------------------------

One Day

It was a hot summer evening and seven idle friends met to drink Gin Tonic. Of course such a chalice with a noble tonicum and much nobler gin should not be offered without decoration. Then one of the friends spoke with much ingenuity "A cucumber". Another "A strip of it". And many more "Oh yeah!" and "Hooray!". But the most intelligent connoisseur among them said, "Without oath, you may believe me, from the good taste and aesthetics point of view, it makes sense to pierce the cucumber in waves on a spit."

The one among them with the most excellent skills was chosen to make seven cucumber sticks. Alone, he did not succeed in creating great spears in a short time. This produced deep melancholy and dissatisfaction, as the quality of the cocktail sticks was as far away from the quality of the beverage as the sky from the earth.

They all sufficiently knew the cause, and their minds produced an idea that had never before befallen anyone. Thus, the first cucumber wave tool was materialized on a 3D printer and put to test the next evening. It succeeded very well! All the spears looked like pure delight, that each heart heaved in their breasts. The friends shouted "beautiful", "bene", "cucumber", "cucu" etc, and "beneCUCU" short * beneQQ * was born. And so the Gin Tonic became fertile.

So this evening came to rest, a pleasant stay, the pure loveliness and a cheerfulness of heaven. They all drank happy and content, and lived happily ever after.

 

 

Gin Tonic Enthusiasts

With beneQQ everybody can make the perfect cucumber cocktail stick within the shortest time. It's totally easy and fun.

As a stick you can use all long and thin items whith a diameter not bigger than 6 millimeters, for example shashlik or bamboo skewers. All standard skewers fit.

Your Gin Tonics and all other cucumber cocktails will taste and look so much better with beneQQ.

 

 

 

Other Vegetables

You can also use the tool for other vegetables. All you have to do is peeling them into thin stripes.

 

 

 

With Your Help

You can help to fabricate the tools that are needed to produce beneQQ using the injection moulding process.

  • high-quality plastic (ABS) will be used
  • suitable for food contact and resistant against oils and fats
  • color: black

​

 

 

Making Of 

It was a long journey before beneQQ became what it is today.

 

 

Risks

The main challenge is to finance the initial tools for the moulding process as they are the most expensive part of the project. On the other hand, producing the beneQQ final product is low priced. Offers have already been collected. Now, all it needs to bring it to live is your support. Please help to promote this useful cocktail tool and let all the other cocktail lovers get to know about it!

story:
Short Summary

  • We are three entrepreneurs, Alex, Gilad and Elad the three of us are mechanical engineers with a combine experience of more than 40 years in the design and mass production of various plastic parts, together we are the inventors of The Chipop.
  • Two years ago we set in a bar and had a beer, ate chips but it was so uncomfortable that at the same day we started to think how we can improve the experience. Two years later and an endless amount of prototypes we have the perfect product that would changes the experience forever. We invested all our spare time in the last two years to bring this product to life and we would be so proud to share you in our success.
  • Consuming chips from a round package is a less convenient way possible, our dream is to allow people eat chips as they want it anywhere, in the car, on the beach, on your sofa, no constrains no mess. Your contribution will allow us to start production and to change the way people eat chips from a round package forever.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are currently finalized our prototype (3D printed), and the next steps are to establish production, we would need 15K$ for fully automatic injection molding process to become live, another 2K$ for design and package development and another 8k$ to order first batches of product.  
  • Our perks are the product. Join us!!! And you are the first in the world that will start enjoying eating your perfect chips from a round containers..

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share the link to as much friends as possible on any digital and regular media, we need your help in spreading the word!
  • If you like our product please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Our Story

While working within the financial sector, I, Agata, was diagnosed with Inflammatory Bowel Disease, having to change my diet and avoid various allergens. I started making my own version of healthy snacks for on-the-go. Astonished by the positive impact this diet change had on my gut and mental activity, I vowed to share my experience with millions of others struggling.

Within weeks together with my partner in crime, Sylvain, we started off making recipes at our home kitchen and the first superfood powered BITES were born. We toured every hippie-hippo district in London, sharing the snack BITES with everyone!

After a successful launch, we set out on a new mission to develop an all-natural, plant protein and vitamin packed, fueled by adaptogen nutrition bars. Supported by the fantastic product development team, Kitchen Town, in Berlin, we commenced development and testing stages

It’s time we spread the word and have everyone FEELIN’ GOOD. We need your support to bring this vision to life.Help us reduce the stress levels and get these nutritionally complete AHARAbars out to the public. By backing us, you will help us get these bars into production, making AHARAbar a reality!

 

The Problem

In a world that expects us to out-perform and have more focus, more drive, more calm, and be the BEST version of ourselves, we need to expect more from our snacks.

Our daily routines impact everything, and unhealthy snacks that are used as a quick fix, become a habit. Filled with high sugar and fat, these snacks spike our energy levels only temporarily. And while life does not get less busy, we still need snacks to keep us going.

Therefore, we created AHARAbar, your functional snack bar that helps your ambitious mind perform at its full potential.

What is AHARAbar?

AHARAbar is a plant-based nutritionally complete snack bar that has been designed helping you snack smarter, to think better. They are full of organic ingredients, which are gluten, nut, and soy free.  Formulated around key brain nutrients, packed with vitamins, plant protein and fueled by uplifting plants - Adaptogens.

  • All Natural - Made with organic ingredients that you can pronounce and understand.
  • Plant Protein - Packed with hemp protein, which is a complete protein, containing all nine essential amino acids.
  • Vitamins - Optimized around a unique mix of vitamins and minerals such C, D3, E and B12 that can make a real difference to our mental agility and our brain health in the long run.
  • Allergen Friendly - Made without gluten, soy or peanuts to help you enjoy your snacking moments without a sense of deprivation.
  • Adaptogens - Fueled by plant extracts considered to be uplifting ingredients which act as nerve tonics that calm the nervous system and deeply nourish the tissues and fluids in our bodies. They can improve our mood, mind and body, and have positive effect on our cognitive performance.

AHARAbar is packed with healthy fats and plant protein coming from hemp and pumpkin with 5g per bar. We also included 3g of Fibre, packed with vitamins such as vitamin C, D3, E and B12 and supported with uplifiting herbal ingredients like Spirulina, Ginkgo Biloba and Ashwagandha to help you achieve positive effect on cognitive performance.

The Flavours

AHARAbar comes in 3 delicious flavours, each with an uncompromising taste and nutritional profile. These three awesome flavours are sure to satisfy your breakfast, mid-morning or post-workout craving.

  1. Zesty Apple - An invigorating moment of apple and deep swell of cinnamon. It’s like waking up in a apple grove, on purpose, with a scrumptious bar in your hand. Blended with our mix of hemp and pumpkin protein, vitamins and the adaptogen, Spirulina. It’s a functional bar that’ll boost your immunity whilst keeping you energized for the day.

  2. Sweet Beet & Aronia - The black forest revealed its secrets to us, and we crafted them into a sweet and decadent, tangy snack bar. Sweet Beetroot blended with invigorating bursts of Aronia and our blend of hemp and sunflower protein, vitamins and adaptogens called Gingko. It will help you to fight inflammation and eliminate body stressors.

  3. Rich Chocolate Brownie - The chocolate classic. The safe bet. A flavour you recognize. Made with soft, melt-in- your-mouth cacao, mixed with tangy orange and blended with hemp and sunflower protein, vitamins and adaptogens, Ashwagandha which combats fatigue and stress.

Our Responsibility

We are committed to making our planet thrive and this starts with better packaging soon to be home compostable.

We like to keep ourselves busy and engage in non – profit projects which would not be possible without you.

Risks & Challenges

We already produced test series of our snack bars in order to check the production quality and our production processes. All of our partners have experience with the manufacturing of larger quantities, so we're confident our supply chain will run smoothly.

If we should wildly surpass our goal, we already have plans on how to enhance and speed up these steps. Please keep in mind that by backing this project, you are helping to make AHARAbar a reality. It is not yet a finished product, so unforeseen challenges might arise. We promise that we will keep you updated on the production progress and communicate delays as soon as we know about them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't financially contribute to AHARAbar, we appreciate everyone who shares our campaign and helps us reach as many people as possible!

story:
1. Prepare Brewdo
  2. Pour ground coffee with water in a plastic bottle. Refer to the recipe in the app.
  3. Close the lid and shake well. Put the bottle in the refrigerator.
  4. After coffee has been infused well, take out the bottle and put the Brewdo filter into the bottle. Then, pour the drink out slowly to a container.
  5. Enjoy the coffee at your leisure.

Tip.

If you have selected coarse-ground or medium-ground for the grinding option on the grinder but because your grinder wasn’t a high-performing one and as a result a recognizable portion of beans came out to be fine-ground, using the Brewdo filter more carefully would suffice. Carefully pour the brewed liquid to a container so that the sunken particles do not mix. Wait at least 10 minutes before drinking. Depending on the grinder, you might need to remove half a spoon of coffee.

  1. Prepare Brewdo
  2. Pour ground coffee with water in a plastic bottle. Refer to the recipe in the app.
  3. Close the lid and shake well. Put the bottle in the refrigerator.
  4. After coffee has been infused well, take out the bottle and put the Brewdo filter into the bottle. Then, pour the drink out slowly to a container.
  5. Enjoy the coffee at your leisure.

Tip.

If you have selected coarse-ground or medium-ground for the grinding option on the grinder but because your grinder wasn’t a high-performing one and as a result a recognizable portion of beans came out to be fine-ground, using the Brewdo filter more carefully would suffice. Carefully pour the brewed liquid to a container so that the sunken particles do not mix. Wait at least 10 minutes before drinking. Depending on the grinder, you might need to remove half a spoon of coffee.

 

 

The simplest and the most innovative cold brew coffee filter. That is Brewdo. Anyone can use Brewdo to make as much excellent cold brew coffee as one wants. Because I love coffee very much, I tried to come up with different ways to brew cold brew coffee before the cold brew took off. 

When cold brew became really popular in Korea and all the major coffee franchises adopted the cold brew coffee, I tried it at many different coffee shops. Some cold brew from few franchises had great taste. But most of them were really bad. Thus, it fueled my passion to make the cold brew myself with all the knowledge about cold brew I accumulated.

Korea has its unique culture of being affectionate with people.

I wanted to serve many people with this amazing taste of cold brew coffee, and I thought that it would be convenient for me to make it at home instead of constantly buying it.

Through the years of experience, I discovered that using the tool when the brewing has stopped produces better and deeper flavor than using the tool while brewing. As a result, I conceived the idea of Brewdo not as an ordinary brewer but rather something to use after brewing is done.  

After undergoing several trials and errors, I came to a solidified idea of brewing and the shapes of the brewing stopper. I showed my plans and ideas to our team members, and they gave very positive feedback. That is how Brewdo began, and it enhanced technically and aesthetically as we added more improvements and sharpened ideas.

I encountered many cold brewing tools, and there are two main brewing methodologies for cold brew in the market: slow-drip (Kyoto-style or traditional Dutch style) and American Dutch style.

Slow-Drip methodology is probably the most common methodology one can find in the market. As most traditional cold brew coffee is produced through this method, the slow dripper metes out water so that for every drop that falls onto the saturated grounds, a drop of coffee spirals down the hand-blown glass tubes into the waiting carafe. Although the process takes hours to produce coffee, the machine and the process is indeed eye-grabbing. American Dutch methodology is simpler than the traditional Dutch method in the sense that the American-Dutch brewer is much smaller and easier to use. However, you do still need to purchase a specially-designed American Dutch brewer set. That is the biggest disadvantage of the American Dutch making. It is comparably still expensive, and since there is only one set users have to wait until finished using that one and therefore cannot mass-produce cold brew. This is where the efficiency and the differentiation of Brewdo come in. Whereas users have to purchase a special set piece of American Dutch brewer, you only need to buy a small yet effective Brewdo filter and attach it to the plastic bottle opening. The more plastic bottles you have, the more you can produce as much cold brew as you would like.

All you have to do is put the coffee ground into the plastic bottles and mix with water and let them sit in the refrigerator for hours. Then, take them out and attach the Brewdo filter and enjoy the coffee! There is no other technology like Brewdo that are out in the market. It is indeed innovative and cost-effecitve!

 

In the end, all the tools that are in the market are the ones to use while brewing.

Brewdo is the only brewing product in the world for using it when the brewing has stopped.

Technically it can be classified as under American Dutch methodology, but the operating methods are the obverse of the American Dutch making.  

American Dutch brewing methodology has become more simpler and suitable for use compared to the traditional Dutch method. Yet, the critical disadvantage of American Dutch style is that you can only use one dripper.

 Because of this, users have to wait a long time to before brewing again.  However, Brewdo uses regular plastic bottles that can be found everywhere. Therefore, anybody can easily mass-produce cold brew coffee. Moreover, because users only use Brewdo the moment brewing has stopped and filter out the coffee grounds after brewing is over, they can conveniently enjoy great taste of cold brew at their leisure.

Users can simply think that they can use just any plastic bottle and use regular paper filters to brew cold brew coffee. Yet, what differentiates Brewdo from the rest lies in its filtering technology.

After going through various different experiments trying different brewing styles such as using needle extract set, hybrid-form paper cup filter, and American Dutch style filtering, we have learned two groundbreaking facts: coffee tastes better through using traditional Dutch brewing method and the taste depends heavily on which filter users pour out through after coffee has been brewed.

To actualize our conceptions, we have gone through multiple different trials and experimentations.

After many trials and errors, finally came the masterpiece. Brewdo

Brewdo uses a filtering technology when brewing is done. Although users may think that Brewdo’s filter size looks small, the coffee grounds that sink to the bottom due to gravity stays in the bottom even after pouring out the coffee. (If you want to filter out the entire coffee grounds in the bottle, you may need a gigantic size coffee filter.) Because not every coffee ground is the subject of filtering, Brewdo filters are therefore very efficient because of its small size yet great filtering. Furthermore, Brewdo filters are unlike any other paper filters that users will feel the telling difference between the coffees poured through Brewdo filters versus other regular paper filters.

People who are not regular coffee drinkers would clearly tell the difference. Directions on how to use are also very simple. In the plastic bottle, pour coffee and water and brew. Afterwards, simply pour through Brewdo filters. You can at anywhere and anytime enjoy fresh cold brew coffee with your family and friends.

By the time we were almost done with finalizing our plan, we wanted to share all the recipes, types of coffee beans that perfectly suit for Brewdo and of roasting, and various conditions of brewing (brewing in the room temperature, brewing in the refrigerator, etc) with Brewdo users. As a result, we decided to publish an app to conveniently share all of our knowledge.

Brewdo app provides the perfect type of cold brew recipe and informs the right ingredient requirements necessary to make cold brew coffee for the “x” number of people users want to serve. It has convenient formats that anyone regardless of coffee knowledge can use.

When you open the app, you will make certain selections and the app will provide you with the recipe and the timer. You don’t need to really worry about anything when it comes to making good cold brew. If you have a large refrigerator, you could possibly serve even 1000 people using our proprietary Brewdo technology.

 

The New Innovative Way of Making Cold Brew

If you are the coffee shop owner, you would want to adopt our methodology.

It only takes a couple tries for you to thoroughly understand how to use it. Once you grasp it, you can make the best use of it and provide the telling enjoyable experience to your customers. You will recognize the unfathomable potential this little device can have once you begin to use it. It is the best commercial cold brew maker (commercial brewery machine).

 

1.How does Brewdo provide a deeper and more elegant taste of cold brew coffee than the traditional coffee brewed through Dutch method? 

  • Using the American Dutch brewing methodology contributes a lot in enhancing the taste of the coffee. Plus, the one of a kind filtering technology that Brewdo filters provide is indeed a game changer that it will exude and preserve the delicate scent and the taste. (shaking the bottle during brewing will make the taste more profound) 
  • With Brewdo technology, users can more easily control the coffee taste and scent. 
  • There are factors such as organic acid, fatty acid, tannin that determine the taste. With Brewdo technology, users can control these factors easier through brewing. 
  • The more you use it, the better you become at using Brewdo to make better tastes of cold brew. 

2.Don’t know much about the recipe? 

  • You don’t really need to know the recipe because the Brewdo app is always there on hand. 
  • The Brewdo app contains all the know-hows especially on various cold brew flavors that our team has accumulated over the years. 
  • App provides a variety of different brewing recipe for cold brew. Each recipe has its own unique taste that will capture your minds. 
  • “It’s not because you fall in love, your heart beats faster. You fall in love because your heart beats faster. Therefore, it is crucial that you make your loved one’s heart beats faster through providing the amazing coffee taste and aroma scent.” – Brewdo APP (Available on IOS, Android) 
  • Principle of the recipe is science-based. However, you can put aside the science behind recipe for the time being and just enjoy the mesmerizing taste of our Brewdo coffee.  

If you aren’t sure about funding for Brewdo, try first using the Brewdo app. 
You will discover so much about the different cold brew tastes and scents that you didn’t even realize exist. If you open the app, you will immediately realize our firm passion on our Brewdo cold brew.  

 

 


 

            

 

 

Brewdo Cold Brew filter is incredibly easy to use. Follow the instruction below.

story:
Aidez-nous à donner accès à Morgane à la physiothérapie dont elle a besoin! Suite à son opération pour enlever la raideur dans sa jambe, nous organisons un souper bénéfice pour nous aider à financer sa réadaptation. Au menu: Spectacle de magie, maquillage pour enfants, encan silencieux et plus!

3 février 2018 au Centre Durocher
680 rue Raoul-Jobin, salle 102

17h30: Accueil
18h: Souper
19h: Spectacle de magie
20h: Résultats de l'encan silencieux

Pour les pâtes, un choix de sauce à la viande ou végétalienne vous est offert. Nous vous contacterons par courriel pour connaître votre choix ainsi que pour confirmer le nombre d'adultes et d'enfants pour lesquels vous avez acheté des billets.

Des boissons alcoolisées et autres breuvages seront vendus sur place.

Les billets coûteront 17$ par adulte et 7,50$ par enfant à partir du 22 décembre. Vente en ligne seulement. Aucun billet ne sera vendu sur place.

Nous vous attendons! 
Un grand MERCI pour votre participation.

story:
Who we are...

We are a married partnership between the brains (her) and the brawn (him).  We have a passion to bring Mead to the regional and national level shared by craft beers and hand-crafted wines.  Working with this vision in mind we are focused on natural honey with no additives to be used as the base so that we can help our local bee keepers and their efforts to keep the honey bee healthy and thriving.  We envision using a percentage of our sales to help preserve and benefit bee keepers and protect the honey bee.

How you can help us

At the present we have the drive and determination to make this vision a reality.  With 20 years in retail management and customer service experience, the proprietors will be ready and able to hit the ground running and develop a space for mead making and tasting in the Asheville area craft beverage scene.  The mead produced will be high quality and affordable to ensure success within the already vibrant community.  

What Will We Do With the Money You Give?

  • Buy equipment for the production of mead:  fermenters, sanitation supplies, HONEY, and other brewing sundries
  • Build a refrigerated chill room for the mead
  • Furnish the bar – tables, chairs, bar equipment
  • Plates, glasses, silverware, Point of Sale system
  • Signage

story:
Habte's mission is to empower boba lovers like you with the technology to give you the freedom to enjoy the drink you love exactly the way you deserve it, on your own terms! Right now there's an abundance of coffee and espresso makers on the market, but there's no convenient at home solution for making boba. Whether you're a boba addict who needs to save money, a tea drinker that wants to spice up their life, or a hungry hippo who wants a little more fun: Habte's for you :)

Our Commitment to Qualitea

Since this has never been done before, the sky is the limit! We have the opportunity to let you set the bar. This means that topping options don’t stop at boba or fruity boba or mini boba, we intend to fulfill the entire scope of your boba needs.  Ultimately, we’re committed to designing product aligned with the company vision for the future of Boba while also retaining the cultural authenticity of the craft.

Wondering Which Model is for You?

The aim with two models is to cover the entire range of boba drinks in the most convenient way possible. Both models have a boba boiler and tea infuser with the differentiator being the individual blender in the Elite and the milk steamer in the Lite.

The Habte Lite is ideal for someone who only wants hot/iced teas and milk teas while the Habte Elite is equipped with an individual blender to service boba smoothies, blended teas, milkshakes etc. 

 

Hot water pours in allowing the tea to steep in the infusing position with the bottom of the vessel plugged. Then, the tea infuser lifts up for the tea to strain through (this elevated position should also be ideal for drip coffee). We strive for sustainability at every stage, so it's likely that any loose tea leaves would be compatible with the reusable filter, but don't worry Habte has you covered! We'll also formulate tea blends according to backer interest. However, we would need to prepackage some of the messier drinks, such as coffee/matcha/taro, in filters or pods to facilitate cleanup.

 

Why Kickstarter?

Habte’s relying on backers with Boba Clout for feedback at every stage:

  • Do you want a boba and tea subscription service to accompany Habte? 
  • Do you need Habte for more decaf options? 
  • Are blended and iced coffee solutions a priority for you? 
  • What colourways would you prefer?
  • What are your favorite boba toppings? Your favorite tea flavors?
  • Do you plan on using Habte at home or do you plan on taking it to the office, or to college?

We’ll keep up communication throughout the campaign and beyond through surveys, email newsletters, videos and our instagram @HABTEusa

 

This is just a sample of the infinite drink combinations at your fingertips. With a Habte you can truly let your inner creative run wild without the worries of being charged for your endless add-ons or wacky drink combinations. 

 

Endless Possibilities

Host a party with boba mixed drinks in your dorm room! Break up the monotony at the office with blended matcha drinks instead of the usual drip. Buy a Habte for the whole family, boba slushies for the kids, green tea and smoothies for mom and dad!

 

Don't let the fact that Habte's launching in concept phase deter you! The reasoning behind it is that the budget will allow us to scale now vs later and accelerate through every stage from prototyping to shipping. Without crowdfunding and a full team, Habte would take years to be prototyped and potentially years on top of that to finalize and manufacture. However, rest assured the design has been fleshed out through the provisional patent process, and similar tech already exists, all that's needed is to apply and adapt that to boba. The individual blender and milk steamer are fairly standard with the water transport and heating element mirroring that of a standard drip coffee maker. The boba cooker and tea infuser require some iteration, but moving forward we can reverse engineer and start with the drinks and toppings you all prioritize!

 

Budget Allocation

Over the next several months, the funds will enable Habte to do the necessary prototyping to get this off the ground. Concurrently, Habte will undergo recipe development as well as product and design quality assurance tailored to feedback received from backers like you!

 

Here's a condensed prospective timeline for the next couple of months. There’s not a lot of room for buffer, but the intention is that by setting an ambitious timeline, we’ll cultivate a sense of efficiency and constant improvement on the team! But we want to ensure the utmost quality, so ultimately the shipping date could fall later than expected.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We chose fixed funding rather than flexible funding so that the success of the campaign ensures we have enough money to fulfill every backer perk. Any delays are dependent on the volume of orders and any unforeseen issues in manufacturing, however the best way to facilitate our ambitious timeline and overcome any unexpected obstacles is funding, so make sure to share the campaign with people who care!  

If you can't afford to donate, but you want Habte to exist make sure to spread the word, make noise, and check out our instagram because if we don't get to the goal, we can't make this happen!

This is just a sample of the infinite drink combinations at your fingertips. With a Habte you can truly let your inner creative run wild without the worries of being charged for your endless add-ons or wacky drink combinations.

Host a party with boba mixed drinks in your dorm room! Break up the monotony at the office with blended matcha drinks instead of the usual drip. Buy a Habte for the whole family, boba slushies for the kids, green tea and smoothies for mom and dad!

 
Don't let the fact that Habte's launching in concept phase deter you! The reasoning behind it is that the budget will allow us to scale now vs later and accelerate through every stage from prototyping to shipping. Without crowdfunding and a full team, Habte would take years to be prototyped and potentially years on top of that to finalize and manufacture. However, rest assured the design has been fleshed out through the provisional patent process, and similar tech already exists, all that's needed is to apply and adapt that to boba. The individual blender and milk steamer are fairly standard with the water transport and heating element mirroring that of a standard drip coffee maker. The boba cooker and tea infuser require some iteration, but moving forward we can reverse engineer and start with the drinks and toppings you all prioritize!
 
Budget Allocation
Over the next several months, the funds will enable Habte to do the necessary prototyping to get this off the ground. Concurrently, Habte will undergo recipe development as well as product and design quality assurance tailored to feedback received from backers like you!
 

Here's a condensed prospective timeline for the next couple of months. There’s not a lot of room for buffer, but the intention is that by setting an ambitious timeline, we’ll cultivate a sense of efficiency and constant improvement on the team! But we want to ensure the utmost quality, so ultimately the shipping date could fall later than expected.
 

 
Risks and Challenges
We chose fixed funding rather than flexible funding so that the success of the campaign ensures we have enough money to fulfill every backer perk. Any delays are dependent on the volume of orders and any unforeseen issues in manufacturing, however the best way to facilitate our ambitious timeline and overcome any unexpected obstacles is funding, so make sure to share the campaign with people who care!  
If you can't afford to donate, but you want Habte to exist make sure to spread the word, make noise, and check out our instagram because if we don't get to the goal, we can't make this happen!

story:
Take Three Chefs

Take Three Chefs is born from an idea from three Caribbean chefs, with 90 years of multicultural experience in the professional food industry. As statistics show that the African, Caribbean and Asian communities have the highest health-related issues, such as diabetes, heart disease, blood pressure, blood circulation, just to name a few.

We offer a great resource for learning to prepare healthy, nutritious meals that will help our communities to apply the things they are learning in this cooking programme in practical ways.

We are dedicated to saving lives by providing our community holistic healthy cooking information and solutions for disease prevention.

We are doing a series that will share the root causes of illness and powerful protocol that are healing people in our community.

Join us and learn how to cook and eat your way to health

1  A follow-along guide for learning cultural cooking for all the family

2  We are offering a chance for the whole community to learn more on this journey to health

3  We have  innovative and effective approaches to modern diseases prevention

4  We will be sharing our love of cooking with the community

As a backer of our crowdfunding campaign, you will have the opportunity to tap into a combine 90 years of experience of three chefs, with a multicultural experience in the professional food industry.

story:
Short Summary:

  • Drink tumblers have changed the way people keep their beverages hot or cold. 
  • The Cold Bottle Buddy™ is an accessory for most any brand of 20-ounce stainless steel, double walled, vacuumed sealed drink tumbler.  
  • The Cold Bottle Buddy™ will fit all drink tumblers with a top inside dimension of 3.3 inches to 3.4 inches. This includes most every brand.
  • The Cold Bottle Buddy™ will keep beer in a bottle 3 X's colder than other products. 
  • Most people already own at least one drink tumbler.
  • We invented the perfect solution to the age old problem of warm bottled beer. 
  • The Cold Bottle Buddy™ may be the "Best New Product For 2019". 

 

You Want Cold Beverages, We Need Your Support:

  • Our manufacturer is ready to accept our first order. 
  • We are running this campaign to finance our first production order. 
  • All of our product development and design is complete. 
  • We have chosen our manufacturer. 
  • We have received and approved product samples. 
  • We are now ready to place our first production order and start shipping perks and orders. 
  • Your contributions will help us launch the Cold Bottle Buddy™ while receiving a great perk of up to 33% off our regular price. 
  • All perks will be shipped April, 2019, just in time to keep your beer cold all summer long. 

 

Cold Retention Test:

  • Over a 90 minute period, a bottled beverage using the Cold Bottle Buddy™ increased in temperature only 8 degrees Fahrenheit. 

           

 

 

Status of our Product:

  • Research and development of the Cold Bottle Buddy™  is complete.
  • Prototypes have been produced and work perfectly. 
  • Molds for the Cold Bottle Buddy™ have been made and are samples produced. 
  • All samples have been received and have been approved for production. 
  • We are working with our manufacturer who is ready to accept our first order.

story:
Who the heck are you?

so you want to know who we are and why we should be allowed to take your money?

  • We are a couple of passionate home brewers who want to take the plunge in the the deep and treacherous waters of big buisness and professional mead making.
  • We want to take our product to a national and eventualy international level, we have been home brewing for ten years, we know our product is good and we want all of you to know it too.
  • With your help we will be able to pay the rent on our premises and upgrade our equipent to increase the amount of sweet golden mead that will flow from our doors to your off license

 

Why should i give you my cash & What do i get out of it?

  • Mead takes time to ferment, so after launch we will be bringing in loads of expensive honey and getting no cash back for months. Your help (cash) will enable us to keep the lights on and the bees buzzing during this time.
  • You dont need to do this for nothing, we will offer you a logoed keyring an awesome t-shirt that is currently being designed just for you guys and share our special reserve first batch with you and if you give us enough we will even give you a lovely glass to drink it from.
  • Even if we dont reach our goal every little helps, anything you give us will help us keep going through the difficult first few months.

 

Sorry buddy, can't afford it

Dont worry about it, just spread the word and send more people this way, we would apreciate it more than you could know.
