story:
DiversiTea: Data-Driven Tea Recommendations Just For You

DiversiTea is a Sheffield based business that was established in 2017 by Ted Kim and James Home. We started as a premium curated tea subscription service. DiversiTea sourced and packages fresh loose leaf teas every month with each box themed. For example, in May 2018, we themed our box "May the fourth be with you" inspired by the characters in the famous movie. 

(DiversiTea at Sheffield Food Festival 2018)

After 1+ year of running the business, many customer feedback from our previous sales indicated the wide demand for the personalisation service. Some wanted non-caffeinated tea with grassy and nutty flavour, and some wanted a tea that is great to brew in cold water with a fruity flavour. This led DiversiTea on a mission to transform customers' tea experience by devising a data-driven tea recommendation system. Truly, DiversiTea is for someone with particular taste.

(We went to different market stalls to get feedbacks!)

Currently, we have been developing for our recommendation system for months. We have participated in Sheffield Innovation Programme in order to define the basic tea ontology, which is supported by the Sheffield City Region Growth Hub, European Regional Development Fund and Sheffield Hallam University. This has been built through and we want to exclusively test it with the backers in Indiegogo!

(Ontology session at Sheffield Hallam University)

 

We need your help to transform the monotonous tea experience to a colourful one!

The individual backer will receive a unique link to a short questionnaire.  When submitted, DiversiTea will analyse your preference in order to recommend the perfect four teas suit your taste. The teas will be carefully hand-packed in individual tin cases. In total, you will be able to enjoy teas around 30 cups. 

We would initially need more than 50 different people to test our recommendation system. The minimum funding we need is, therefore, 1,000 GBP. Through this, we could modify and change our questionnaires and algorithm. ​

 

(Four different types of tea will be delivered)

 

What people are saying

"Absolutely stunning service & really lovely tea" - Lesley Pyne

"Always easy to deal with and the tea is so good" - Debbie Harkness

"Amazing! Absolutely perfect tea and fast shipping!" - Hande Musullulu

"It was incredible. Shockingly so and I am still coming down from it..." - Emma Peel

 

(Feedback from Instagram @diversiteabox & #diversiteabox)

 

Timeline

Team

Ted Kim (CEO/Founder) graduated from the University of Sheffield, LLB (Hons) Law (European and International) in 2016. He successfully led a student based organisation for three years and was involved in working with different companies and organisations in the business development/sales/marketing position. Ted has been designing the box and curating the teas for different themes and collaborations. He was actively involved in developing a business partnership with different brands and sales.

James Home (CTO/Founder) graduated from the Sheffield Hallam University, BSc (Hons) Network Management in 2013. He then contracted as a technology consultant, including working for the United Nations’ World Food Programme for two years. James has been designing and developing the website and leading other technology-related activities.

(DiversiTea's two founders: Ted Kim and James Home)

 

Thank You

We would like to thank you for all the support that we received.

Special thanks to our mentors Darren Chouings, Monica Yunkyoung Cho and Bongho Lee.

Also, to our contributors Eve Cossack and Kayla Kim.

Enjoy your brew ;)

Ted and James from DiversiTea team!

story:
A better coffee for a better you.

Coffee+ starts with Organic Arabica Coffee that we enhance with essential vitamins and minerals as well as probiotics and functional mushrooms. The result is an easy-to-make, delicious cup of coffee with...

  • More Energy & Focus° – 33% less caffeine than an ol' cup of coffee
  • Faster Mornings – One scoop quickly (and completely) dissolves in warm water
  • Complete Your Diet – Fill the gaps with the essential vitamins and minerals to start your day

Coffee+ starts your day fast and keeps your fast going.

 

I need a better way, so I'm starting Better Day.

My name is Justin Root. In my mid-20s, I went for an annual physical and tipped the scale at 260 pounds. My doctor checked my blood pressure and began sharing the pros and cons of different hypertension options. I was shocked I could be in such bad health during – what was supposed to be – the prime years of my life. I also didn't want a daily dependency on a pill, so my doctor told me to lose weight.

Turns out, that’s much easier said than done.

I dove into research, but all the conflicting information was overwhelming. I read books, experimented and enrolled in nutrition and food courses, including exercise nutrition, plant-based nutrition and permaculture design. In the end, I found intermittent fasting and eating more whole food plants did the trick. I lost more than 50 pounds.

On my wellness journey, I learned the value of supplementing with vitamins, minerals and key nutrients, but I quickly became frustrated with the number of pills to take and the confusion around what supplements are supposed to be consumed when and in what dosages. I decided a better way would be to incorporate the supplements I need, at the time of day I need them into things I already enjoy – like organic coffee. Just like that, my better way became Better Day. I call my new coffee: Coffee+

Coffee+ is a better way to start your day. Coffee+ started as a little recipe I created to drink all my vitamins and minerals while I fasted. Then, it became a gift to share with my friends and family. When they all loved it, I decided to bring it here for you to consider. I perfected the formula and sourced a supplier to take my little batches to full-scale awesomeness. I've worked with these folks before on other projects. They're a dependable group.

Now, I just need your support. This amazing coffee is so helpful with my wellness journey, and I'd love to share it with you!

 

If...

  • You are tired in the morning
  • You are confused about supplements or tired of gobbling down handfuls of supplements all day
  • You are intermittent fasting and need a better way to fast without getting tired and feeling hungry all the time

 

…then Coffee+ is the perfect solution for you.

 

Here's why:

Boost from B Vitamins – Nearly 1 out of 5 Americans have a borderline B12 deficiency, according to The National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey, so we added a dose of B Vitamins to help you cover your daily needs. B-Vitamins can help support your energy at a cellular level.°

Probiotics For Gut Health – Up to 80% of your immune system resides in your digestive tract, and your gut relies on a diverse population of 100,000,000,000,000 microbial cells (that's not a typo it's 100 trillion cells) called the microbiome to function. Probiotics – a.k.a. gut microbes – can help support your microbiome,° so we've added a blend of our favorite probiotics and enzymes for gut health.

Mushroom Unlock History's Secrets° – In cultures around the world, ancient healing traditions relied on the unique properties of mushrooms – a.k.a fungi – to support health and human performance. We've selected two of our favorites for Coffee+: Chaga & Cordyceps. Chaga is an antioxidant powerhouse that is used in Russian and Norwegian folk medicine for immune support.°° Cordyceps is native to the high-altitudes of the Himalayas and is an all-star of traditional Chinese medicine for more than a 1,000 years. Cordyceps is recognized for its energy-boosting abilities by increasing ATP (cellular energy) levels in the body.

And all of this is on top of the great benefits organic coffee already offers your health!

 

Let's all help each other like we're ol' friends

We simply need to presell enough Coffee+ to place our first order. Then, 90 days later, we can start shipping our Coffee+ for all of us to enjoy and feel better every day. Everyone, so far, loves Coffee+, but since I can't send a bajillion samples to every person, I want to make this as low risk as possible for you. I'm starting the prices for Coffee+ ridiculously low. It's more important for me to get this to you than it is to make money.

If you're personally not interested in Coffee+, I get it. No sweat, but we could still use your help :). I'm doing this campaign on a shoe-string budget, so if you could just tell a friend (or 2...or 3... or a baker's dozen) whom might be interested in Coffee plus, I would super-duper appreciate it and love you forever.

Cheers!

- J. Root

 

Thank you so much for your time, consideration and support! I'm excited to share Coffee+ with you.

--

°These statements have not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

story:
What this Campaign Means to Us

Hi, I’m Chris, Co-owner and Chef of Gentleman Farmer. I just wanted to introduce myself and tell you the gist of our campaign before we get into the nitty gritty. We are a small, high-end food company that does not compromise our all-natural and fresh approach to food products. Because of this, we need backers like you to help us expand our production line so that we can start to compete with the big companies that do things cheap and fast. Check out our story, what we’ll do with the funding and of course our awesome perks. Cheers!

 

Our Story

It all started on a dying avocado grove. Not sure if you know this, but the avocados you eat that are California grown are not supposed to be here. They’re sub-tropical and each tree requires about 400 gallons of water each week! That’s why they are so expensive. I (Chris) was brought in to create alternative income for the farm to keep the water on.

Historically, Southern California grew peppers and tomatoes. Add to that the fact that I’ve been cooking since childhood and in my spare time I used to cook competitively. Hmmmm, a climate for peppers and tomatoes… my love for the kitchen… it just came together and evolved into Gentleman Farmer.

With backing from my best friend and a personal history as a health professional we created a no-nonsense, all natural and premium line of products. We take hot sauce to a new, culinary inspired level… and it shows. In just two years we have won 8 separate awards for our sauces including 6 Scovie’s (The largest international hot sauce competition in the world).

Every day we surprise our customers with what a hot sauce can truly be and have even converted people who thought they were not sauce people. Now it’s time to grow out of San Diego and get into a store near you. With backing, we can fund the purchase of bottling machines that will help us increase our production, lower the per bottle cost so that we can reach more people and most importantly grow our company without having to sacrifice our Ultra-Premium guarantee.

ULTRA PREMIUM GUARANTEE

All of our sauces start with fresh

ingredients that we prepare by

hand for each batch. We take the

time to maximize the flavor

potential of each ingredient

whether that means roasting

certain peppers, caramelizing

onions or waiting for an ingredient

to fully ripen. We do not use

thickeners to make a water or

vinegar based sauce appear

thicker. We do not hold back when

choosing rare or expensive

ingredients. We do what it takes to

create a sauce that you will love.

 

What Your Funding Does and How We’ll Thank You

Any little bit helps. This is why we have chosen an open funding campaign.  We have been in business for just over 2 years (Dec 7th was our Birthday!) However, to keep our quality, unique flavors and not compromise the whole foods that go into our sauce we need a boost. To get into supermarkets we need to have a low… LOW price so that distributors and the stores can all get their cut. Our products use fresh, high quality ingredients and we spend a great deal of time with the process itself. Hand processing all the ingredients is expensive. The only way around this is to make the bottling process faster and easier. Your funding will help purchase;

  • Inkjet lot coder; this little printer is quite pricey.
  • Shrink wrap tunnel; not super pricey but man will it save us time and from carpal tunnel.
  • Labeling machine: you don’t want to see how it’s done now!
  • A second bottle filler that will double our productivity.
  • These four combined allow us to buy in bulk and produce in larger quantities which lowers our production cost significantly. In a market that is skewed to benefit the big boys, we’ll get a fighting chance.
  • Anything over our $20,000 target AND…
  • We’ll start work on our secret spicy bacon jerky. The recipe is done. Just need funds for graphic design and bulk purchase of the packaging.
  • At our small scale, research and development is expensive. With additional funding and after the bacon we have plenty of hot sauce, mustard and BBQ sauces lined up including a spicy salad dressing that we are all very excited about.

PERKS!

Of course… Tons of excellent, award winning sauces including flavors that you’ve never seen before. The bigger perks include VIP tickets to hot sauce festivals and even air fair and hotel! We’re also creating a set of add-on perks that include products not part of this campaign like our blue-ribbon BBQ and our European style strong mustard.

Your Impact

Not only are you supporting a small business which is core to our economy and something that a lot of people dream about, but you’ll also be creating jobs. As we grow, we’ll have to start hiring employees and what we say about our sauce is true for the whole company. That means fair pay and practices, treating people with respect and helping everyone grow to achieve their goals even if that doesn’t end with us.

Not Able to Back?

Are you a saucy person just not able to back? That’s OK. Help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with other sauce lovers. Indiegogo has share tools. You can also sign up for our newsletters on our website or follow us on IG.

Web: www.gentlemanfarmer.co

IG: @gentlemanfarmersauces

 

Side Note: The sauce company grew faster than we could learn to farm so we have separated since and now run Gentleman Farmer exclusively. But no worries. We set up an Air BnB and other sources of income, so the trees are doing fine. Also, if you have checked out our website; yes, we do more than just hot sauce. We actually have a cult following for our BBQ and Mustard, but these require different bottling techniques and we choose to focus growth on the hot sauce line. Cheers!

 

Does your perk include a custom Tee? They will be made exclusively for this campaign. Check out the bottles below for the names and associated artwork.
story_txt:
What this Campaign Means to UsHi, I’m Chris, Co-owner and Chef of Gentleman Farmer. I just wanted to introduce myself and tell you the gist of our campaign before we get into the nitty gritty. We are a small, high-end food company that does not compromise our all-natural and fresh approach to food products. Because of this, we need backers like you to help us expand our production line so that we can start to compete with the big companies that do things cheap and fast. Check out our story, what we’ll do with the funding and of course our awesome perks. Cheers! Our StoryIt all started on a dying avocado grove. Not sure if you know this, but the avocados you eat that are California grown are not supposed to be here. They’re sub-tropical and each tree requires about 400 gallons of water each week! That’s why they are so expensive. I (Chris) was brought in to create alternative income for the farm to keep the water on.Historically, Southern California grew peppers and tomatoes. Add to that the fact that I’ve been cooking since childhood and in my spare time I used to cook competitively. Hmmmm, a climate for peppers and tomatoes… my love for the kitchen… it just came together and evolved into Gentleman Farmer.With backing from my best friend and a personal history as a health professional we created a no-nonsense, all natural and premium line of products. We take hot sauce to a new, culinary inspired level… and it shows. In just two years we have won 8 separate awards for our sauces including 6 Scovie’s (The largest international hot sauce competition in the world).Every day we surprise our customers with what a hot sauce can truly be and have even converted people who thought they were not sauce people. Now it’s time to grow out of San Diego and get into a store near you. With backing, we can fund the purchase of bottling machines that will help us increase our production, lower the per bottle cost so that we can reach more people and most importantly grow our company without having to sacrifice our Ultra-Premium guarantee.ULTRA PREMIUM GUARANTEEAll of our sauces start with freshingredients that we prepare byhand for each batch. We take thetime to maximize the flavorpotential of each ingredientwhether that means roastingcertain peppers, caramelizingonions or waiting for an ingredientto fully ripen. We do not usethickeners to make a water orvinegar based sauce appearthicker. We do not hold back whenchoosing rare or expensiveingredients. We do what it takes tocreate a sauce that you will love. What Your Funding Does and How We’ll Thank YouAny little bit helps. This is why we have chosen an open funding campaign.  We have been in business for just over 2 years (Dec 7th was our Birthday!) However, to keep our quality, unique flavors and not compromise the whole foods that go into our sauce we need a boost. To get into supermarkets we need to have a low… LOW price so that distributors and the stores can all get their cut. Our products use fresh, high quality ingredients and we spend a great deal of time with the process itself. Hand processing all the ingredients is expensive. The only way around this is to make the bottling process faster and easier. Your funding will help purchase;
Inkjet lot coder; this little printer is quite pricey.
Shrink wrap tunnel; not super pricey but man will it save us time and from carpal tunnel.
Labeling machine: you don’t want to see how it’s done now!
A second bottle filler that will double our productivity.
These four combined allow us to buy in bulk and produce in larger quantities which lowers our production cost significantly. In a market that is skewed to benefit the big boys, we’ll get a fighting chance.
Anything over our $20,000 target AND…
We’ll start work on our secret spicy bacon jerky. The recipe is done. Just need funds for graphic design and bulk purchase of the packaging.
At our small scale, research and development is expensive. With additional funding and after the bacon we have plenty of hot sauce, mustard and BBQ sauces lined up including a spicy salad dressing that we are all very excited about.
PERKS!Of course… Tons of excellent, award winning sauces including flavors that you’ve never seen before. The bigger perks include VIP tickets to hot sauce festivals and even air fair and hotel! We’re also creating a set of add-on perks that include products not part of this campaign like our blue-ribbon BBQ and our European style strong mustard.Your ImpactNot only are you supporting a small business which is core to our economy and something that a lot of people dream about, but you’ll also be creating jobs. As we grow, we’ll have to start hiring employees and what we say about our sauce is true for the whole company. That means fair pay and practices, treating people with respect and helping everyone grow to achieve their goals even if that doesn’t end with us.Not Able to Back?Are you a saucy person just not able to back? That’s OK. Help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with other sauce lovers. Indiegogo has share tools. You can also sign up for our newsletters on our website or follow us on IG.Web: www.gentlemanfarmer.coIG: @gentlemanfarmersauces Side Note: The sauce company grew faster than we could learn to farm so we have separated since and now run Gentleman Farmer exclusively. But no worries. We set up an Air BnB and other sources of income, so the trees are doing fine. Also, if you have checked out our website; yes, we do more than just hot sauce. We actually have a cult following for our BBQ and Mustard, but these require different bottling techniques and we choose to focus growth on the hot sauce line. Cheers! Does your perk include a custom Tee? They will be made exclusively for this campaign. Check out the bottles below for the names and associated artwork.

story:
We have moved to St. Croix, USVI to build our Brewery and Brew Pub we use 100% Tropical Fruit grown on St. Croix for our Craft Beer. Our beautiful Two Fat Chicks Tropical Micro Brew Pub is warm and inviting. In our building we have Restaurant Service and a beautiful Live Entertainment Venue in our Magical Courtyard with bar inside and out. We are located in a beautiful historic building in downtown Frederiksted overlooking the ocean near the Cruise Pier. We have already brewed our signature Two Fat Chicks Tropical Craft Beer but quickly found that we need to move up to a much larger brewing system because of the daily requests for our beer. This is where we need your help, we want to buy new  bigger brewing equipment to expand production in our beautiful Stone Brew Room. Professional Bottling Equipment, New Tap System and Supplies for the Expansion.

This is where this beautiful beer has its start. Help us crowdfund the best tastiest and fruitiest beer you have ever had with lush tropical flavors never before seen in the beer market. We  have a fresh approach to your regular humdrum malt beverages, using fresh fruit grown for us on local farms we support local farmers. Two Fat Chicks Tropical Craft Beer will be featuring tropical fruit flavors that have never been done. Each month we will have a limited edition Two Fat Chicks Pirates Brew that will have limited runs that will be available only in our Brew Pub, local bars, and restaurants. The plan was to start small doing small craft batches for bottling and small kegs for distribution to local bars and restaurants in the  Caribbean  and then to expand to larger brewing facilities for national distribution.  We will be a destination stop in St. Croix hosting beer lovers to come tour our brewery and host Beer Tasting Events.

We are also  branching into  private labeling for other smaller Craft Beer Companies in the second phase of this Indiegogo campaign we already have some accounts lined up. Soon we will be announcing some of our new partnerships for private labeling. We plan to give back 3% of our profits for charities that help young single Moms with Quality Childcare and the Education to succeed in life. Through education and job training we can give them back their hope for a bright future for them and their kids. Get ready for the swag available for crowdfunding. Ready for permanent resting Beach Face!

Our Plan

Raise money for Larger Brewing System

Move forward with production for distrubution

National Distrubution

Advertising and working Capital for newest addition.

story:
Designed for a digital lifestyle, *LuBox is the future of all lunch box . Our goal with *LuBox was to do the impossible: engineer a full‑size experience into the lightest and most compact food container ever. That meant re imagining every element to make it not only lighter and thinner lunch box but also better. The result is more than just a Lunch Box. It’s the future of the Lunch Box. We improved performance, more storage, and up to 10 hours of battery life,*LuBox is even more capable.

Enjoy  your meal anytime at ideal temperature  

It has been rightly said healthy and hygienic meal always keeps you away from doctor. 

Due to hectic life and tremendous work pressure it has become important for us to keep ourself healthy and hygienic.

HOW DOES THIS WORK 

LuBox is easy to operate: simply fill with yummy dish and connect it to a power supply like wall  adapter, Laptop USB. Within 5-10 minutes the LuBox will reach to desire temperature that you have set.

Inbuild LED light indicator allows you know that your meal is ready to eat. It changes colour as the change of temperature inside. 

We have developed a special system that helps to prevent leakage even during transportation or tilting. The heat then spreads evenly on the surface of the tray. When Lubox will get over heated then extra heat exhaust from the tiny holes build in fan back side of box, and maintained the temperature.

Lubox is connect with your mobile via bluetooth. You can control from remote place also. 

HEATING MECHANISM 

The Lubox's heating technology is elegantly built-in between the inner and outer walls of the container. Its interface is made up of clever, press and subtle light indicators to let you know when your food is just right. It is wirelessly powered by setting it onto it's compact, USB-powered side panel, so you can use it anywhere. To save valuable space for food and extend it’s lifespan, the *LuBox has chargeable battery build inside. 

 

Once you've selected your perfect temperature, and watch it light up. 

If your food is hotter than the temperature you chose, it will glow RED. 

If it is colder, it will glow BLUE. 

When the*LuBox’s base glows ORANGE, its just right. Enjoy.

CHARGE *LuBox WITH ANY POWER SOURCE 

Just plug in your *LuBox. You can use your laptop, any power outlet . These multiple possibility   of different charging source give you ultimate flexibility in choosing time and place of your meal consumption.

Once it gets charged fully it will back up heating process for 10 hours .

USB Charging Ports

Charge your * LuBox lunch box and it will stand minimum 10 hours 

Allows you to Charge your Mobile while you are enjoying your meal

 

*LuBox is designed for Your Connected Lifestyles

 
 
 
 

FOOD TRAY

The brilliant-quality, reusable inner tray makes transport and storage easy, compartment has been designed keeping in eye the daily need of your food. The non sticky  inner surface is easy to wash. Tray can we use separately as it is removable. 

 
 
 
 
 

KNOW MORE ABOUT  *LuBoX DETAILS 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION  

We set out to create the future of lunch box but we also wanted the *LuBox to stand on its own as a sleek and beautiful design AND IT IS EASY TO USE IN ALL SCENARIOS 

It is designed to complement your lifestyle and your daily life living. 

Here are the final product dimensions and specifications. 

 
  • Dimension (LWH) :300 mm (30 cm) x 220mm (22cm) x 55mm(5.5cm)
  • Weight : 600gm/0.600kg 
  • Volume: 500ml 
  • Voltage: 9W ( 5V 1.8 A)
  • 10 Hours Battery Back Up
  • Led light temperature indicator
  • Beep Sound Alert
  • Temperature Sensors
  • Aluminum Containers 
  • On/Off  Pad button
  • Smartphone App (Android & iOS) 
  • Bluetooth Connectivity
  • High Temperature  80 degree C 

What's Included : 

  • Connect with Apps
  • 1.5 Micro USB Cables
  • 6 ft Micro USB Cables
  • USB wall Adapter

 
 
 
The *LuBox is designed to be the right size for your space. 
 

*LuBoX APP - CONNECT & START 

*LuBox comes with bluetooth connectivity features. Just connect your phone with lubox  and set the temperature program and  it will maintain the temperature  through out the day .

 Once temperature is reached to set temperature, the app automatically sense the temperature of your food from LuBox and it will send you instant notification to device.

You can also control remotely to your lunch box. 

you can see on your mobile device the battery percentage available on Lubox.

 

 

FOLLOW 6 SIMPLE STEPS TO USE *LuBoX

WHERE TO USE SCENARIOS 

You can use *LuBox anytime and anywhere. Use during your Office lunch time or you can enjoy healthy meal while having fun with your friends or family in picnic. 

During your workout time like GYM and YOGA  you can carry  * LuBox keeps your healthy and hygienic food all the time.

You can also use *LuBox at the time of travelling . 

1. OFFICE Lunch Time

2. PICNIC Party

3. GYM Time

5. YOGA Time

6. HOME Lunch Time

7. Travel Time

COLOR AVAILABILITY 

 

 

 *LuBox's STORY

The journey for developing the *LuBox was a process that was driven by our love and passion for healthy and hygienic life. Our goal was simple: bring to life an awesome heated smart lunch box  system we would be proud to use ourselves and share with our friends.

We envisioned it would be functional and an attractive conversation piece. Take a closer look at our journey with the LuBox!

 

MEETING OUR DEAD LINES

 

 

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES 

Because of its tech feature or a very complicated one production should go without major issues.

As with any first production run there might be delays caused by unforseen problems. We've taken a safe approach when we made our timeline and we'll do our best to have the products shipped as soon as possible!

Also we intend to keep you in the loop on a constant basis, sending regular updates with our progress!

WHY INDIEGOGO IN DEMAND​

Building a great product requires tremendous skills, effort and dedication. But most importantly, we need your support to help realize our vision of heated lunch box for everyone.

To propel our *LuBox project into mass production and market launch phase, we need your help. The raised funds will help account for the costs of: 

DFM (Design for manufacturing) process of the finalized product design 

Tooling, manufacturing & quality control

Sourcing material and components

Testing & safety certification (e.g. IEC, CCC, CE, UL) 

Handling and logistics    

WHOSE IDEA IS ?

Sundar Kumar , Product Designer 

I’m a young passionate designer, after year of working with some big companies, earning experience and understanding how a design gets from the drawing board to the finished product and also understand the need of consumer and giving via val solution to the consumer's need and problems.  I finally got the courage to make this big step, to create products that would make life better. This is my take on the lunchbox, and I really hope you’ll like it! My goal is to create a healthy and hygienic lunch  box that would be easy to carry and use, with an impeccable design.

story:
In one hour, an average of 320 000 disposable paper coffee cups are thrown away in one European country.

We are young people who have a goal to help our planet become greener and cleaner. We believe that together we can cope with global environmental problems , 
and if each person takes a small step, it will help in solving the problem with the environment.

 

Most people can't imagine everyday life without coffee take away. 
Some people use thermal cups, some plastic reusable cups, and some buy coffee disposable paper cups.
The "paper" coffee Cup is not really paper-it is laminated with plastic inside, which prevents the processing and recycling of such cups after use.
The world government and environmental organizations are fighting to protect the environment and ecology. Every small step on our part is a solution to the problem.

 

We offer a solution - ECO-friendly Cup made of bamboo fiber.
ECO bamboo Cup in the shape of a croissant, which will charge you with a positive mood every day.
The Cup can be your companion to the office, car or Park. The original design makes it bright and individual, just like you.
The base of the Cup is completely harmless to you and the environment.. This bamboo ECO Cup is made of organic and natural bamboo fiber, the material does not contain BPA.

 

6 reasons why you need to have your own unique ECO bamboo Cup :
1. Completely harmless to you and the environment.
2. The Cup will last a long time, provided it is used correctly.
3. Suitable even for children, because it is strong enough and has no foreign odors, and the lid helps to stay the contents inside the Cup.
4. You can choose a design for yourself that will complement your style and give pleasant emotions throughout the day.
5. Biodegradable Cup - just fill it with water, put it in organic compost and it will return to nature, where it was taken.

6. You can take this Cup with you everywhere

Not bad retains the heat of the drink and yet does not pollute the environment as usual plastic or paper cups for coffee.

How to use the Cup :
When used correctly, a bamboo cup will last 4-5 years. It is enough to wash the cup immediately after use to avoid coloring the cup from drinks.
With prolonged use of the cup, the drink may stain it. You can wash the cup in the dishwasher, and wash the lid and cover manually. Not suitable for use in the microwave.
Bamboo cup is biodegradable, the process for biodegradation will take 1-3 years. For disposal, it is enough to crush the cup with hot water and put in organic compost.
 

Our project is at the prototype stage, perhaps mass production will require additional time of about 1-3 months.

You can help our project not only financially but also by sharing this link on social networks which will allow us to find like minded people https://www.facebook.com/Bamboo-Croissant-Cup-Б...

story:
About Us!

Mr. Cory is a pint-sized entrepreneur who serves as Chief Executive Officer of Mr. Cory’s Cookies. He along with the Cookie Mom, co-founded, own and operate Mr. Cory’s Cookies, a purveyor of a huge variety of cookies. All of their delectable treats are made with all-natural, organic, high-quality ingredients (not wacky ingredients you can’t pronounce)

Mr. Cory, at age 6, with the support of this mother wanted to solve a simple challenge…commuting in bad weather.  So, Mr. Cory decided he would sell Chocolate Chip Cookies to raise money to buy his mother a car because he was tired of riding public transportation. Fast forward, the cookies are a proven hit. Today, these delicious cookies are available nationwide online and in select bakeries and Fortune 500 companies.

That said, Mr. Cory and Cookie Mom are self-taught first-generation entrepreneurs who have honed their management skills over almost a decade through trial and error. They have learned to split responsibilities and collaborate on new recipes, brand management and operations.

 

Our Campaign

As Mr. Cory’s Cookies is growing fast and our customers want the joy of smelling our cookies bake, we are reaching out to the public to help us fund our new cookie home! A place where our fans, cookie monsters, single moms and kids can find love baked in a cookie.

We have been selling cookies for almost a decade. Mr. Cory and I have been through the ups and downs in building a business and like most entrepreneurs, we still have very challenging times.  However, I am so proud of my son for dreaming six impossible things every day. Mr. Cory’s Cookies is something I never thought would exist. I was just a mother trying to survive and when our cookie hobby became a cookie business because Mr. Cory and so many other people took us seriously, I knew I had to nature nurture this moment.

We want our supporters to understand, this campaign is not only about Mr. Cory or Mr. Cory’s Cookies. It is about single moms and at-risk kids.  Our Cookie Store will create jobs, provide a safe space for kids to be kids, and be a sweet space to enjoy life with a cookie.

 

What you will help us achieve?

Mr. Cory has been an inspiration to children all over the world.  He and I continue to share the importance of nature nurturing the entrepreneurial spirits of young people.  This Store will allow that story to continue to connect, inspire, and serve as an example of what happens when you dream six impossible things.  

We are committed to our community and want to contribute to is economy at greater levels.  Englewood, New Jersey, is a highly diverse city with an unemployment rate of 4.2% compared to the state (3.3%) and nation (3.7%) unemployment rates as of July, 2019.  Our cookie store will allow us to employ several more community members.

More importantly, Our Cookie Store will allow us to continue organically growing the business, inspiring our fans while creating a destination/attraction in Englewood.  

 

Our Thank You for Your Support....                                                         

Pledge $1 or more........The Cookie Gang will send a Thank You!

Pledge $10 or more.....PERSONAL EMAIL from Cookie Gang! 

Pledge $25 or more..... EMAIL from Cookie Mom

Pledge $50 or more.....1 DOZEN FRESHLY BAKED CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES!We will send you 1 dozen cookies, freshly baked from our oven to your tummy.   (US Shipping Only)

Pledge $75 or more....PERSONAL EMAIL from Mr. Cory, 2 DOZEN FRESHLY BAKED SUGAR COOKIES!We will send you 2 dozen freshly baked Sugar Cookies via overnight shipping, straight from our oven to your tummy! (US Shipping Only)

Pledge $100 or more....2 DOZEN MIXED BATCH COOKIES, 10 Minute Facetime with Mr. Cory and a Shout out on Social Media .(US Shipping Only)

Pledge $250 or more....MR. CORY'S ASSORTMENT PACK!We will send you an assortment of 4 dozen Chocolate Chip and Creamsicle cookies; 20 Minute Facetime Video with Mr. Cory and a Shout Out on Social Media 

Pledge $500 or more....5 Dozen Mixed Batch Cookies, 30 minute FACETIME! And a Shout Out on Social Media .(US Shipping Only)

Pledge $10,000 or more....Mr. Cory at your kids or family Party! (for a group of up to 100 people) Note: Airfare, transportation and lodging not included.  10 Dozen Mixed Batch Cookies

 

Where the money goes when we reach our goal...

One of our impossible things is to have a cookie store. YOUR help will allow us open the doors for the first 3-4 months while we ramp up retail daily sales and expand our wholesale revenue streams.  The funds will be used as follows: 

Store Lease……………………..$24,000

Equipment and Buildout……….. 10,000

Marketing  & Sales……………..   2,000

Salary & Wages (3 months)…… 39,000

Store Cookie Gang (2)

Sales Account Manager (2)

Customer Service Associate (2)

If we do not reach our goal of $75,000, all funds will be returned to the donors.

 

Other Ways You Can Help...

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help: Make some noise about this campaign and let your friends and family know using the Indiegogo share tools!

 

And that's all there is to it.

Your commitment to Mr. Cory Cookies has made us feel loved all over the World!  Shout out to all our Cookie Monsters who believe in our story and what we are doing.  We want to give you a place to come see us do our thing. However, we can't make this next leap without your help. 

As I often say to my son, it’s not the man who makes the journey but rather the journey that makes the man.  Our journey has not been easy and I would not change it! Why stop? We can’t. Mr. Cory and I are committed to achieving this impossible dream.   Our hope is you are as well.

I never thought as a mother, a woman, I would be here.  I am a single mom who was once on welfare, living in shelter with my son and going through drama.  I did not let my beginning dictate the future for my son or myself.

Dream the impossible and achieve the possible.

Spread the word please and help this new chapter in our life become popping!

story:
Life Is Too Short To Eat Boring Food

My name is Ryan and I'll admit it boring food is just plain dull and flavorless. Check out the video above to learn more about my salsa story. Our company Harvest Heat is in its infancy stages, we've produced our first test production batch with a licensed co-packer and it is being presented to the FDA & FDB for batch recipe testing and approval. This includes label design approval, batch process approval, shelf-life sustainability and longevity testing. Your support of our project is very critical to our success. 

In addition to the first production salsa run, we are set to be in several specialty stores by the end of the year in 2017. We need your support to be able to launch our products into retail stores and create an online presence in a huge way.

It's Time To Bring Pizzazz and Panache Back To The Dinner Table

People need fun, hope, joy and exciting food to enjoy life to the fullest. Nothing more, no artificial ingredients, no artificial flavoring, just pure, raw, wholesome goodness. We are a grassroots organization with a zeal for life and a passion for heat and flavor. With over 100 recipes to roll out over the next 18 months, and new products in development. We are in need of several rapid cash infusions to keep up with minimum order requirements and FDA requirements.

Our goal isn't to be the biggest in the foodservice industry. Our desire is to be the best and to change corporate behaviors and attitudes.

What We Need & What You Get

 When you help to fund our campaign you are investing not only our future growth but in your own fun and flavor experience at your kitchen table.

This isn't your grandma's salsa or what you'd expect to find at your local supermarket. We know how to bring the heat.  With flavors that span from mild to extremely wild, we know you will love our fresh fruit salsas.

Our first flavor we are bringing to the market is called Pineapple Pizzazz. This medium-hot Pineapple Mango Salsa is so flavorful and compliments a wide variety of dishes from the solo chip and dipper to the fanciful chef who loves to experiment in the kitchen and make new recipes for their sphere of influence.

 
Your Generosity Gives Us The Ability To Make A Huge Impact.

The reason we need the funding is for these areas of our business launch.

Website deployment and marketing, minimum inventory order quantities. Label development and approval for every new recipe we release. FDA Testing for future batches. Each FDA test takes six to eight weeks per recipe. The cost to develop just the label concept, recipe test, nutritional test, build supplier lines and perform initial facility inspections for these manufacturers is approximate fee is $1,500 $2,000 per recipe.

Then comes the cost of manufacturing and supplies. We can only speculate based on our own research and home testing from home-based production tests. Our research for our total campaign will be used for the startup of the first 3 out of 5 recipes and the first production run of our first salsa recipe. Our goal is to sell 200 of each of the perks we are offering so we can make a huge impact in our community and the communities who support our vision.

Why Should You Support Us – Who Are We.

My name is Ryan & my wife is Teri Lynn, together with our children we want to introduce you to Harvest Heat Inc. (TM) - “The Hottest Name In The Gourmet Food Business” Our fresh fruit salsa is “Heavenly Sweet with Devilish Heat. With our line up of products, we plan to wipe out boring food and flavor deprivation forever!”

Why We Are Passionate About Our Business

Starvation does more than simply leave a stomach empty and growling, It creates problems for at least 1 in 6 Americans who are faced with hunger and starvation. In 2013, 17.5 million households were food insecure, and nearly 49 million Americans struggle to put food on the table every day. 

My wife & I were part of that statistic not too long ago. We knew a lot about hunger, and lack of access to food and water; some days we worried if we could eat at all.

When I said my wife and I faced tough times I wasn't speaking lightly. We struggled for food, water, and basic human needs at times. We fell on hard times after the recession and it took years to recover. Today it's a different story. 

From rags to real joy and satisfaction. The road wasn't easy and we aren't exactly sitting on easy street. We know the tables have been turned in our favor now. We have a chance to give back what we have been given. A hope and a future. A penchant for life, and the pursuit of its fullness. To end the flavor depravity and starvation of the spice and true essence of life.

My background is in E-commerce management, customer service, sales management, and online marketing. I also have a past in quality control, manufacturing and automation. Research and development, project management, and office management.

My wife has run her own housekeeping, and hospitality service for over 20 years. She is also passionate about animal care, and living life to it's fullest. Our manufacturing partners have been in business in California for nearly 30 years. Together we are a powerful force. Along with us, we have a team of skilled and talented colleagues to assist in the growth of our cause. With that said we need you to help us both in funding and in spreading the cause.

Let's set taste buds on fire, and create a flare for life. Success is a recipe, and there is more than one recipe for success. - (Unknown)

We want to become a household name while we teach people to eat RESPONCIOUSLY or Responsibly Conscious.

FOR YOUR GENEROSITY WE WANT TO GIVE SOMETHING BACK TO YOU.

Here are The Perks For Your Generous Donation

 Perk #1 For a one-time donation of $10.00 you'll receive 1-each, 16oz. jar of our amazing Pineapple Pizzazz Salsa This is our signature recipe, our claim-to-fame, fresh fruit salsa.

The rich pineapple and succulent mango make this salsa versatile and it can complement many dishes or it can be a stand-alone snack with tortilla chips. I even eat this stuff like it's a fruit cup it's so good!

This is the first production run. Testing will commence on September 24th 2017the test period before mainstream manufacturing will end within 6-8 weeks of that date. Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated November Week of 5th to 19th

 Perk #2 For a one-time donation of $25.00 you'll receive a 2-pack of our Pineapple Pizzazz Salsa.

2-each, 16oz. Jar of our amazing Pineapple Pizzazz Salsa This is our signature claim to fame fresh fruit salsa. Made with rich pineapple and succulent mango make this versatile for many dishes or for a stand-alone snack

For a one-time donation of $30.00, you'll receive a 3-pack of our Pineapple Pizzazz Salsa.

3-each, 16oz. Jar of our amazing Pineapple Pizzazz Salsa This is our signature claim to fame fresh fruit salsa. Made with rich pineapple and succulent mango make this versatile for many dishes or for a stand-alone snack.

For a one time donation of $50.00 you'll receive a 3 pack of assorted fresh salsa flavors.

1-each, 16oz. jar of our amazing Pineapple Pizzazz Salsa This is our signature recipe, our claim-to-fame, fresh fruit salsa.

The rich pineapple and succulent mango make this salsa versatile and it can complement many dishes or it can be a stand-alone snack with tortilla chips. I even eat this stuff like it's a fruit cup it's so good!

1- each, 16oz. Jar of one of a kind P.K.Punch Fresh Fruit Salsa, a sure to please crowd favorite made with fresh papaya and kiwi but don't let this mild-mannered fruit salsa catch you off guard. It packs a real punch!

To complete the ensemble our limited edition C.B. Blast. This is sure to please pallets of all heat levels. A creative and unique twist on cranberries and pomegranate. This sweet/medium heat fresh fruit salsa is great for poultry, PB& J upgrades, a great addition to Thanksgiving and Christmas meals. great as gifts, and it goes well with a variety of other recipes.

The second production run. Testing will commence on Depending on testing Schedule availability January/February 2018. The test period before mainstream manufacturing will commence will end within 6-8 weeks of that date. Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated TBD

Perk #3 For a one-time donation of $549 you'll receive

Qty. 1 3pk. assorted salsas, marinades and hot sauces each month for 1 year. Each month a new and exciting array of mouth-watering flavors will arrive at your door. Each shipment will contain

1 16oz. of fresh fruit salsa,

1 bottle of specialty gourmet cooking or dipping sauce

1 5oz. jar of hot sauce.

The third production run. Testing will commence on Depending on testing Schedule availability March/April 2018. The test period before mainstream manufacturing will commence will end within 6-8 weeks of that date. Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated TBD (This includes new label design and package design implementation)

 Perk #4 For a one-time donation of $1500 you will receive

Qty. 1 16oz. Jar of fresh fruit salsa every month for the next 5 years.

Qty. 1 3 pack combination of salsa, sauces, and marinades for every month for 1 year1 year

You'll be eligible for special VIP promotions, free samples of sauces, pepper-mashes, oils and many more surprises as we roll out new flavors and products emerge into the market.

The fourth production run. Testing will commence on Depending on testing Schedule availability June 5th/July 2018. The test period before mainstream manufacturing will commence will end within 6-8 weeks of that date. Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated TBD (This includes new label design and package design implementation)

Production Timeline

HUNGER IS A PROBLEM

42.2 million Americans lived in food-insecure households, including 29.1 million adults and 13.1 million children. 13 percent of households (15.8 million households) were food insecure. 5 percent of households (6.3 million households) experienced very low food security.

Courtesy - Hunger Facts & Poverty Statistics | Feeding America®

My experience in business has taught me a wide variety of skills, my passion for people is a deep-rooted desire. I always put my all into whatever it is I am doing and this is no different. We have been involved with local church outreaches for almost 5 years. We love people and we are easy to get along with.

This makes developing trust and rapport with those in need is easier as we make every attempt to help.

WE WANT TO BE THE SOLUTION

We are entering very competitive waters and we need to be ready for changes and challenges any start-up business can face. We aren't career entrepreneurs, but we want to be able to create positive change.

Luckily we have the support of many successful business owners, and we have a track record of great tasting salsas, sauces, marinades and much more and exciting food-related products in the test kitchen. We want more than what any fame or fortune can buy. We want to make a difference in this world before we leave. We all have a story to tell, share it bravely and boldly is our motto. We have standing orders waiting for this next phase of change in our lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and that's completely okay!

But that doesn't mean you can't help:

You can help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

  • It's easy to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Tell your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and wherever else you hang out. Come and join the conversation on our Facebook page.
  • Share your favorite recipes. Let's spice up the internet with spicy, hot and steamy food pics!
  • Let's create a wave of change.
  • Maybe you own a storefront, or you know someone who does.
  • Maybe you would love to see our product in a restaurant, we do too. Even at a local deli.
  • We want to be in every household. We can't reach these pinnacles of success without support from you.
  • Any effort is a contribution to make a positive change in someone's life.

And that's all there is to it.

Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated TBDPerk #3 For a one-time donation of $549 you'll receiveQty. 1 3pk. assorted salsas, marinades and hot sauces each month for 1 year. Each month a new and exciting array of mouth-watering flavors will arrive at your door. Each shipment will contain1 16oz. of fresh fruit salsa,1 bottle of specialty gourmet cooking or dipping sauce1 5oz. jar of hot sauce.The third production run. Testing will commence on Depending on testing Schedule availability March/April 2018. The test period before mainstream manufacturing will commence will end within 6-8 weeks of that date. Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated TBD (This includes new label design and package design implementation) Perk #4 For a one-time donation of $1500 you will receiveQty. 1 16oz. Jar of fresh fruit salsa every month for the next 5 years.Qty. 1 3 pack combination of salsa, sauces, and marinades for every month for 1 year1 yearYou'll be eligible for special VIP promotions, free samples of sauces, pepper-mashes, oils and many more surprises as we roll out new flavors and products emerge into the market.The fourth production run. Testing will commence on Depending on testing Schedule availability June 5th/July 2018. The test period before mainstream manufacturing will commence will end within 6-8 weeks of that date. Based on the results we will either enter into a production agreement and move forward or see if we have to change any part of our production process. Estimated TBD (This includes new label design and package design implementation)Production TimelineHUNGER IS A PROBLEM42.2 million Americans lived in food-insecure households, including 29.1 million adults and 13.1 million children. 13 percent of households (15.8 million households) were food insecure. 5 percent of households (6.3 million households) experienced very low food security.Courtesy - Hunger Facts & Poverty Statistics | Feeding America®My experience in business has taught me a wide variety of skills, my passion for people is a deep-rooted desire. I always put my all into whatever it is I am doing and this is no different. We have been involved with local church outreaches for almost 5 years. We love people and we are easy to get along with.This makes developing trust and rapport with those in need is easier as we make every attempt to help.WE WANT TO BE THE SOLUTIONWe are entering very competitive waters and we need to be ready for changes and challenges any start-up business can face. We aren't career entrepreneurs, but we want to be able to create positive change.Luckily we have the support of many successful business owners, and we have a track record of great tasting salsas, sauces, marinades and much more and exciting food-related products in the test kitchen. We want more than what any fame or fortune can buy. We want to make a difference in this world before we leave. We all have a story to tell, share it bravely and boldly is our motto. We have standing orders waiting for this next phase of change in our lives.Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, and that's completely okay!But that doesn't mean you can't help:You can help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
It's easy to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Tell your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and wherever else you hang out. Come and join the conversation on our Facebook page.
Share your favorite recipes. Let's spice up the internet with spicy, hot and steamy food pics!
Let's create a wave of change.
Maybe you own a storefront, or you know someone who does.
Maybe you would love to see our product in a restaurant, we do too. Even at a local deli.
We want to be in every household. We can't reach these pinnacles of success without support from you.
Any effort is a contribution to make a positive change in someone's life.
And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

We are two of the hardest working gals that you will meet! Chances are that many of you have seen us out an about shaking up or signature Detroit themed lemonades or frying up some mini donut deliciousness all around the metro Detroit area.  We started making donuts 7 years ago and have been able to grow organically and steadily since then. We are extremely excited to have the opportunity to open a brick and mortar concept of our mobile business in the heart of downtown Detroit.

We need to renovate our space, get licensed, and hire/train quality people to help us take this to the next level.  

Who's in????!!!

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise 125,000.

The funds will be used help with licensing, renovations/decor of our space, upgrading damaged equipment, adding new equipment, and to hire and train awesome full time staff to help us out.

If we don't reach our goal, we can scale back some projects or put them off until we open and sales can dictate further purchases. It would however, be amazing to get everything done before we open our doors. 

We are not quitters and will work with whatever we have to make this dream happen just a we have for the past 7 years!

 

 

The Impact

Your contribution will help us to inspire other small grass roots businesses that success is possible. Being a minority and woman owned company, we want to motivate those starting their journey.  When started seven years ago, we had no formal "funding".  What we did have was a big idea, families to support, and a lot of hard work, dedication and sacrifice. We put in more sweat equity than anything and the payoff has been amazing!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, we totally understand. Please just help us spread the word!

story:
Tally Tumbler is the World’s First Scorekeeping Tumbler

As recreational sports enthusiasts Kelvin Sealy & Matt Butler want to positively elevate your recreational gaming experience by eliminating the constant pause to try & remember the score.

The Problem:

While playing our favorite games we found a fundamental flaw, the lack of a convenient and easy to use scorekeeping device when you need it. In many recreational sports keeping score requires another item to bring with you. We thought to ourselves, what is one thing that we will always have while playing games, a tumbler! That’s what started our journey to create the ultimate score keeping tumbler.

 

 

Our scorekeeping solution: 

 

The Tally Tumbler is the ultimate score keeping tumbler for Golf, Tennis & Backyard Yard Games

 

 

 Bring Tally Tumbler to life & back this project today!

 

 

The Tally Tumbler comes with a food grade silicone seal lid top that provides you with an extra tight seal to ensure your beverages will stay warm/cold without spilling 

 

KEEP TRACK WHILE PLAYING GAMES

 

 

The Tally Tumbler Journey 

When finished, we will have standard 30oz tumblers when we get ready to ship. We have been working closely with our manufacturer to deliver the best product possible. With your backing of this project, you can help bring the Tally Tumbler to reality. Check out our product evolution so far:

 

 

 

 

The Tally Tumbler Collection 

 

  • Great for Backyard Games Like: Cornhole, Bocce, Washers, Ladder Ball, Horseshoes, Kan-Jam, Spikeball, Rollors ect.
  • Home and Away score rings that glide into place to keep an accurate score from 0-27
  • Keep track of the number of rounds played 0-10
  • No sweat design to keep your hands dry during game play
  • Premium insulation technology will keep your beverage frigid during game play
  • No spill lid included

 

 

Never lose track of the score while paying your favorite backyard game!

 

 

  • Track your overall golf score from 0-129 
  • Keep track of strokes per hole, fairways hit, greens in regulation or any side games 
  • You can track your putts if that’s more important or any side games you want to play with the group 
  • No sweat design to keep your hands dry during game play
  • No spill lid included

 

No more fooling around with pencils & scorecards, the Tally Tumbler holds your beverage and an accurate score, so you don’t have to!

 

 

 

Don’t Worry About The Score, Focus On The Game With The Tennis Tally Tumbler

  • Keep Track of team 1 & team 2 Game score 0-7
  • Keep track of team 1 & team 2 Set Score 0-5
  • Stylish durable design use as your everyday tumbler
  • No sweat design to keep your hands dry during game play
  • Premium insulation technology will keep your beverage frigid during game play
  • No spill lid included

 

 

 Reusability & Sustainability  

 

Stainless-steel bottles are great because they are 100% reusable, it can last a lifetime, and it is very easy to maintain and clean. Stainless steel does not diminish with repeated use and the strength and weight will make it last for many years to come.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Our supplier is ready & once fully funded, tumblers will ship as soon as possible

 

 

 

PRODUCT FEEDBACK

Risks and challenges

 

While some founders only work part time on their projects, we are 100% committed to The Tally Tumbler. We believe in this idea and are working full time to bring it to life. The Tally Tumbler strives to bring every customer an unrivaled level of quality.

We hold ourselves to the highest possible standards and guarantee that The Tally Tumbler will be everything we promised. We have finished product development and are working with manufacturers to tie together the final pieces for production. Between now and product delivery, we will spend all of our time to establish a rigorous quality tumbler.

While we have worked hard to accurately anticipate our timeline, we know things can happen. Fortunately, we have built some time into our forecast for expecting the unexpected such as: manufacturing hiccups and logistics issues due to Covid-19 we will be working nonstop to meet our projected deadline, but in the event of a delay, we promise you full transparency and to always keep you updated on our progress. As you can see from our background and experience we feel there are very minimal risks associated with bringing you the World’s First Scorekeeping Tumbler.

story:
Short Summary

Jason Johnson is the innovator behind The H.U.B.B.  and has spent over 15 years in restaurant management with large successful brands. He believes in an environment of shared knowledge and resources to achieve a more successful bottom line for all. 

J. Johnson & Company L.L.C. dba The H.U.B.B. (Helping Underserved Beginning Businesses) will provide all the services needed to operate a successful food business in ONE location! A small business incubator, food truck commissary, and commercial kitchen facilities for rent by the hour, week, or month to the culinary entrepreneur community – serving restaurant owners, private chefs, food truck vendors, beginning farmers, home-based bakers and producers, private instructors or demonstrators, and individuals who are seeking culinary arts classes and workshops. The H.U.B.B.’s non-profit partner “Collaborative Kitchens” works to solve the problems of equity in business ownership for low-income, minority, and women culinary entrepreneurs by providing an affordable solution to the space, time, and expense of owning or leasing a kitchen of their own full time. Our vision is an innovative, vibrant, and inclusive economic landscape. A collaboration of small business owners using their collective knowledge, talent, and resources to elevate the local culinary topography while increasing employment opportunities for the community and profits of the members.

What We Need & What You Get

$960,000 Commercial Business Loan

Purchase Real Estate 

Renovate and Expand facilities

$240,000 Private Investors

Purchase commercial kitchen equipment and utensils

Purchase and installation of Walk-In coolers and freezer

Installation of security fencing and electrical access to exterior

Security and camera system

Operating Capital

$15,000 Jason Johnson Owner Investment

$5,000 - Down Payment for Real Estate

$10,000 - Schematic Design/Site Plan 

  • If we do not reach our target goal the funds will be donated to charity helping underprivileged new culinary entrepreneurs rent commercial space in other facilities until we open for operations.

The Impact

THE MISSION

 Cultivate culinary entrepreneurs as they formalize and grow their businesses by providing professionally managed, easily accessible, and affordable commercial kitchen space, industry-specific technical assistance and access to market opportunities.

THE VISION

A collaboration of small business owners using their collective knowledge, talent, and resources to elevate the local culinary landscape while increasing profits of the members.

THE GOAL 

Become a thriving community shared-use kitchen that will support a major increase in the number of local food products and local culinary businesses in Durham County and beyond. After five years of operation our goal is to have launched a variety of new culinary businesses and products into the greater Raleigh-Durham area, and see a concomitant increase in culinary-related employment and entrepreneur success. We anticipate that there will be a need for a second kitchen facility in a different area of North Carolina within 5 years of The H.U.B.B. opening.

For More Info - www.hubbkitchens.com

story:
Hi, my name is Cory Crosby; I am a serial entrepreneur, business coach, children's book author and part-owner of a new company, GoMunchies LLC which was created by a local developer, Daniel Evans. After several meetings and Mr. Evans and I share ideas and our visions as entrepreneurs in Columbia, it was a no brainer that we partner up to maximize the GoMunchies potential. 

What is GoMunchies?  GoMunchies Delivery is a digital convenience store delivery service that allows people to purchase items typically found in a convenience store through via online or our mobile app and get it delivered right to their doorsteps or workplace.  

GoMunchies which is fully developed and available in both Google Play and the App Store, download today or visit app.gomunchies.io to see how it works! Check Out GoMunchies Online!

 

GoMunchies is pretty simple! users can order any of the items we keep in our inventory online or via the Go Munchies app and get the items delivered to their doorsteps or workplace. GoMunchies delivers the typical food & beverage items found in convenience stores such as chips, cookies, sodas, candy, (etc.), even toiletries,  alcohol and tobacco products. 

Customers: Customers select items to meet a minimum of $9 purchase. GoMunchies charges $1.95 delivery fee unless the customer spends $49 or more. In that case, the fee is waived.

Alcohol & Tobacco: If customers want to buy alcohol, they first have to scan their IDs through the app. GoMunchies confirms whether they’re valid before any credit cards are charged. When the GoMunchies driver arrives with the delivery, they will check to make sure the credit card matches the ID.

The Business: GoMunchies is fully licensed and incorporated. Once we have a location we will apply for a liquor license which is needed in order to sell 

Drivers: All GoMunchies Drivers will undergo a drug and alcohol screening, background test, be required to carry insurance as well as obtain a permit to deliver alcohol. Drivers will receive an hourly wage as well as their tips. 

 

We are NOT raising money to finish the GoMunchies desktop and mobile app, which is just our platform for selling and delivering convenience store items to our munchies having and soon to be customers. 

                          

We are actually raising money on IndieGoGo to stock up on inventory and to help us acquire a location to house our inventory. Our goal is to offer at least 500 products to start with, giving our customers a large variety of options.

Upon launching GoMunchies and acquiring proper licenses to operate (Currently fully licensed and incorporated, with pending trademark) we encountered a very small problem that forced us to completely change our delivery service platform. 

Our original goal was to partner with local convenient stores who sell their products to our users through the GoMunchies desktop and mobile delivery app, which allows store owners to import and track the inventory and sales of the products they want available in the GoMunchies "digital convenience store" for a fee of 7-10% of all sales and access to our drivers who handle all deliveries. But, after learning that in order for us deliver alcohol and tobacco products to users of the GoMunchies app, we have to offer the option of pick-up from a physical location, we changed up our platform once more! 

This is actually a problem we have solved and why we are asking for you to help us raise some money for a physical location and start-up inventory. 

A plus side to having to have a physical location to offer pick-up in order to be able to deliver alcohol and tobacco products, we eliminate an extra step in our fulfillment and delivery process, can pay our drivers more and with no need for middlemen vendors we can focus on creating more local jobs that will be needed for processing orders.  

OTHER CHALLENGES: 

GoMunchies LLC will be the first online convenience store in Columbia, Missouri, which means we are breaking into a brand new market and competing with local convenience stores with physical locations. However, we will have a competitive advantage which is our products being available via online and mobile app store, and of course the delivery of products once purchased by users. 

Food delivery companies like GrubHub and DoorDash are competitors only because the delivery, but unlike these companies, GoMunchies has a specific focus which is built around selling our own inventory of convenience store like products without the use of any third party vendors. 

Funding is a challenge as well, which is why we are so thankful for the IndieGoGo platform which allows for entrepreneurs to rally support from some really awesome people, friends, family, community and even other entrepreneurs to help make a really cool business like GoMunchies a reality. With the help of IndieGoGo and your support, we are confident that GoMunchies will not only be the next big thing, but GoMunchies will make people's lives easier, create more jobs & much more!

story:
Short Summary

VEGAN, DIABETIC FRIENDLY, GLUTEN FREE & KETO FRIENDLY!

The Triangle Bakery specializes in fresh and tasty baked goods while avoiding the use of processed sugar and flour.  Our treats are sweetened with all natural plant based sweeteners that are low Glycemic Index.  Nut and coconut flours are used in place of wheat based flour.  All of our items are Diabetic friendly, Gluten Free, and Keto friendly. We have Keto Vegan options as well.

This will fund the expansion of our production to copacker who will be able to make our products available nationwide while maintaining quality, refreshness and the integrity of our healthy ingredients. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The new R&D process for the copacking partner is $4,000 per product.
  • We are targeting 3 products to start.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • Our biggest risk is if our copacking partner can not reproduce our recipes.  This risk is very low as they are doing similar work for other products today.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this campaign with others that would like to improve the quality of food supply.

What We Need & What You Get

The new R&D process for the copacking partner is $4,000 per product.
We are targeting 3 products to start.

 
Risks & Challenges
Our biggest risk is if our copacking partner can not reproduce our recipes.  This risk is very low as they are doing similar work for other products today.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please share this campaign with others that would like to improve the quality of food supply.

story:
****PLEASE DO NOT DONATE. THIS CAMPAIGN HAS TO END****

 

Friends! Russell Street Deli is not coming back but we do have some GOOD NEWS. Russell St. was the caterpillar, and we are about to start that butterfly phase! We’re going to open a new place. Yay! We need $175,000. Whoa!  We can’t do it without you. Gulp!

We’ve looked at hundreds of spaces. White box spaces, new builds, places that would cost 500K to build out, places that cost 800K to buy, new developments desperate for anchor businesses, and places that have absolutely nothing to do with the neighborhood they’re in, (yikes!). Frankly, it was disheartening. 

Then, of course, the pandemic. Staff and owners, deep friends all over the country lost their restaurants, their savings, their jobs, and their livelihoods. Russell St. would have not survived. We were already squeaking by, and frankly we don’t know how people who are still open are pulling it off. But they are keeping people in jobs and that is paramount.

 

During COVID, we have had many offers as restaurants shutter. Landlords need new owners to hermit crab into places that just experienced incredible downfalls. That doesn’t feel like a good fit. In all these visits to potential locations it became clear, we wanted a place we were saving. New real estate developments are fine, but we wanted something that felt like the times in Detroit that have been so readily erased by development and now the pandemic. We wanted to find a spot that felt like it was going to VIBE FOR YEARS. We expected to be in the deli for years, which we had been, feeding people, watching people fall in love, build families, grow, fall on hard times occassionally--but always have a place to come have soup and a cup of coffee where it’s not like $17.50 before tip.

 

Our new spot, fingers crossed, is Baker Streetcar in Hamtramck. It’s going to be a lift, though. And so we need your help. The joint needs some updates and some big capital moves (an exhaust hood, (where we cook), a walk-in cooler, (a giant refrigerator)). In the end, what we hope we’ll have is a place that is integral to its community and produces incredible food.

 

FYI, it’s going to be a dinner place. Pizza and pasta (handmade daily), primarily because we can make it from scratch. As chefs, this menu gives us a lot more wiggle room economically. If you think about it, a pizza ain’t nothing but a big ol’ open-faced sandwich anyway and sauces are just soup. It’s a thing we love, the possibility of combinations, the way people of all ages love pizza. We DO PLAN to serve brunch one Sunday a month because we know that's who we were to you for so many years and obviously our brunch game is out of sight.

 

175K is a HUGE ask, but you don’t have to do it all yourself. If 1,750 people toss in $100 bucks we’re there! Community lift! Whatever you can give works, but as important, please SHARE THIS. The share is just as important as the give, really. We need to make sure that everybody who loves all the types of Detroit that Russell St. represented knows that this is happening. Even if that person couldn’t make it to us too often, there’s going to be a new place for them. Do us a favor and reach out to them? 

 

We will put in a ton of cash ourselves but we think 175 is the right figure to get us up and running safely and for the long term. If we don’t make it within a stone's throw of our goal, all the money goes back to donors and no new restaurant. In a way it’s a barn raising, and we all have to do it together. Good jobs and amazing food! Love y’all!
