story:
proud.pizza: You eat - We feed!

My name is Nicolas Schill (left) and I have a dream. In my dream I see a world in which starvation and social injustice have no place. At the moment every 10 seconds, a child dies because of starvation. Our goal is to end hunger by saving every 10 seconds one child! I believe charity should not cost anything. Thats why I started proud.pizza. Together with my teammate David (right), we want to create a new consumer trend.

 

proud.pizza explained in 1 minute

 

proud.pizza is a food delivery app, which converts people's daily food consumption into donations. With every order you make on proud.pizza you save one child from starvation. proud.pizza shares a quarter of the commission income in order to make this sustainable change in society possible. Since the donation is included in the order value, every person can save children with their everyday consumption without having to make financial efforts.

 

The Power of One

proud.pizza is more than just a company, it is a movement. A movement into the new age of sustainable economy. proud.pizza believes in the power of one. Each and every one of us can change the world with our daily decisions. The greatest power of humans is conscious consumption. With proud.pizza we want to give all people the power to save lives with their daily consumption without having to pay extra.

 

Transparency

I used to support large international aid organizations like many other people. After my research, I no longer trust any of them. Well, like many other people.                                                  That is why proud.pizza only works with small local assosiations which provide us photos and videos to watch what happens with the money. Due to the fact that we are proud of our work, you can watch our projects on social media. Follow us, watch the progress and share the mission with others!

proud.pizza´s mission is to create a sustainable consumption trend to end starvation.            Since proud.pizza stands for transparency, I would like to show you how we use our income:

  • A quarter will be donated                                                                                                                         
  • One third flows into our unique sales model to expand our network of partners
  • The rest keeps the company going.

 

proud.pizza - The App

 

 

How can you participate?​

 

  • Supporter

Are you looking for an investment with future potential?
Then proud.pizza is just right for you! Support a new consumption trend that ends the global starvation. Proud.pizza donates a quarter of your investment directly to hungry children. At proud.pizza you don't just invest in a project, you invest in the future of your next generation! 

  • Movement Hero

Would you like to push our movement with your reach and earn money?
Your investment enables an affiliate partnership with proud.pizza and lets you earn money on the orders. With every new user you bring to us, you save children's lives. Support a new consumption trend that ends the global starvation. Proud.pizza donates a quarter of your investment directly to hungry children.

  • Creator

Do you want to start your own social business?
Your investment enables you to brand your already completed food delivery business. Earn commissions on every order through your app. As a thank you for your support, you will save the business license in the first year. Proud.pizza donates a quarter of your investment directly to hungry children. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can't invest at the moment but still want to be part of the movement?
No problem! proud.pizza is open to everyone who wants to help us end world hunger. We are convinced of our product and rely on the recommendation from person to person, because that is the most effective and honest advertising. No advertising is as strong as the feeling of being able to change something!

So help us by:

  • ordering your food through proud.pizza in the future                                                                 
  • following and sharing our social media pages: 

 

https://www.instagram.com/proudpizza_/

https://www.facebook.com/proudpizza1

https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/proudpizza

https://twitter.com/pizza_proud

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-QtNaZYU1Q6tf3KgqbzbaQ

story:
INTRODUCING THE CATAPLANA

A cataplana is a copper pan made of two clam shells that can be sealed with two clamps. The origins of this cooking device are lost in time. In the early 20th century Portuguese hunters carried cataplanas loaded with onions and tomatoes, so they could cook on a wood fire.

Later, in the 1960s, the cataplana became a popular way to cook fish and shellfish in the Algarve. Since then, it has become a hallmark of Portuguese cooking.

There is something magical about the moment when the cataplana arrives at the table. And it is not hard to imagine that, as the pan opens, flavours the same secret incantation used in the banquets of the ALGARVE Nights to make the meal unforgettable.

Its concave shape, together with the excellent thermal conductivity of copper, means that the heat is distributed more uniformly in its interior, thereby ensuring more even cooking of the food. On a low heat, for example, this heat distribution makes the utensil more energy efficient.

HISTORY OF THE CATAPLANA

The Cataplana is a special and unique Portuguese cooking device, whos origins are not well known because there are no official historical records about its origin, appearance, and creation. In order to find the of the Cataplana, we are almost bound to deepen the Arabic influence from North Africa, which is well over 500 years away (VIII century to century XIII) sought the major goals of the Algarve region, and to this day still fresh in their culture and crafts and to find again is reflected.

 

What Makes the CATAPLANA Special?

Shaped like a clam with two domed halves, the pot seals in moisture like a Dutch oven, encouraging a steaming effect inside the vessel. The latches on the side lock the dome closed, emulating a pressure cooker. The cataplana is essentially an uncanny combination of slow cooker or Dutch oven, tagine and modern pressure cooker.

The cooking process used by the Cataplana prevents the loss of the ingredients and aromas, ensuring a full and excellent flavor  Furthermore, cooking in the Cataplana is healthier since the recipes use less fat, and thus contain fewer calories.

Of all the cookware materials, copper is the best heat conductor. It heats food evenly and adjusts to temperature changes quickly.
Does not require much pre-heating since copper heats very quickly.

Why else should you use and own a Cataplana?

You love to cook, and we’re guessing you’re probably pretty good at it or you’d be Googling something new other than regular cookware. That means you’re ready for your best recipes to get even better.

The only ingredients in our pots and pans are copper and tin a;(Cu),(Sn) in the Periodic Table of the Elements. Our pure metal cookware is as unalloyed and organic as it comes.

The use of copper, apart from the excellent conductivity of heat throughout the Cataplana structure, gives the entire contents of a special, unique and incomparable taste.

Copper is Timeless Beauty
Copper is one of the oldest metal known to mankind and has been used for centuries. Copper is a living metal and will change according to its surroundings with character and beauty. This innate feature with hammered artisanship gives the kitchen a timeless feel.

Health Benefits
Along with timeless beauty copper cataplanas also provide health benefits. Copper has the inherent ability to kill a variety of potentially harmful pathogens.Copper is antibacterial, killing most bacteria within a couple hours.

Copper is a necessary trace nutrient, but, like grandma used to say, you can have too much of a good thing. That’s why smiths have been lining copper cookware with non-reactive tin for centuries. You never have to think about what could be going into your food other than what you put in the cataplana.

PREMIUM QUALITY

Copper Cookware has been the gold standard in cooking and the top choice among professional chefs and cooking enthusiasts for centuries. A quality copper cookware set is an investment that will stay in your family forever. Bring added quality, functionality and more beauty to your home with a  copper cataplana.

MULTI PROPOSE:

The more you work with the cataplana the more you will realized this dish isn’t just for shellfish. It can be used for vegetarian stews, chicken, rabbit and seafood rice and a variety of different fish dishes like a Caldeirada de Peixe (fish stew). Cooking in the cataplana makes the flavors richer by not allowing the juices to go to waste by evaporating into the air and instead continuously sinking back into the food and creating a luscious liquid in the bottom.

FUN,SAFE & EASY TO USE AND CLEAN:

Cataplana is perfect for cooking device because it efficiently contains the flavor and heat of the contents in the dish to provide a uniquely flavored and scented dish, simply without any fuss.

The cataplana is easy enough to clean, but we recommend using copper cleaner or polish to keep it looking pristine. The pan is a refreshing combination of form and function, and easily the most eye-catching addition to your kitchen.

KATAPLANA EXPERIENCE APP AND RECIPE BOOK

We are really excited about bringing the KATAPLANA APP and the RECIPE BOOK to life. And not without reason more than a simple recipe bank, the app and the book will help you regain control over lunchtime, hit health goals, and enjoy amazing meals with friends and family.

Our app’s UI design is clean, is easy-to-navigate, and is cross-device functional. Plan your meals on your iPad, then get your shopping lists on your iPhone and Android devices too!

We partnered with professional chefs in the Algarve region and nutritionists to create an evolving library of recipes tailored to fit a broad range of diets, appetites, and health goals.

In North Africa, we find some very old utensils, where the cooking process is very similar to the Cataplana. This is, in fact, the famous "Tagine" the Moroccans, which, though traditionally made of clay, but the same kind used for cooking food, the hermetic steam process. In later years, this cooking process was then used in cataplanas to food to cook slowly and gently with lower overall temperatures.

Why we need your help

Our product is ready for production - now we need to funds for the first production run. All the funds raised will go directly towards sourcing the materials and expert labor needed to create these handmade cataplanas. We have the suppliers and the factory lined up and ready to go, we just need your help to bring the KATAPLANAS to life. 

Bring back the lost art of metal spinning

Copper was one of the first metals to be spun and the tradition continues at KATAPLANAS. Copper is the perfect metal for spinning because it is very malleable and ductile, meaning copper is resistant to breaking or cracking during the metal spinning process.

All the tools are organized, clean and ready to work.The tools are made by the artist himself and many are passed down from generation to generation.

How We Got Here

We’ve tested our cataplana with both chefs and home cooks to develop something that feels intuitive for everyone. After more than 6 months of designing, prototyping, testing, and manufacturing samples we’re ready to reinvent this hallmark of Portugal and go to production. Dozens of revisions have helped us to develop a tradition we can’t wait to share with the world.

Help us grow our business by contributing to our campaign, and more importantly, please let us know what cookware you'd like us to offer next. A bigger cataplana? A paella pan? A wok? The possibilities are endless.

KATAPLANAS is a family team dedicated of the craftsman thath decided it was much better to work for a small company and make products that make people happy. We love work with copper and cooking,our father and grandfather Jorge Silva has more than 40 years of experience working with copper cookware!Most of the people in the factory are related, fathers, mothers, sons, uncles, cousins.

SHARING IS CARING 

Please share our project with your friends!

 

RISKS AND CHALANGES

PRODUCTION: 
We have many years of experience designing and manufacturing copper cookware. Therefore, we understand the risks that can occur in the production process. As with any physical item, flaws not picked up in the rigorous testing phase are possible. That may result in a delay on delivery.

DELIVERY: 
One challenge is coping with a larger direct-to-consumer delivery than we're used to. That’s why we have already planned for this and have lined up several options for third party logistics, all of whom have crowdfunding expertise.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: 
As the cataplanas gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced craftsman and coppersmith. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

If any issues arise, we'll communicate them to you as soon and openly as possible so you wont be left in the dark.

The possibilities are endless.KATAPLANAS is a family team dedicated of the craftsman thath decided it was much better to work for a small company and make products that make people happy. We love work with copper and cooking,our father and grandfather Jorge Silva has more than 40 years of experience working with copper cookware!Most of the people in the factory are related, fathers, mothers, sons, uncles, cousins.SHARING IS CARING Please share our project with your friends! RISKS AND CHALANGESPRODUCTION: We have many years of experience designing and manufacturing copper cookware. Therefore, we understand the risks that can occur in the production process. As with any physical item, flaws not picked up in the rigorous testing phase are possible. That may result in a delay on delivery.DELIVERY: One challenge is coping with a larger direct-to-consumer delivery than we're used to. That’s why we have already planned for this and have lined up several options for third party logistics, all of whom have crowdfunding expertise.PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the cataplanas gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced craftsman and coppersmith. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.If any issues arise, we'll communicate them to you as soon and openly as possible so you wont be left in the dark.

story:
Join our tasting revolution! 
 

The way you decide which wines to buy and enjoy will change forever.  Now you can sample premium wines at home before you buy them.
Vino fans can now have wine their way!

Get 3,6,9 or 12 half-bottles (375 ml) of wine each month.

Wines are from only premium winemakers in California, Oregon and Washington.

Each month will feature new reds or whites and you can select Reds only or Whites only.

If you find a wine you like, you can buy it directly from the winery or from us...it's your choice.

You have no expensive packages to buy.

There are no long term commitments and you can cancel at any time.

You can adjust how much wine you would like. You can start with 3 bottles, then move up to 12, or start with 12 and move to 6 any time you want.

Winesmpler.com is truly, "A better way to wine"

 

 

What we need.

We are looking for $20,000.00 to start a tasting revolution. We have wines from some exceptional wineries lined up, a fulfillment center just waiting to add your address and we even have some awesome boxes to put it all in.  We know that once you sign up you will be happy to see that box monthly and eager to try what is inside. 

 

This is a brand new way to taste wine.  All new projects come with risk but my goal is to empower people to make better wine decisions based on their own taste not what someone tells them they should like.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope that you join us.  Please do tell your wine loving friends.  This is a great way for new and experienced wine lovers to try new wines.  The fact that they are delivered monthly to enjoy at home just enhances the experience.  Please spread the word and help us start a tasting revolution!  Cheers. 

WineSampler.com Launches Subscription-Based Service to Make Finding Fine Vino Practical

Making a new way to enjoy the best wines a whole lot like a walk in the park, WineSampler.com launches its delicious wares to a thirsty marketplace.

Portland, OR -- (ReleaseWire) -- 06/01/2017 --Creating a run on practicality, suffice it to say, a big toast is in order for wine lovers everywhere. How so? There's a new digital age way to unearth premium wines from California Oregon and Washington without lifting a finger. Brought right to doorsteps with half bottles of the best wines in tow, WineSampler.com gives vino fans what they've always wanted. A wine tasting club that provides variety without a hefty price tag. Now, wine curated for the platform's members will arrive every month in batches of red, white, and sparkling with nothing further to do. Imbibe, anyone?

Show Us Your Box!

We think our boxes are great at winesampler.com. Not only do they hold great wine, they have a great design. So, show us your box! As a member, if you take pictures of your box in great locations, you can win free wine!!!

story:
There is a saying “give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime”.

This suggest that the best way to support someone is to help them develop the capacity to provide for themselves.

And I would also like to add that, “The basics of life is giving and supporting, I am quite sure as humans we can never stop giving, I believe it’s an ongoing process and it’s not just by writing a check but by touching somebody’s life…...Oprah Winfrey

It’s with this understanding in mind that we design this fundraiser

OUR VISION

At ATL Wings, Burgers, and Seafood and we have a Vision, which is to continue to overcome the obstacles in life, live joyously with the hand we have been dealt and to demonstrate to others, all that can be done and accomplished, no matter what. We have a new concept that was designed and fully inspired by us and it is called ATL Wings, Burgers, and Seafood. An exciting new concept that brings an Atlanta Flavor to Texas. We have the restaurant management experience in order to be successful. We are not new comers in the business because we have over 20 years of Multi-Unit Restaurant Management experience and so do our business partners and consultants. We believe with the funds raised here we would definitely be launched to the top level of our business.

OUR GOAL

ATL Wings, Burgers, and Seafood has a great goal and plans of opening up in 3 locations in order to build our reach of the new concept to be enjoyed by the best possible number of people, but due to financial constraints we have not been able to fully execute kicking start the project. Though we have initial funding of about $40000 to cover our equipment. We are trying to raise $5,000,000 so that we may have the capital necessary to achieve our goals of land, construction, and working capital.

OUR MISSION

To provide our customers with an experience above all others that energizes everyone with an enthusiastic welcome, exceptional service, great food, great drinks, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

WHY ARE WE HERE

We are to bring to your notice that we need your support financially to set the wheels rolling on this project.

ATL Wings Burgers and Seafood is presently in need of $5,000,000. We hereby humbly solicit for your financial support as much as possible and please don’t forget that no amount is too small. We believe strongly that you will consider to help us grow and set the ball rolling as you give to support this project.

Thanks, in anticipation

story:
EN

Little Donkey’s pollen muesli transforms your breakfasts with a healthy and nutritious boost. Pollen muesli enriches your snacks and breakfasts with natural flavors while making them more nutritionally complete.

Why bee pollen?

Bee pollen is a densely nutritious bee product. It contains nearly all the nutrients required by the human body to survive. Essentially, it is a clean, highly assimilable protein source. Bee Pollen is a –SuperFood-!

Only few of the amazing health benefits of pollen are the following:

  1. It is an energy enhancer
  2. It has skin smoothing properties
  3. It has an anti-inflammatory effect of the tissues of Respiratory System
  4. It can treat allergies
  5. It helps in digestion
  6. It is an Immune System Booster
  7. It supports the cardiovascular system

 

-- Pollen Muesli – Our tasty, morning, health boost!

Here at Little Donkey’s, we combine all the very best nutrients of muesli- with bee pollen. With attention to detail, we look for that perfect balance, so you can enjoy all the health benefits of bee pollen and not even notice the rather bitter or sour flavor of it.

What people are saying?

 

Key benefits

 

For reasons such as the protection of the environment, health and ethics, more and more people are adopting a plant-centered diet. Little donkey’s pollen muesli offers you an easy way to enrich your snacks with natural flavor and healthy nutrients.

Little Donkey’s pollen muesli is ideal for vegetarians. Pollen muesli will supply your body with high assimilable pure protein, that’s besides the antioxidants, vitamins and fibers.  

The final muesli mixture is of high quality, tasty, nourishing, convenient and functions as nutrition boost. You can enjoy it with milk, yoghurt, creams, ice creams or add it as an ingredient in smoothies or sprinkled on salads.

It's vegan, salt and GMO free, and also free of additives and preservatives. We created a 100% natural product in a 100% recyclable packaging, that keeps all ingredients extra fresh, to give to our customers an alternative way to get all the nutrients and benefits of pollen.

 

How to use

 

 

Your contribution

Here at Little Donkey we are making a lot of research, sourcing, testing and getting feedback from customers before launching a new product.

A successful crowdfunding campaign will help you find these healthy convenient products on much more shelves. Human’s food philosophy needs to change, we need better products, more natural and less processed. 

Back Little Donkey pollen muesli and help us change food philosophy! All proceeds from this campaign will be used directly on the production operations of Little Donkey and on fulfilling your orders.

 

Risks and challenges

Little Donkey is an already established small scale food company.

We already produce pollen muesli products and provide it locally to stores in Greece.

The project is very well organized and planned to decrease potential risks and to ensure on time delivery but risks and challenges are always present in the creation and launching of a new product.

In case there are delays, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing or shipping, we will communicate with you and find the proper way and solution to solve such issues.

We, the team of Little Donkey thank you very much for your trust and support!

How you can help us without a financial contribution

 

"Bee" part of our project!

  • Like us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Follow us on Instagram
  • Visit our website www.littledonkey.gr
  • Share our updates with your relatives and friends.
  • Contact us

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

GR

Δουλεύετε πολλές ώρες, ασκείστε, είστε αθλητής ή σουπερ-μαμά, προσπαθείτε να κάνετε ότι μπορείτε για να διατρέφεστε σωστά, αλλά η φύση έχει συστατικά, όπως η γύρη, τα οποία πιθανόν να αγνοείτε!

Το μούσλι γύρης που παράγουμε στο Γαϊδαράκο, μετατρέπει το πρωινό σας σε μια… «βόμβα» υγείας και θρέψης! Το μούσλι γύρης εμπλουτίζει τα σνακ και τα πρωινά σας με φυσικές γεύσεις κάνοντάς τα πιο πλήρη διατροφικά.

Γιατί γύρη μελισσών;

Η γύρη μελισσών είναι ένα έντονα θρεπτικό μελισσοκομικό προϊόν μιας και περιέχει σχεδόν όλα τα θρεπτικά συστατικά που χρειάζεται ο ανθρώπινος οργανισμός και για αυτό το λόγο θεωρείται υπερτροφή. Το πιο σημαντικό είναι η υψηλή περιεκτικότητά της σε καθαρή εύκολα αφομοιώσιμη πρωτεϊνη.

Παρακάτω είναι μόνο μερικά από τα οφέλη της κατανάλωσης γύρης:

  1. Φυσική τόνωση & ενίσχυση της αντοχής
  2. Καταπραϋνει δερματικές παθήσεις
  3. Βοηθά το αναπνευστικό σύστημα
  4. Μπορεί να βοηθήσει στη θεραπεία αλλεργειών
  5. Βοηθά στην πέψη
  6. Ενισχύει την άμυνα του οργανισμού
  7. Υποστηρίζει τη σωστή λειτουργία του καρδιαγγειακού συστήματος

Τι κάνουμε εμείς:  

Στο εργαστήρι του Γαϊδαράκου συνδυάσαμε τα καλύτερα συστατικά ενός μούσλι με τη γύρη μελισσών, ισορροπώντας τα σε αναλογίες που θα σας βοηθήσουν να λαμβάνετε όλα τα οφέλη της γύρης χωρίς όμως να ενοχλείστε από την μάλλον πικρή και ξινή γεύση που έχει συνήθως η γύρη.   

Τα κύρια οφέλη:

Για λόγους όπως η προστασία του περιβάλλοντος, η υγεία και η ηθική, ολοένα περισσότεροι άνθρωποι υιοθετούν μια διατροφή περισσότερο χορτοφαγική. Το μούσλι γύρης του Γαϊδαράκου σας δίνει τη δυνατότητα να εμπλουτίσετε τα σνακς σας με φυσικές γεύσεις και θρεπτικά συστατικά.

Το μούσλι γύρης είναι ιδανικό και για χορτοφάγους , μιας και πέραν των αντιοξειδωτικών, των βιταμινών και φυτικών ινών παρέχει στον οργανισμό καθαρή και εύκολα αφομοιώσιμη πρωτεΐνη.

Τα τελικά μείγματα μούσλι που παράγουμε είναι υψηλής ποιότητας, θρεπτικά και δίνουν μια θρεπτική και ενεργειακή ώθηση στον οργανισμό σας. Μπορείτε να τα απολαύσετε με γάλα, γιαούρτι, κρέμες, παγωτό ή να τα προσθέσετε σε ροφήματα και σαλάτες.

Δεν περιέχουν γενετικά τροποποιημένες πρώτες ύλες, δεν έχουν συντηρητικά ή πρόσθετα. Δημιουργήσαμε ένα 100% φυσικό προϊόν και το συσκευάσαμε σε μια 100% ανακυκλώσιμη συσκευασία, η οποία διατηρεί όλα τα συστατικά ασφαλή και φρέσκα, δίνοντας έτσι τη δυνατότητα στους πελάτες μας να λαμβάνουν όλα τα θρεπτικά στοιχεία και τα οφέλη της γύρης.

Η συμβολή σας στην προσπάθειά μας

Στο Γαϊδαράκο κάνουμε πάρα πολλή επιστημονική έρευνα, πολλές δοκιμές και φυσικά δεχόμαστε τα σχόλια των πελατών μας πριν λανσάρουμε ένα νέο προϊόν.

Μια επιτυχημένη καμπάνια θα μας βοηθήσει να τοποθετήσουμε αυτά τα προϊόντα σε περισσότερα ράφια στην Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό, έτσι ώστε να είναι διαθέσιμα σε όλους εσάς που επιθυμείτε να αλλάξετε και να βελτιώσετε τις διατροφικές σας συνήθειες! Η διατροφική φιλοσοφία του ανθρώπου πρέπει να αλλάξει! Χρειαζόμαστε καλύτερα τρόφιμα, πιο φυσικά και λιγότερο επεξεργασμένα!

Βοηθώντας μας μέσω της καμπάνιας αυτής θα μας βοηθήσετε να βάλουμε ένα λιθαράκι στην αλλαγή της σύγχρονης διατροφικής φιλοσοφίας του ανθρώπου! Όλα τα έσοδα από την καμπάνια θα διατεθούν σε οτιδήποτε αφορά στην παραγωγική διαδικασία των προϊόντων, όπως ο εξοπλισμός παραγωγής και συσκευασίας, το ανθρώπινο δυναμικό και βέβαια στην εκτέλεση των παραγγελιών σας,

Ρίσκο και προκλήσεις

Ο Γαϊδαράκος είναι μια ήδη λειτουργική μικρής κλίμακας οικογενειακή επιχείρηση.

Παράγουμε ήδη τα προϊόντα μούσλι με γύρη και προμηθεύουμε καταστήματα στην Ελλάδα.

Το έργο αυτό είναι πολύ καλά σχεδιασμένο και προγραμματισμένο έτσι ώστε να αποφθεχθούν πιθανές αντιξοότητες και να μπορέσουμε να παραδώσουμε τις παραγγελίες μας στο σωστό χρόνο. Πάντα όμως υπάρχει η πιθανότητα καθυστερήσεων κατά την παραγωγική διαδικασία και τη διάθεση και αποστολή των προϊόντων.

Σε περίπτωση που υπάρξει καθυστέρηση στην παραγωγή ή την αποστολή των προϊόντων θα επικοινωνήσουμε μαζί σας για να βρεθεί η καλύτερη λύση για τη δική σας εξυπηρέτηση.

Εμείς, η ομάδα του Γαϊδαράκου, σας ευχαριστούμε πάρα πολύ για την εμπιστοσύνη και την υποστήριξή σας!

Γίνετε μέρος της προσπάθειάς μας!

  • Κάνετε Like στη σελίδα μας στο Facebook
  • Ακολουθήστε μας στο Twitter
  • Ακολουθήστε μας στο Instagram
  • Επισκεφτείτε την ιστοσελίδα μας www.gaidarakos.gr
  • Διαδόστε τα νέα μας σε συγγενείς και φίλους
  • Επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας

 

Video by George Gyftopoulos

Τι κάνουμε εμείς:  Στο εργαστήρι του Γαϊδαράκου συνδυάσαμε τα καλύτερα συστατικά ενός μούσλι με τη γύρη μελισσών, ισορροπώντας τα σε αναλογίες που θα σας βοηθήσουν να λαμβάνετε όλα τα οφέλη της γύρης χωρίς όμως να ενοχλείστε από την μάλλον πικρή και ξινή γεύση που έχει συνήθως η γύρη.   Τα κύρια οφέλη:Για λόγους όπως η προστασία του περιβάλλοντος, η υγεία και η ηθική, ολοένα περισσότεροι άνθρωποι υιοθετούν μια διατροφή περισσότερο χορτοφαγική. Το μούσλι γύρης του Γαϊδαράκου σας δίνει τη δυνατότητα να εμπλουτίσετε τα σνακς σας με φυσικές γεύσεις και θρεπτικά συστατικά.Το μούσλι γύρης είναι ιδανικό και για χορτοφάγους , μιας και πέραν των αντιοξειδωτικών, των βιταμινών και φυτικών ινών παρέχει στον οργανισμό καθαρή και εύκολα αφομοιώσιμη πρωτεΐνη.Τα τελικά μείγματα μούσλι που παράγουμε είναι υψηλής ποιότητας, θρεπτικά και δίνουν μια θρεπτική και ενεργειακή ώθηση στον οργανισμό σας. Μπορείτε να τα απολαύσετε με γάλα, γιαούρτι, κρέμες, παγωτό ή να τα προσθέσετε σε ροφήματα και σαλάτες.Δεν περιέχουν γενετικά τροποποιημένες πρώτες ύλες, δεν έχουν συντηρητικά ή πρόσθετα. Δημιουργήσαμε ένα 100% φυσικό προϊόν και το συσκευάσαμε σε μια 100% ανακυκλώσιμη συσκευασία, η οποία διατηρεί όλα τα συστατικά ασφαλή και φρέσκα, δίνοντας έτσι τη δυνατότητα στους πελάτες μας να λαμβάνουν όλα τα θρεπτικά στοιχεία και τα οφέλη της γύρης.Η συμβολή σας στην προσπάθειά μαςΣτο Γαϊδαράκο κάνουμε πάρα πολλή επιστημονική έρευνα, πολλές δοκιμές και φυσικά δεχόμαστε τα σχόλια των πελατών μας πριν λανσάρουμε ένα νέο προϊόν.Μια επιτυχημένη καμπάνια θα μας βοηθήσει να τοποθετήσουμε αυτά τα προϊόντα σε περισσότερα ράφια στην Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό, έτσι ώστε να είναι διαθέσιμα σε όλους εσάς που επιθυμείτε να αλλάξετε και να βελτιώσετε τις διατροφικές σας συνήθειες! Η διατροφική φιλοσοφία του ανθρώπου πρέπει να αλλάξει! Χρειαζόμαστε καλύτερα τρόφιμα, πιο φυσικά και λιγότερο επεξεργασμένα!Βοηθώντας μας μέσω της καμπάνιας αυτής θα μας βοηθήσετε να βάλουμε ένα λιθαράκι στην αλλαγή της σύγχρονης διατροφικής φιλοσοφίας του ανθρώπου! Όλα τα έσοδα από την καμπάνια θα διατεθούν σε οτιδήποτε αφορά στην παραγωγική διαδικασία των προϊόντων, όπως ο εξοπλισμός παραγωγής και συσκευασίας, το ανθρώπινο δυναμικό και βέβαια στην εκτέλεση των παραγγελιών σας,
Ρίσκο και προκλήσεις
Ο Γαϊδαράκος είναι μια ήδη λειτουργική μικρής κλίμακας οικογενειακή επιχείρηση.Παράγουμε ήδη τα προϊόντα μούσλι με γύρη και προμηθεύουμε καταστήματα στην Ελλάδα.Το έργο αυτό είναι πολύ καλά σχεδιασμένο και προγραμματισμένο έτσι ώστε να αποφθεχθούν πιθανές αντιξοότητες και να μπορέσουμε να παραδώσουμε τις παραγγελίες μας στο σωστό χρόνο. Πάντα όμως υπάρχει η πιθανότητα καθυστερήσεων κατά την παραγωγική διαδικασία και τη διάθεση και αποστολή των προϊόντων.Σε περίπτωση που υπάρξει καθυστέρηση στην παραγωγή ή την αποστολή των προϊόντων θα επικοινωνήσουμε μαζί σας για να βρεθεί η καλύτερη λύση για τη δική σας εξυπηρέτηση.Εμείς, η ομάδα του Γαϊδαράκου, σας ευχαριστούμε πάρα πολύ για την εμπιστοσύνη και την υποστήριξή σας!Γίνετε μέρος της προσπάθειάς μας!
Κάνετε Like στη σελίδα μας στο Facebook

Ακολουθήστε μας στο Twitter

Ακολουθήστε μας στο Instagram

Επισκεφτείτε την ιστοσελίδα μας www.gaidarakos.gr

Διαδόστε τα νέα μας σε συγγενείς και φίλους
Επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας
 Video by George Gyftopoulos

story:
Simple - Any mother will tell you when it comes to kids that simple goes a long way. 

Safe - We have enough dangers in the house and in my child's life, snack time did not need to be one of them.

Fun - Anything without fun (at any age) is a chore.

We weren't setting out to win a design and innovation award, we wanted to solve a real problem for real moms. With your support, we are aiming to not only get as many hands on as many apples as possible but to expand our creative product line and grow as a business. 

We are a mom and daughter team who are giving it our best shot and having a lot of fun in the process, meeting great people and growing together, closer than we could have imagined.

Snack time was about as exciting as our lives, but that's all changed. Since sticking handles in apples, we have been featured on My Cool Inventions, the Steve Harvey Show and countless other media outlets.

We have been widely received by countless moms and families, apple orchards and children around the country. It's simple and we know that but it's fun and it works!

 

We Know What You Are Thinking

You've seen the same thing for corn... 

Not quite.

Our product is patent protected and the name is trademarked. 

 

We Need Your Help

We have done our best as a mother-daughter team and just need a little more capital to expand our product line and increase our marketing efforts. This is a dream come true for both of us and we couldn't have made it this far without you.

Thank you for your continued support,

Megan and Debbie

story:
The Selection of the finest Snakcs & Beverages from Perú.

A Total Transparency in each step of the Food Supply. 

EVOLUTION

"Life tends naturally to perfect itself." J.I

 

Coffee de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

Peru claims its high altitude coffee makes a symphony of scents from the Andes.

LAO coffee comes from El Valle de Sandia in the province of Puno, considered by many experts as the best coffee plantations in the world.

This harmony of flavors, which emerges as these special coffees travel through the mouth, is grown between 1,300 and 2,000 meters above sea level, a natural environment whose dimensions allow these crops to acquire their most outstanding notes.

 

Green Tea de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

The leaves are cultivated in a warm climate at a height above 1500 meters and only 17 kilometers north of Machu Picchu, which produces a quality mix of different flavors and aromas.

 

Chocolate powder de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

According to legends, the tradition of sparkling chocolate began centuries ago, before the arrival of the Spaniards. The drink of the Inca nobles and warriors was prepared with cacao especially grown for the nobility.

We only use cacao of unique origin from Chazuta, a region on the edge of the Amazon within San Martin, Peru, an area which is famous for its high quality fine flavor cacao.

 

Panela de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

Panela, as some people know, is a very powerful sweetener that is obtained by evaporating the juices from sugar cane.

Our Panela, from Piura, stands out for being a more natural product, without any refinement, which allows it to store an infinity of properties of great nutritional value. If you want to leave sugar, try panela, without a doubt, it is the best solution to maintain the sweetness of your food.

 

Maras Salt de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

Salinas de Maras is located along the slopes of Qaqawiñay Mountain, at an elevation of 3,380m in the Urumbamba Valley, 46km outside of Cusco, Peru. 

This Salt have healing & anti-inflammatory properties and is propitious to regulate the arterial pressure thanks to its low concentration of sodium chloride.

Is beneficial for people with hypertension because they must minimize the consumption of common salt that has a high concentration of sodium chloride.

 

Almonds covered with Bitter Chocolate de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

It's not easy to turn off your chocolate cravings and give up sweets.

By combining the real Peruvian bitter chocolate with national Almonds which are naturally loaded with vitamin E, we turned a tough challenge into a delicious snack you can enjoy every day. 

100% Organic, this makes a great healthy lifestyle snack for chocolate lovers and Dried Fruits Lovers.

 

Giant Corn de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

The god Pachacámac, creator of all things on Earth, was represented inside his Inca temple with a cluster of giant Corn attached to his belt, as a symbol of prosperity, abundance and fortune.

After several centuries, the Giant Corn from Cusco; a product with a designation of origin, continues to illuminate the destiny of its descendants.

This Snack is a highly energetic food and rich in digestible nutrients. Cereals such as corn provide remarkable amounts of protein and other nutrients. 

Our Giant Corn is rich in phosphorus, potassium and magnesium, ideal for a salty pause during the day.

 

COMMUNITY

"The Future belongs to those who believe in the Beauty of their Dreams." E.R

 

"Many people still confuse Organic Products with Light or Diet products."

However, they do not have a direct relationship. Organic foods are those that have grown free of pesticides, agro toxic substances, hormones and antibiotics.

Following this principle, La Abuela Orgánica establishes a relationship of harmony with the environment, selecting with expertise the organic lands and organic collaborators who can, together, reach the 100% Organic products for a healthy lifestyle.

 

"Each Pleasure is paired with a Charity Foundation."

La Abuela Orgánica fights for many causes that are close to her heart and actively participates in the development of several charitable projects. This is part of La Abuela Orgánica’s ADN.

10% on the total Benefits of the Product is automatically returned to his mother cause for a period of 1 year. After that year ends, community will vote for a new one thanks to our help and the use of the Blockchain Technologies with the ClearPoll Platform.

Here is the list, for the first year:

 

We will accept payments in Cryptocurrency.

Yes LAO want to be closely linked to the World of Cryptocurrencies and the Blockchains applications.

 

"The Logo of different Crypto Company will be Linked for 1 Year in the Products Packaging."

In a symbolic, non-profit way, the objective is clear: to involve our customers on this alusion which, at first sight, has nothing to do with our Organic Products but which are nevertheless part of the same big family.

Same rule, year ends, community will vote for a new Crypto Company, thanks to our help and the use of the Blockchain Technologies with the ClearPoll Platform.

 

Together we are stronger, together we participate in the fact that the greatest number of people can be interested to learn, beyond Bitcoin, about the Blockchain Technology that marks a new page in the History of Humanity. 

At the launch of our crowfunding, we will contact the administrators of each Crypto Entreprise, to know their wish to become "Godfather" of the product during the period of one year.

Once again, we are not expecting anything from this collaboration. The main objective is to educate our national and international customers about the Blockchain issue and the positive changes they can bring to the world and to our country: The Republic of Peru.

Here is our wish list, for the first year:

 

La Abuela Organica (LAO) is always Strict & Transparent.

Collaboration with Companies in the Blockchain Universe will be the key to ensure 100% Tracability of the food & logistic supply. 

 

For exportation, we are compliant with National & International Sanitary Certifications & Regulatory Public Specialists. 

 

Collaborative Network of Growers:

All our Peruvian Growers Partners already own their fitosanitary registry.

However, we perform a second safety measure by passing a second fitosanitary control.
Indispensable and obligation to export abroad.

 

DIGESA:

Dirección General de Salud Ambiental from Perú is responsible for seeing aspects related to food hygiene and deliver us our fitosanitary registry for each product. We will include this documentation in your Delivery Pack.

 

FDA:

USA Food & Drug Administration is responsible for protecting the public health in the USA. Our Partners & LAO will be 100% compliant with FDA.

 

AGRICULTURE BIOLOGIQUE                                                                                                              & BIO ORGANIC CERTIFIED:

Europe Food & Drug Administration is responsible for protecting the public health in the USA. Our Partners & LAO will be 100% compliant with this certifications.

 

CONTROL UNION:

Leaders in certification of production and quality systems, helping us to have all Organic Certification Wordwilde.

 

SERPOST:

International postal service for our BtoC market.

 

ORBIS AGENTE DE ADUANAS:

 

International postal service for our BtoB market.

 

We work closely with Control de Union and our Collaborative Networks to add on the packaging the Nutrition, Sanitary Certifications & Regulatory International Public Specialists* Logos.

 

Building an appropriate National & International Business Development.

 

CONTINUOUSLY INNOVATING

  1. Product Buyable with more Cryptocurrency. 
  2. Fusion Community: Indiegogo Backers & Crypters.

 

INCREASE THE TEAM 

Hire at least 5 Collaborators during the First Year.

 

CREATE NEW PLEASURES

Purple Corn Powder de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

The Purple Corn is a subtropical plant native to Peru that is cultivated in the lower valleys of the Andes, where it has been called "Kculli" in Quechua and used as food for centuries. Thanks to this powder you will be able to elaborate “La Chicha Morada”.

“La Chicha Morada” is a drink between purple and black and it is made of boiled purple corn powder infused with pineapple, cinnamon and cloves - sometimes strawberries and lime as well. It is served fresh in the street markets, in fine restaurants and in the home kitchens throughout Peru.

 

Tricolor Quinoa “Black, Red & White” de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

Quinoa reached its maximum fame when it was established as a fundamental food for NASA astronauts and has been considered as staple food for athletes. There is no doubt that this pseudocereal is considered ‘superfood’.

Ideal for children, pregnant women, athletes, diabetics, people with depression, with cholesterol, with constipation, for those who want to lose weight. It has been used for thousands of years in the Andes, the Incas used it and even considered it sacred.

 

Maca Duo “Black & Red” de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)

Although Maca has been consumed by the Andean people for centuries, it is only in recent years that it has gained great popularity due to its numerous nutritional properties.

Native to the Andes and with a great resemblance to radishes, this food is a tuber that grows only at certain altitudes, above 3,500 meters high, and where almost no other form of plant life exists.

 

BECOME WHOLESALER

Thanks to the experience and our meetings made during this project. We have been able to gather a important networking of suppliers, allowing us to start exporting 100% Organic Peruvian  products in large volumes.

Coming soon on Alibaba and others suppliers website. 

 

DIVERSIFY OUR PRODUCT

  1. Creating New Recipes.
  2. Starting Production of Organic Peruvian Beverages.

 

OPEN NEW MARKET 

  1. Online Worwilde.
  2. National Stores Retailers.
  3. International Stores Retailers.
  4. Business Collaboration for Country Brand Expansion.

Contact: info@laabuelaorganica.com

 

Build the foundations of our own ICO. 

 

By your purchase, you invest in the Company; you believe in the Project and by this simple fact, we will Never Forget You.

First LAO innovation for you, an Unique Discount:

 

10% LIFE Promotion in LAO Pleasures.

 

 

We will build a Decentralized Company where our customers can become investors and profit from the financial profits of LAO Company.

Yes, we we will launch our ICO.

An ICO (Initial Coin Offering) it's a fundraising mechanism in which New Projects sell their underlying crypto tokens in exchange for bitcoin or others cryptocurrency. It is somewhat similar to an Initial Public Offering (IPO) in which investors purchase shares of a company.

 

Before the ICO, we will continue to build our networking. 

Spreading our ideas, our values through Exceptional-Worlwilde recognised Snacks & Beverages from our Country. 

Building a New Brand who will surpass our generations sharing its economic gain with its entire Community & Charitable Projects. 

 

The benefits of this crowdfunding contribute, exclusively to the development of LAO        through Two Major Objectives:

 

I. Launch New Snacks & Beverages Products. 

Following our Product listing, an including International Sanitary Certifications, Regulatory Public Specialists and a MOQ Tube Packaging to start. 

II. Create the LAO Website.

Not only to introduce and sell our products Company but also creating a New Market Place 100% Organic with others National & International Brands.             

We will develop the option for consumers to pay in Cryptocurrency.

 

We will not market the Brand LAO under this logo.  

 

We are currenctly working  on Two New Logo adding the face of our main actresses. 

Two magnificient & humble women whose faces will become immortal and borderless. They would accept 10$ but the spirit of LAO don't think like that.

1% of the total profits of the Company to her and her descendants for life. 

 

 

WHERE & WHEN WE SHIP:

LAO Limited Mug and Physical Bitcoin Worlwilde Shipping for January 2019.

 INCREASE THE TEAM Hire at least 5 Collaborators during the First Year. CREATE NEW PLEASURESPurple Corn Powder de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)The Purple Corn is a subtropical plant native to Peru that is cultivated in the lower valleys of the Andes, where it has been called "Kculli" in Quechua and used as food for centuries. Thanks to this powder you will be able to elaborate “La Chicha Morada”.“La Chicha Morada” is a drink between purple and black and it is made of boiled purple corn powder infused with pineapple, cinnamon and cloves - sometimes strawberries and lime as well. It is served fresh in the street markets, in fine restaurants and in the home kitchens throughout Peru. Tricolor Quinoa “Black, Red & White” de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)Quinoa reached its maximum fame when it was established as a fundamental food for NASA astronauts and has been considered as staple food for athletes. There is no doubt that this pseudocereal is considered ‘superfood’.Ideal for children, pregnant women, athletes, diabetics, people with depression, with cholesterol, with constipation, for those who want to lose weight. It has been used for thousands of years in the Andes, the Incas used it and even considered it sacred. Maca Duo “Black & Red” de La Abuela Orgánica (LAO)Although Maca has been consumed by the Andean people for centuries, it is only in recent years that it has gained great popularity due to its numerous nutritional properties.Native to the Andes and with a great resemblance to radishes, this food is a tuber that grows only at certain altitudes, above 3,500 meters high, and where almost no other form of plant life exists. BECOME WHOLESALERThanks to the experience and our meetings made during this project. We have been able to gather a important networking of suppliers, allowing us to start exporting 100% Organic Peruvian  products in large volumes.Coming soon on Alibaba and others suppliers website.  DIVERSIFY OUR PRODUCT
Creating New Recipes.
Starting Production of Organic Peruvian Beverages.
 OPEN NEW MARKET 
Online Worwilde.
National Stores Retailers.
International Stores Retailers.
Business Collaboration for Country Brand Expansion.
Contact: info@laabuelaorganica.com Build the foundations of our own ICO.  By your purchase, you invest in the Company; you believe in the Project and by this simple fact, we will Never Forget You.First LAO innovation for you, an Unique Discount: 10% LIFE Promotion in LAO Pleasures.  We will build a Decentralized Company where our customers can become investors and profit from the financial profits of LAO Company.Yes, we we will launch our ICO.An ICO (Initial Coin Offering) it's a fundraising mechanism in which New Projects sell their underlying crypto tokens in exchange for bitcoin or others cryptocurrency. It is somewhat similar to an Initial Public Offering (IPO) in which investors purchase shares of a company. Before the ICO, we will continue to build our networking. Spreading our ideas, our values through Exceptional-Worlwilde recognised Snacks & Beverages from our Country. Building a New Brand who will surpass our generations sharing its economic gain with its entire Community & Charitable Projects.  The benefits of this crowdfunding contribute, exclusively to the development of LAO        through Two Major Objectives: I. Launch New Snacks & Beverages Products. Following our Product listing, an including International Sanitary Certifications, Regulatory Public Specialists and a MOQ Tube Packaging to start. II. Create the LAO Website.Not only to introduce and sell our products Company but also creating a New Market Place 100% Organic with others National & International Brands.             We will develop the option for consumers to pay in Cryptocurrency. We will not market the Brand LAO under this logo.   We are currenctly working  on Two New Logo adding the face of our main actresses. Two magnificient & humble women whose faces will become immortal and borderless. They would accept 10$ but the spirit of LAO don't think like that.1% of the total profits of the Company to her and her descendants for life.   WHERE & WHEN WE SHIP:LAO Limited Mug and Physical Bitcoin Worlwilde Shipping for January 2019.

story:
For 20 years we have been living in Italy building intimate relationships with wine producers, restaurant owners, sommelier, and wine enthusiasts, hence our name "INTIMO WINES."

We are now returning home to the US to represent our meticulously chosen portfolio of producers and their finest wines and vintages.  

The wines we have carefully selected are as far as you can get from mass market.

Each producer we work with produces 10,000 bottles a year, or less, of each selected wine, giving every bottle the upmost importance and quality.

These are the wines that Italians love to drink, for this reason these particular wines rarely make their way to the US. 

Our goal is to allow fellow wine lovers in the US to experience what it truly means to live and drink wine in Italy, without paying the typically high prices. As all wine lovers know, unfortunately imported wines are marked up considerably by the importer, then the distributor or wholesaler, and then again by the retailer. 

To achieve our goal, we opened Intimo Wines LLC and created an ADHOC portfolio of premier wines and the best vintages of each.

We then successfully obtained our federal basic permit for importing wine into the US, fully registered each wine label with the TTB for (COLA) certification approval, and had each producer individually register with the FDA while nominating Intimo Wines LLC as their FDA broker and National Importer.

We have also recently partnered with an exclusive wine shop in New Hampshire who will be operating under the name "Intimo Wines Wine Shop" and who will offer only the wines imported and represented by Intimo Wines LLC. 

Due to current alcohol and Direct To Client (DTC) shipping laws, Intimo Wines Wine Shop in New Hampshire will also focus on shipping wines to the 15 states where we are licensed to ship, allowing the public in more or less 1/3 of the country to place orders online rather than visiting the wine shop in New Hampshire. 

We have chosen our logistics provider/freight forwarder, and we are now ready to import the first portfolio. A unique collection of 92 reds, 47 whites, 8 rosè, 6 spumante, and 7 prosecco, from North Italy, South Italy, and the islands, obviously completely certified DOC, DOCG, or IGT.

You can find the complete portfolio of Intimo Wines LLC  online with links to each producer at www.intimowines.com 

However we need some help to make this dream come true, and this is where you come in.

In order to cover the costs of licensing, logistics, taxes, and above all, the WINE, we are looking for funding (pre-orders) from individuals interested in obtaining wines from our portfolio at a discounted and otherwise impossible price. 

So what we have decided to do is to offer you the possibility to join Intimo Wines, and to obtain the wines in our portfolio with little to no mark up at all, you will be basically buying directly from the wine producer in Italy with only the added cost of importation and shipping. 

Intimo Wines LLC is not interested in producing profit at this stage in our development, our main goal is to introduce our portfolio to the US, and to establish relationships with fellow wine admirers such as yourselves. Specifically those who appreciate the time and work we put into selecting our ADHOC portfolio of high quality fine Italian wine, produced by passionate wine makers who are focused on the wine itself rather than the profits or sales. 

Our goal is to receive the necessary funding with in the first weeks of August, we will then purchase the wines, one full container (roughly 6,000 bottles) which will then be shipped (40 days give or take) to the appropriate port of entry in Maine, and following customs clearance, the wines will be stored in our partners warehouse where each wine will be scanned, entered into our database, and prepared for delivery. 

If all goes well, the wines should arrive to our backers doorsteps before the end of September or early October.

story:
LIVE ON CEREALTHY.COM

DISCOVER THE WORLD'S FIRST NON-DAIRY CREAMERS, MILKS AND SUPERFOOD BLENDS DRINKS REFILLABLE CAPSULES/PODS COMPATIBLE WITH KEURIG*, NESPRESSO* & DOLCE GUSTO* MACHINES: 

Cerealthy® dairy free capsules (refillable & reusable over 500 times) can be used as daily coffee creamer…

….Probably you would like to enjoy a delicious fresh creamy Pistachio drink...

….Have you already tasted a smoothie made from a frozen banana, peanut butter and fresh Almond milk? It will blow your mind!

It's Tea time! Let's have a cup of Creamy Spelt Tea...

…You can also enjoy your favourite hot plant-based drink on-the-go such as a Chocolate with Hazelnut drink…

Find more HD Videos and recipes on Cerealthy.com/recipes

 

OUR PLANT-BASED CREAMERS, MILKS AND SUPERFOOD DRINKS ARE AWESOME:  

100% NATURAL, VEGAN, SUGAR FREE, NON-GMO, DAIRY FREE, PRESERVATIVE AND ADDITIVE FREE, NON-PERISHABLE, CLEAN LABEL.

  • Dairy Free, Lactose Free & Sugar Free ; 

  • Non – GMO ;

  • Handy, Healthy & Affordable ;

  • Clean Label: What you read is what you get and it's 100% plant-based ;

  • Flexible Portion Sizes: Just use what you need ;

  • Quick and Easy Preparation: Push the button, it’s ready, ENJOY!

  • Multiples Uses: On its own, as a coffee/chocolate/tea creamer, in smoothies, in a dish, etc...  

  • No Mess in your kitchen: You know the straining part itself is messy ;

  • Non-Perishable : Our plant-based drinks have a long shelf life (one year), which allows you to keep them for a long time without wasting money and food.  

  • Preservatives and Additives Free: In our products you will never find emulsifiers, sweeteners, thickeners, flavorings and coloring agents, etc....Our products are VEGAN!

  • The capsules/pods are REFILLABLE & REUSABLE (Over 500 times > 100 liters = 22/24 Gallons)!

GRAIN NON-DAIRY CREAMERS & MILKS:

Oat milk: It is digestive, it has a mild taste, and it is a good alternative to wheat. Very nutritious and with soluble fiber, it relaxes the nervous system and provides B vitamins. 

This Espresso with Oat Creamer is a coffee lovers' dream!

Spelt milk: It has a high content of tryptophan; an amino acid that is usually associated with good humor. Therefore, spelt drink is recommended in cases of depression, low motivation, decay.

NUT NON-DAIRY CREAMERS & MILKS:

Almond milk: The presence of vitamin B2 helps the nails, the hair to strengthen and the skin has a better hydration. It’s an astringent drink, it means it’s really helpful with diarrea for his high contribution in potassium.

This Smoothie made from frozen Banana, Peanut butter and Almond drink will blow your mind!

Coconut milk: It’s mildly sweet and creamy, making it a favorite over cereal and in coffee. It has also become a highlight of many cuisines in the tropical and subtropical countries where they are grown. That's why it's so popular in curry dishes.

Hazelnut milk: It is cholesterol free and an excellent source of B1, B2, B6 and vitamin E. The flavour is nutty and crisp. For those who hate the taste of dairy drink, but want to pour a creamy liquid into their coffee or over their cereal, hazelnut drink is a viable option. 

This Hot Chocolate with Hazelnut Creamer is Amazing ; You have to try this!

Pistachio milk: This is the latest dairy-free nut drink trend. It's a great source of healthy (monounsaturated) fats as well as plant protein and it contains natural plant sterols which work positively with the blood cholesterol levels; and resveratrol – the antioxidant made famous from red wine.

This Fresh Pistachio Drink is so Delicious: Smooth and Creamy! 

PLANT-BASED SUPERFOOD BLENDS MILKS:

Be Calm: Let the Superfoods Soothe You! An Instant Super Blend Almond Milk made with Açai, Baobab and Cinnamon, sweetened with Lucuma.

  • Açai is a superfruit that enhances nutrients absorption, slows down aging, detoxifies the body and provides amazing skin benefits.
  • Baobab is a superfruit that increases bone strength, treats chronic diseases, relieves gastrointestinal issues and regulates body fluids.
  • Cinnamon is a spice that protects the nervous system and the heart, helps treat Parkinson’s disease, provides bone health and it’s effective against HIV.
  • Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
  • Almond Milk : The presence of vitamin B2 helps the nails, the hair to strengthen and the skin has a better hydration. It’s an astringent drink, it means it’s really helpful with diarrea for his high contribution in potassium.

Be Clean: Let the Superfoods Strengthen You! An Instant Super Blend Pistachio Milk made with Banana, Maca and Turmeric, sweetened with Lucuma.

  • Baobab is a superfruit that increases bone strength, treats chronic diseases, relieves gastrointestinal issues and regulates body fluids.
  • Chlorella is an algae that detoxifies radiation and chemotherapy, detoxifies heavy metals, enhances immunity, improves oral health, increases endurance and stamina.
  • Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
  • Pumpkin is a superfruit that boosts immune system, helps memory and concentration, protects prostate, improves sperm quality and heart health.
  • Spelt Milk : It has a high content of tryptophan; an aminoacid that is usually associated with good humor. Therefore, spelt milk is recommended in cases of depression, desmotivation, decay.

Be Lovely: Let the Superfoods Love You: BE LOVELY! A Plant-based Super Blend Oat Milk made with Beetroot, Camu Camu, Ginger and Goji Berry, sweetened with Lucuma.

  • Beetroot  is a plant that manages anemia, reduces harmful cholesterol, enhances sports performance, prevents premature balding and hair loss.
  • Camu Camu is the Vitamin C powerhouse superfruit that reduces mood swings and enhances moods, keeps hair, skin, nails, and joints healthy, relieves arthritis pain,improves liver health and metabolism.
  • Ginger is a spice that removes bad breath, relieves congestion and cold, cures acne, promotes hair growth and reduces muscle soreness.
  • Goji Berry is a superfruit that prevents aging, protects from heart disease, improves eyesight and stabilises blood sugar.
  • Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
  • Oat Milk : It is digestive, it has a mild taste and is a good alternative to wheat. Very nutritious and with soluble fiber, it relaxes the nervous system and provides B vitamins.

Be Sweet: Let the Superfoods Sweeten You! An Instant Super Blend Hazelnut Milk made with Carob, Chaga and Cinnamon, sweetened with Lucuma.

  • Carob is a plant and a caffeine free alternative to chocolate that stabilizes blood glucose, improves digestion, helps relieves diarrhea and manages weight.
  • Chaga is a mushroom that lows blood sugar, slows aging process, boosts longevity and healing, relieves pain, manages stress and anxiety.
  • Cinnamon is a spice that protects the nervous system and the heart, helps treat Parkinson’s disease, provides bone health and it’s effective against HIV.
  • Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
  • Hazelnut Milk: It is cholesterol free and an excellent source of B1, B2, B6 and vitamin E. The flavour is nutty and crisp. For those who hate the taste of dairy milk, but want to pour a creamy liquid into their coffee or over their cereal, hazelnut milk is a viable option.

Be Strong: Let the Superfoods Strengthen You! An Instant Super Blend Pistachio Milk made with Banana, Maca and Turmeric, sweetened with Lucuma

  • Banana is a superfruit that protects against muscle cramps, strengthens blood, relieves anemia and Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD), reduces swelling and helps overcome depression.
  • Maca is a plant that increases sexual libido, improves sperm count and motility, helps with potential pregnancy, promotes homeostasis, increases energy and endurance.
  • Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
  • Turmeric is a spice that increases antioxidant capacity, decreases congestion, treats menstrual issues, increases cognitive abilities, prevents Alzheimer's disease.
  • Pistachio Milk : This is the latest dairy-free nut milk trend. It's a great source of healthy (monounsaturated) fats as well as plant protein and it contains natural plant sterols which work positively with the blood cholesterol levels; and resveratrol – the antioxidant made famous from red wine.

PERKS:

Each refillable capsule or pod (Compatible with Keurig, Nespresso or Dolce Gusto) is delivered with a serving spoon, a biodegradable pouch of 40g (1.41 o.z.) of the non-dairy milk or superfood blend you picked. Buy more than one to try our 11 different flavours/recipes: Almond, Coconut, Hazelnut, Oat, Pistachio, Spelt and Superfood blends Be Calm, Be Clean, Be Lovely, Be Strong & Be Sweet.

WHAT'S INCLUDED: The plant-based Cerealthy's kit contains 1 Refillable Pod for Nespresso®*, Keurig®* or Dolce Gusto®* System + 1 Manual Dispenser + 1 bamboo scoop + 1 biodegradable Pouch of your favorite non-dairy milk or Plant-based Superfood Blend Milk (1.41 oz - 40g).

See below an exemple of what you will recieve (plant-based Almond Milk Kit):

Don't forget to add Refill pouches to taste other flavors and recipes.

NON-DAIRY GRAIN & NUT MILKS KIT & REFILLS:

 

NON-DAIRY SUPERFOOD BLEND MILKS KIT & REFILLS:

NUTRITION FACTS & INGREDIENTS:

OAT CREAMER & DRINK IS MADE FROM 100% NON-GMO OAT, NOTHING ELSE! CHEERS

One of the secrets of CEREALTHY® plant-based creamers, milks and drinks capsules is how these are obtained: Plant-based ingredients are heat-treat prior to milling. Thanks to this process, we can retain the loose plant-based fibers (beta-glucans) in our creamers and drinks.

We DO NOT add different ingredients! 

CEREALTHY® creamers and drinks are FREE from oil (such as coconut oil, palm oil, etc...) and FULL of natural nutrients (Calcium, Vitamins, Antioxidants, Iron).

CEREALTHY® PLANT-BASED CREAMERS, MILKS & SUPERFOOD DRINKS CAPSULES COMPATIBILITY:

Keurig®* coffee & tea makers:

If you are not sure whether your machine is compatible, please send us a message with the picture/model of your Keurig®* coffee makers for confirmation.

Nespresso®* coffee machines:

Use our compatible pods that are safe for your Nespresso® machine, your body, and the environment. Works with Nespresso Citiz, Citiz-drink, Concept, Essenza, Essenza Krups, Gran Maestria, Inissia, Latissima+, Latissima, Le Cube, Maestria, Pixie, U, and U-drink. Not compatible with Virtuo/Vertuo line machine. If you are not sure whether your machine is compatible, please send us a message with the picture/model of your machine for confirmation.

Néscafé® Dolce Gusto®* coffee machines:

Circolo, Creativa +, Drop, Eclipse, Fontana, Genio 1 & 2, Jovia, Melody 2 & 3, Mini-me, Movenza, Oblo, Piccolo, Stelia. In case of doubt contact us, we will make sure our compatible capsules give you the best plant-based drink experience ever. If you are not sure whether your machine is compatible, please send us a message with the picture/model of your machine for confirmation.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER*:

* Nespresso® and their logos, and Néscafé Dolce Gusto® and their logos are brands registered by Société des Produits Nestlé S.A., Brand names and references of machine models are made solely with the aim of indicating our products compatibility. Our products or company are not associated in any way, nor have not been approved and/or endorsed and/or sponsored by Société des Produits Nestlé SA.

*Keurig®* coffee & tea makers and their logos, and Néscafé Dolce Gusto® and their logos are brands registered by KEURIG, Brand names and references of machine models are made solely with the aim of indicating our products compatibility. Our products or company are not associated in any way, nor have not been approved and/or endorsed and/or sponsored by Keurig Company.

PACKAGING & SHIPMENT: 

Nacked packaging: Cerealthy® "goes naked" for packaging pollution awareness. We will ship the capsules (refillable & reusable over 500 times) with strong minimalist external packaging. We refer to packaging that could be reused or recycled resulting in a zero negative environmental impact. We will make sure our external packaging will be as good for you backers and the environment as the product. 

TIMELINE:

DISCOVER MY STORY:

Have you ever imagine the work of your dream ? I did. Mine was creating something that would impact the world for the better and that would make a difference for Animals.  

Since I was a little girl I felt this wonderful connection with them : I adopted homeless dogs and cats, I chose products that were cruelty-free and I also changed my diet to a plant-based one.

I studied laws, reason why I’ve started to work as an Animal Rights’ Lawyer.  

I‘ve represented in the Court more that 70 causes of animal cruelty: dogs, cats, horses.  

I’ve lectured in several national and international Animal Rights Conferences.

With a small group of people, we’ve created for the first time an Animal Rights Subject in the Law School of the University of Cordoba. In 2012, it became the first American University to teach animal protection laws to future lawyers.

I knew that it was time to move forward and change the game from the inside out. It was the moment to be a conscious entrepreneur.

As it's been a long time since I have stopped drinking cow milk, I have decided to create a plant-based products line that would include drinks made from grains and nuts.

The idea was simple: offer a healthy and practical product that could be easily consumed by us, humans!

By 2016, I've started doing product tests and I've created Cerealthy®: http://cerealthy.com

Nowsaday I also keep working as an Animal Righst Lawyer and I daily write a Blog about Animals and their rights all around the world: http://www.animalesensuderecho.com

I want to thank you for reading and supporting this innovation. It’s been a nice trip and I’ve really enjoyed working on this crowdfunding campaign. It’s a dream come true !!

FUND REASONS:

YOUR CONTRIBUTION HELPS CEREALTHY® TO GROW.

  • This project will help raise funds for our first capsules production run. It will cover the costs of ingredients, manufacturing, packaging, labeling and delivering. You can help us make CEREALTHY® Capsules & Pods available to you by March 2019!
  • We care about ensuring all our products are manufactured in a facility respectful of all standards: Traceability, quality control, labeling. We can’t reach our goal without the help of our Indiegogo supporters.  
  • Purchasing first grade of plant-based ingredients ;
  • Manufacturing: purchasing a second specialized milling equipment to increase the production ; 
  • Packaging & Labeling: buying from our provider the newly designed boxes ;
  • Delivering around the world  ;
  • Marketing to increase CEREALTHY® products’s visibility.
