This Fresh Pistachio Drink is so Delicious: Smooth and Creamy! 
PLANT-BASED SUPERFOOD BLENDS MILKS:
Be Calm: Let the Superfoods Soothe You! An Instant Super Blend Almond Milk made with Açai, Baobab and Cinnamon, sweetened with Lucuma.

Açai is a superfruit that enhances nutrients absorption, slows down aging, detoxifies the body and provides amazing skin benefits.
Baobab is a superfruit that increases bone strength, treats chronic diseases, relieves gastrointestinal issues and regulates body fluids.
Cinnamon is a spice that protects the nervous system and the heart, helps treat Parkinson’s disease, provides bone health and it’s effective against HIV.
Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
Almond Milk : The presence of vitamin B2 helps the nails, the hair to strengthen and the skin has a better hydration. It’s an astringent drink, it means it’s really helpful with diarrea for his high contribution in potassium.


Be Clean: Let the Superfoods Strengthen You! An Instant Super Blend Pistachio Milk made with Banana, Maca and Turmeric, sweetened with Lucuma.

Baobab is a superfruit that increases bone strength, treats chronic diseases, relieves gastrointestinal issues and regulates body fluids.
Chlorella is an algae that detoxifies radiation and chemotherapy, detoxifies heavy metals, enhances immunity, improves oral health, increases endurance and stamina.
Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
Pumpkin is a superfruit that boosts immune system, helps memory and concentration, protects prostate, improves sperm quality and heart health.
Spelt Milk : It has a high content of tryptophan; an aminoacid that is usually associated with good humor. Therefore, spelt milk is recommended in cases of depression, desmotivation, decay.


Be Lovely: Let the Superfoods Love You: BE LOVELY! A Plant-based Super Blend Oat Milk made with Beetroot, Camu Camu, Ginger and Goji Berry, sweetened with Lucuma.

Beetroot  is a plant that manages anemia, reduces harmful cholesterol, enhances sports performance, prevents premature balding and hair loss.
Camu Camu is the Vitamin C powerhouse superfruit that reduces mood swings and enhances moods, keeps hair, skin, nails, and joints healthy, relieves arthritis pain,improves liver health and metabolism.
Ginger is a spice that removes bad breath, relieves congestion and cold, cures acne, promotes hair growth and reduces muscle soreness.
Goji Berry is a superfruit that prevents aging, protects from heart disease, improves eyesight and stabilises blood sugar.
Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
Oat Milk : It is digestive, it has a mild taste and is a good alternative to wheat. Very nutritious and with soluble fiber, it relaxes the nervous system and provides B vitamins.


Be Sweet: Let the Superfoods Sweeten You! An Instant Super Blend Hazelnut Milk made with Carob, Chaga and Cinnamon, sweetened with Lucuma.

Carob is a plant and a caffeine free alternative to chocolate that stabilizes blood glucose, improves digestion, helps relieves diarrhea and manages weight.
Chaga is a mushroom that lows blood sugar, slows aging process, boosts longevity and healing, relieves pain, manages stress and anxiety.
Cinnamon is a spice that protects the nervous system and the heart, helps treat Parkinson’s disease, provides bone health and it’s effective against HIV.
Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
Hazelnut Milk: It is cholesterol free and an excellent source of B1, B2, B6 and vitamin E. The flavour is nutty and crisp. For those who hate the taste of dairy milk, but want to pour a creamy liquid into their coffee or over their cereal, hazelnut milk is a viable option.


Be Strong: Let the Superfoods Strengthen You! An Instant Super Blend Pistachio Milk made with Banana, Maca and Turmeric, sweetened with Lucuma

Banana is a superfruit that protects against muscle cramps, strengthens blood, relieves anemia and Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD), reduces swelling and helps overcome depression.
Maca is a plant that increases sexual libido, improves sperm count and motility, helps with potential pregnancy, promotes homeostasis, increases energy and endurance.
Lucuma is a superfruit and the best alternative to sugar. Natural low GI sweetner, good source of fiber, prevents weight gain, improves digestive health, it’s anti-bacterial and anti-viral.
Turmeric is a spice that increases antioxidant capacity, decreases congestion, treats menstrual issues, increases cognitive abilities, prevents Alzheimer's disease.
Pistachio Milk : This is the latest dairy-free nut milk trend. It's a great source of healthy (monounsaturated) fats as well as plant protein and it contains natural plant sterols which work positively with the blood cholesterol levels; and resveratrol – the antioxidant made famous from red wine.


PERKS:
Each refillable capsule or pod (Compatible with Keurig, Nespresso or Dolce Gusto) is delivered with a serving spoon, a biodegradable pouch of 40g (1.41 o.z.) of the non-dairy milk or superfood blend you picked. Buy more than one to try our 11 different flavours/recipes: Almond, Coconut, Hazelnut, Oat, Pistachio, Spelt and Superfood blends Be Calm, Be Clean, Be Lovely, Be Strong & Be Sweet.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: The plant-based Cerealthy's kit contains 1 Refillable Pod for Nespresso®*, Keurig®* or Dolce Gusto®* System + 1 Manual Dispenser + 1 bamboo scoop + 1 biodegradable Pouch of your favorite non-dairy milk or Plant-based Superfood Blend Milk (1.41 oz - 40g).
See below an exemple of what you will recieve (plant-based Almond Milk Kit):

Don't forget to add Refill pouches to taste other flavors and recipes.
NON-DAIRY GRAIN & NUT MILKS KIT & REFILLS:








 
NON-DAIRY SUPERFOOD BLEND MILKS KIT & REFILLS:












NUTRITION FACTS & INGREDIENTS:

OAT CREAMER & DRINK IS MADE FROM 100% NON-GMO OAT, NOTHING ELSE! CHEERS
One of the secrets of CEREALTHY® plant-based creamers, milks and drinks capsules is how these are obtained: Plant-based ingredients are heat-treat prior to milling. Thanks to this process, we can retain the loose plant-based fibers (beta-glucans) in our creamers and drinks.
We DO NOT add different ingredients! 
CEREALTHY® creamers and drinks are FREE from oil (such as coconut oil, palm oil, etc...) and FULL of natural nutrients (Calcium, Vitamins, Antioxidants, Iron).
CEREALTHY® PLANT-BASED CREAMERS, MILKS & SUPERFOOD DRINKS CAPSULES COMPATIBILITY:
Keurig®* coffee & tea makers:

If you are not sure whether your machine is compatible, please send us a message with the picture/model of your Keurig®* coffee makers for confirmation.
Nespresso®* coffee machines:

Use our compatible pods that are safe for your Nespresso® machine, your body, and the environment. Works with Nespresso Citiz, Citiz-drink, Concept, Essenza, Essenza Krups, Gran Maestria, Inissia, Latissima+, Latissima, Le Cube, Maestria, Pixie, U, and U-drink. Not compatible with Virtuo/Vertuo line machine. If you are not sure whether your machine is compatible, please send us a message with the picture/model of your machine for confirmation.
Néscafé® Dolce Gusto®* coffee machines:

Circolo, Creativa +, Drop, Eclipse, Fontana, Genio 1 & 2, Jovia, Melody 2 & 3, Mini-me, Movenza, Oblo, Piccolo, Stelia. In case of doubt contact us, we will make sure our compatible capsules give you the best plant-based drink experience ever. If you are not sure whether your machine is compatible, please send us a message with the picture/model of your machine for confirmation.
LEGAL DISCLAIMER*:
* Nespresso® and their logos, and Néscafé Dolce Gusto® and their logos are brands registered by Société des Produits Nestlé S.A., Brand names and references of machine models are made solely with the aim of indicating our products compatibility. Our products or company are not associated in any way, nor have not been approved and/or endorsed and/or sponsored by Société des Produits Nestlé SA.
*Keurig®* coffee & tea makers and their logos, and Néscafé Dolce Gusto® and their logos are brands registered by KEURIG, Brand names and references of machine models are made solely with the aim of indicating our products compatibility. Our products or company are not associated in any way, nor have not been approved and/or endorsed and/or sponsored by Keurig Company.
PACKAGING & SHIPMENT: 
Nacked packaging: Cerealthy® "goes naked" for packaging pollution awareness. We will ship the capsules (refillable & reusable over 500 times) with strong minimalist external packaging. We refer to packaging that could be reused or recycled resulting in a zero negative environmental impact. We will make sure our external packaging will be as good for you backers and the environment as the product. 
TIMELINE:

DISCOVER MY STORY:
Have you ever imagine the work of your dream ? I did. Mine was creating something that would impact the world for the better and that would make a difference for Animals.  
Since I was a little girl I felt this wonderful connection with them : I adopted homeless dogs and cats, I chose products that were cruelty-free and I also changed my diet to a plant-based one.

I studied laws, reason why I’ve started to work as an Animal Rights’ Lawyer.  
I‘ve represented in the Court more that 70 causes of animal cruelty: dogs, cats, horses.  
I’ve lectured in several national and international Animal Rights Conferences.

With a small group of people, we’ve created for the first time an Animal Rights Subject in the Law School of the University of Cordoba. In 2012, it became the first American University to teach animal protection laws to future lawyers.
I knew that it was time to move forward and change the game from the inside out. It was the moment to be a conscious entrepreneur.
As it's been a long time since I have stopped drinking cow milk, I have decided to create a plant-based products line that would include drinks made from grains and nuts.
The idea was simple: offer a healthy and practical product that could be easily consumed by us, humans!
By 2016, I've started doing product tests and I've created Cerealthy®: http://cerealthy.com

Nowsaday I also keep working as an Animal Righst Lawyer and I daily write a Blog about Animals and their rights all around the world: http://www.animalesensuderecho.com
I want to thank you for reading and supporting this innovation. It’s been a nice trip and I’ve really enjoyed working on this crowdfunding campaign. It’s a dream come true !!
FUND REASONS:
YOUR CONTRIBUTION HELPS CEREALTHY® TO GROW.

This project will help raise funds for our first capsules production run. It will cover the costs of ingredients, manufacturing, packaging, labeling and delivering. You can help us make CEREALTHY® Capsules & Pods available to you by March 2019!
We care about ensuring all our products are manufactured in a facility respectful of all standards: Traceability, quality control, labeling. We can’t reach our goal without the help of our Indiegogo supporters.  
Purchasing first grade of plant-based ingredients ;
Manufacturing: purchasing a second specialized milling equipment to increase the production ; 
Packaging & Labeling: buying from our provider the newly designed boxes ;
Delivering around the world  ;
Marketing to increase CEREALTHY® products’s visibility.

story:
Sooooo what's Yeet?

By mixing CBD with our careful selection of Natural Plant Extracts and Vitamin Supplements, then blending them into our refreshing high in antioxidant Blueberry & Cranberry Juice, we have managed to formulate what we think is the perfect post-night concoction.

Let's explain how it works. Meet all the components to the beverage below. Take a look at all the goodness that’s inside, and how they can make your Sundays feel sooo much better.

Organic CBD Oil - Natural Pain & Anxiety Relief 

The UK has finally been blessed with the legalisation of this key ingredient in YEET.
One of the most celebrated health benefits of our CBD oil is its natural analgesic (pain relieving) effects. CBD interacts with receptors in the brain and immune system to reduce inflammation and alleviate pain. 
It also helps to relax the mind and body helping you to feel more chilled and happy by improving serotonin levels, which helps to reduce anxiety and improve mental health.
CBD gives you a little buzz, which is difficult to explain in literal terms, but imagine you've just been told some unexpected good news and for the rest of that day you've got a spring in your step. It's like that.

Vitamin C - Stronger Immune System

Vitamin C is necessary for the growth, development and repair of all body tissues. In other words, it helps to heal everything.
It’s involved in many body functions, including formation of collagen, absorption of iron, the immune system, wound healing, and the maintenance of cartilage, bones, and teeth.
After a night out, usually due to a lack of sleep your immune system will be weaker than usual. Leaving you at a higher risk of catching other illness or fighting anything you may already have.
YEET’s high dosage of Vitamin C will boost your immune system and speed up your post-night  recovery process and reduce the risk of you coming down with any mischievous illnesses. 

Organic Prickly Pear Extracts - Liver Detoxifier 

The fruit of the prickly pear cactus is a lean, green alcohol fighting machine. Grown in Mexico and in Southwestern US, researchers believe that prickly pear extracts can reduce inflammation in the liver caused by a night of heavy boozing — elevating headaches, nausea, dry mouth and other symptoms associated with liver inflammation.

Organic Milk Thistle Extracts - Liver Health

Milk Thistle was approved in 1986 as a treatment for liver disease and it is widely used on alcoholic hepatitis, alcoholic fatty liver, cirrhosis, liver poisoning and viral hepatitis. The active ingredient or liver-protecting compound in Milk Thistle is known as silymarin. This substance helps repair liver cells damaged by alcohol and other toxic substances by stimulating protein synthesis. By changing the outside layer of liver cells, it also prevents certain toxins from getting inside. Silymarin also encourages liver cell growth. 

Put simply, alcohol is bad for your liver, but Milk Thistle is good!


Vitamin D - Improves Mood & Energy

Vitamin D is naturally absorbed from the sun through our skin and eyes. However with indoor lifestyles becoming increasingly common, Vitamin D deficiency is higher than expected. Every tissue in the body has Vitamin D receptors, including the brain, heart, muscles, and immune system, which means Vitamin D is needed at every level for the body to function. Having a boost in Vitamin D levels can help to reduce fatigue, increase your bodies serotonin production, and facilitate normal immune system function. Generally, giving you more energy.

Risks, Challenges and Why we are Crowfunding?

The recipe is effective and tasty, and the ingredients and suppliers have all been sourced. The main challenge we are facing at the moment, is finding the financial resources to make the commercial batch. We invested every last penny that we had into what was meant to be our first commercial batch on March 10th however, unfortunately on the day of production after only managing to fill the first few bottles, the filters burst and we lost all our ingredients, juice and couldn't bottle the remaining 2650 bottles we were planning on filling. 

This wasn't the highlight of Yeet's existence, but we now know how to prevent the issue and are ready to fly again.

Once we manage to produce the ready for consumer sale commercial batch, we will also need to focus on creating a higher quality media presence and image which can portray our premium product in the way that it really is.

We are brand new concept and product so we understand that trust takes time to acquire, but with our crowdfunding we can improve on this by sharing our beverage and getting 1st hand feedback from our saviours and believers who are willing to back us from the very beginning.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Feel free to follow our Instagram @yeeet.co to see our mission progression.

 

All love, from Eloise and The Yeetonites xxx

story:
How does LIFT work?

Simply by giving you what you need, when you need it most, naturally. To be specific, since we add nothing, every spec of mango powder /fiber is bio accessible and bio-available to your body. Making LIFT Mango a steady yet fast way to replenish. Getting right to your mitochondria with natural vitamins, antioxidants, and electrolytes, replenishing you.

 

    Who is LIFT for?

    Made for athletes, pro or amateur, young or vintage. LIFT is Vegan, Non-Gmo, Gluten Free, & Certified Organic, a hydrator the entire active household can enjoy.  Each delicious hydration packet is an equivalent to 3/5 of a mango, only 7 grams of sugar, much easier, & less mess than bringing cut fruit to the game. 

    The science-y part

    What happens when you are dehydrated. Have a loss of energy, fluids, and focus?. King mango has a long reputation of aiding these issues. Over 3,000 years of use in Ayurveda medicine known as amchoor given to outdoor laborers to energize and replenish.

    OSU, Texas A&M  and North Carolina University and more have all done research on mango powder sighting it's use not only for hydration but better heart, eyes, brain, skin, and nail health.

     

    A Little info on the Lady creator

    Unyque Williams is a native of Phoenix, AZ. The sunny yet dangerous wild west were people die yearly from dehydration in the summer. She worked in healthcare as an EMT at trauma levels 1 & 2 for decades. Where hydration is usually one of the first course of action via IV. She is a certified Sports and exercise nutritionist, with ongoing studies in nutrition and hydration. To her hydration is life.

    Short Story

    In 2013 Creator Unyque Williams got healthy and lost 90 lbs through hard work and research. Her children were in sports and they nor she had something simple and natural to recover with. Through her research and experience she found  Mango as the victorious solution.  In 2015 she developed LIFT as a youth sports hydration drink. While selling on Amazon and connecting with customers she listened to their suggestions for changes and sold out twice. We believe Lift will help billions stay hydrated healthy and happy. However we can only take the next step for mass production with your support.

     

    We need Inventory, so you can hydrate naturally.

    We sold-out 2x on Amazon Now we need your help.

    • We are asking for 30,000 so that we can restock and give back.
    • Supporting LIFT and as a thank you get you could receive a recipe book, help pick the next fruit powder or  a new technology hydration watch!

    Lastly, thank you for your time!!

    With your help we will deliver our product, helping people rehydrate, and overall feel better. After all mango is the fruit of love, so know with your help we will also donate 10% of inventory to Youth Summer Sports Camps and the Arizona Homeless Heat Initiative giving them a little love & hydration. Please share and if you can pledge, please do, thanks again.

story:
Ok, so many of our fans have been asking for spiced rum since we opened our doors about 2 years ago. We haven’t yet made one, but it’s not for any reason other than we don’t usually drink spiced rum, and we weren’t sure about how to go about making one that would be both unique and taste incredible.

We asked ourselves, “why would we want to create something that’s been done over and over again?” and “would creating a spiced version harm our already award-winning core brands?” as well as, “do we really want to compete with those who are already doing spiced rum well?”

After plenty of wheedling and begging from our fans, careful consideration and study of various spices, and conversations with local folks we respect greatly, we’ve decided to take the plunge.

A few months ago, we met with our friends Bob and Cindy from Savory Spice Shop in Raleigh to learn about spices and which flavors go well together. After experiencing, smelling, touching and tasting a huge variety of spices, we took home some samples to begin our first experiments. Since then, we’ve landed on several delicious and yet still very unique recipes to choose from before we bring our new product to market.

We’ve protested making a spiced rum for a long time, but now’s your chance to make us do it. If we’re going to do this right, we’re going to need your help!

We need money for:

  • Raw materials, like whole spices, molasses, raw cane sugar, yeast and water
  • Packaging supplies, like bottles, corks and labels (including new label design)
  • Marketing assets for the product launch
  • And of course – the awesome rewards we’re offering as part of this campaign!

How you can help beyond donating to our campaign:

Help us let people know about it! These campaigns are all about getting visibility, and we can use all the help we can get. Share our campaign link with your friends, social media connections, coworkers, relatives and anyone else who could spare a few bucks to help us make this happen.

story:
Resume

 We are a team of 3, Samantha, Max and Eduardo. We met 3 year ago in Macroeconomics class in wich since the beginning we worked toghether in every class activity and school project, never thought of we would come this far as a team, because ever since, friendship, collaboration and commitment have been strengthened in each of us.

Our journey starts when Eduardo told us about the Hult Prize. That was the first time it was taking place in Ecuador. We were excited to compete, but one week before presentation we had no idea what our project was going to be. We presented Nutri-Aid and got second place, it got us to the national round, and we were encouraged to participate because the project needed so many improvements and we know the nationals would be a hard one to win, but we did it!The excitement to know that we were going to present our project in San Francisco was inexplicable, but still, the idea needed to get better. That is when we only had one month to do hundreds of things and exams going on! We had to seek for help to do laboratory tests, English classes and teacher support and advises. Once in San Francisco we never imagined that we will be between the 6 finalists! When Nutri-Aid was announced we could not believe it! Samantha even forgot how to use the clicker!  

Even though we did not win, but were so close, we decided to give it one more shot in the wildcard round, making a video, asking for advice and thinking how we could improve our project was everything we did about in the last 20 days, so here we are once again, with the hope that Nutri-Aid will be honored to be given the opportunity to work hard to make possible this ambitious and huge project that will help millions one day!

Samantha is in her senior year of international business at university. For her, this journey has been a new, exciting and challenging experience that has changed her point of view. “Before the Hult Prize came to my life all I wanted for me was to do a master and work in a multinational company, but since this project I have realized I don’t want to work for any company, I want my own, I want to contribute to the society and help others, so, for me, to reach the Nutri-Aid dream would be the best that can happen”, Samantha Says. “I want to see people smiling and being happy everytime the product gets to their hands, because they will know they are not alone and that help is coming”, she adds.

Samantha has participated in volunteering in hospitals, nursing homes, schools and colleges since she was in high school, so for her, helping others and bring hope and happiness in any way she can has been something that gives sense to her life.

She loves her major and will be graduated by next year. In college she has participated in many political campaigns, reaching the  student body vice-president position of the school of business and economics, and beign the student representative in the college board of education. “Being the voice of students in every corner that can reach many places”, that is her motto.

 

Max is a graduate in international business of ESPOL, works as a researcher for the Center for Competitiveness and Innovation and the Educate Foundation. He also works for Postgraduate Management School of Management (ESPAE), where he publishes academic articles on industrial studies. He is convinced that knowledge is The most powerful weapon of the peoples and is the tool to change the world. Since Max participated in Hult Prize his vision changed, social entrepreneurship was something that interested him a lot but now he knows that we can not wait for someone to do something, that someone is us, and that's why Max along with Nutri-Aid wants to win Hult prize to change the lives of millions of people who do not have access to food.

Eduardo is in his last semester of school, International Business as well, he has worked in the industry of medical equipment and supplies, imports and sales, also a family business of cacao production and different products of abundance in Ecuador as banana and rice, Which has allowed him to have knowledge of the agricultural wealth of Ecuador, its production capacity and different products with high nutritional  content; Very aware that there is  much more to explore and research in the nutritional area and that it can contribute in a more efficient and effective way to fight malnutrition and hunger worldwide.

Something more that we can say about Eduardo is his passion for service, but a service that also involves knowledge, effort and example to reach more people, has participated in social projects to prevent unwanted pregnancies and addiction to drugs in different High schools of guayaquil as well as youth leader with teachings based on "what you sow now is what you will reap in the future"

He believes that there is a generation of young people with clear principles willing not to be part any more of the problem, but part of the solution, that is why we have decided to go beyond and start up this idea that has not only changed our lives but will also change the lives of millions.

 

Crowfunding money intended for:

- Large-scale production (machinery, plant and equipment) 

-Logistics and transportation 

- Brand development and packaging design 

-packaging 

-Inputs (Acquisition of raw material) 

-Legal 

-Research 

With your help with can achieve our dream, to help millions of people.

Join us! in our campaing, Donating you can receive our product, bars of Nutri-Aid, kits of nutriaid (special edition), T-shirts, panama hats or have your name on the bar that will be distributed to refugees and our eternal gratitude and millions of people who need this food.

Also you can support our campaing You can help too! By sharing this video and support us with a photo of you with the printed image of the cover of our fanpage and upload it with the hashtag #foodforlife , you can be part of the international campaign and help millions! Share in facebook, twitter and instagram

Food for all, #FoodForAll

We met 3 year ago in Macroeconomics class in wich since the beginning we worked toghether in every class activity and school project, never thought of we would come this far as a team, because ever since, friendship, collaboration and commitment have been strengthened in each of us.  Our journey starts when Eduardo told us about the Hult Prize. That was the first time it was taking place in Ecuador. We were excited to compete, but one week before presentation we had no idea what our project was going to be. story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Ich habe mich vor einigen Jahren im Sommer sehr über die vielen Eiswürfel in Getränken aufgeregt. Der Geschmack meiner Cola wurde dadurch jedes Mal verwässert. Damals kam mir die Idee zum Coolstraw. Es musste doch eine Möglichkeit geben, Getränke kühl zu genießen, ohne dass eine Verwässerung durch auftauende Eiswürfel stattfinden würde.

So wurde die Idee geboren:

Es folgten Recherchen hinsichtlich Produkt-und Zielkundenanalysen. Nachdem diese Schritte realisiert waren, ging es nun darum, einen Maschinenbauer zu finden, der unseren Coolstraw in Serie produzieren kann. Auch diese Hürde haben wir gemeistert, doch nun ist unser anfängliches Startkapital aufgebraucht und eine Serienproduktion ist schwierig zu realisieren. Das Interesse bei vielen potentiellen Kunden ist bislang groß, jedoch die Bereitschaft große Mengen abzunehmen, klein.

Hier kommt Indiegogo ins Spiel. Mit der Hilfe vieler Unterstützer, die kleine Mengen ordern, hoffen wir endlich in die Massenproduktion gehen zu können und unser Produkt der breiten Öffentlichkeit zugänglich zu machen!

Helft mit bei der coolsten Trinkinnovation des Jahres 2018!

 

 

 

 

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

 

Für 25 US Dollars bekommst 10 Coolstraws. Als Dankeschön schenken wir euch einen Coolstraw on top!

Die Finanzmittel gehen in die Materialbeschaffung, Herstellung, Verpackung, Lohnkosten und in den Versand.

 

 

Die Folgen

 

Mit Eurem Beitrag werden wir es schaffen, dass wir auch im Sommer wieder Spaß an kühlen Getränken haben können. Verwässerte Getränke wären dann passé!

Jeder hat sich doch schon einmal über zu viel Eis in seinen Getränken aufgeregt und kennt das Ergebnis: die Beeinträchtigung des Geschmackes durch Verwässerung. Mit dem Coolstraw gehört das der Vergangenheit an!

 

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Unsere Herausforderung ist es, eine bestimmte Menge an Bestellungen zu erreichen, um in die Massenproduktion zu gehen.

Der 2. Schritt wird dann sein, an der Individualisierung des Coolstraws zu arbeiten. Hier gibt es große Potentiale hinsichtlich Marketing, Werbung und Merchendising.

Wäre es  nicht cool, wenn z.B. auf dem Coolstraw dein Name stehen würde?
 
 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Jede Idee hat einmal klein angefangen! Es liegt an den Unterstützern, ob eine Idee erfolgreich wird. Sprecht über unsere Innovation Coolstraw und setzt ihn bei euren Partys ein!

Wir suchen supporter, die genau darauf gewartet haben, eine coole Idee zu verwirklichen.

 Wir danken euch allen für die tatkräftige Unterstützung in welcher Art und Weise auch immer.

Euer Coolstraw-Team!

story:
Who are we?

Our team consists of three final year students, currently at Cass Business School. We believe in the potential of our products success, and with your contribution, we will achieve our goal. Welcome to the Glina Family.   

History of Glina 

Glina springs from the famous and unique Glina source, located 25 km away from the city of Gjirokastër. The history behind Glina is quite old and well known by traditional medicine for its curative effects. The first scientific study, which shed light on its curative values was done in 1939 by the University of Graz in Austria. Another study conducted from 1980-1990 by the Tirana Nephrology Clinic proved the springs health benefits, promoting everyday usage. The most noted research was initiated in 1948 and lasted until 2008. In 1948, at the University of Prague laboratory, this study analysed the physical and chemical properties of Glina. 1949 dates the complete study and the first scientific communication by Astashkina A., who at the time was a professor of the Faculty of St. Petersburg as well as a member of the Soviet Union’s Ministry of Health commission. Another important communication regarding Glina's steady composition dates back to 1957. This communication was conducted by Agustinshki V. L., at the University of St. Petersburg. After 20 years, the first study conducted in 1969 was done by the state laboratory of Tirana along with the scientific communication by Tabaku, regarding the physical and chemical properties of natural mineral water Glina. The study concluded that during the twenty year period, the composition of the water did not undergo any changes. This conclusion was reinforced by a study conducted in Germany in 1971 at the Scientific-Research Institute of Frankfurt. In 1989, at the University of Ioannina, the "Prassos" firm conducted another study on the water’s composition. In 1990 in New York, the Third Food Division of the Pepsi Cola Company performed a full analysis as well. 

How  will we bottle it? 

Glina will be bottled by the largest retail company in Albania, ‘Agna Group’ .The company has all the necessary conditions because it uses the most advanced bottling technology and the highest quality control system. Certified with the ISO 9001:2015 / ISO 22000:2005, this standard defines all of the requirements of a state-of-the-art food safety management system.

What is proven? 

 Prevents  and reduces  kidney stones

Helps treat chronic Gastritis 

Prevents and cures cholesterol 

Prevents and cures  urolithiasis (stones in bladder and urinary track) 

Stimulates digestion 

How will we do it ?

Our main approach is to sell the product through online shipments. Our target groups will  be people with different health backgrounds, which also includes customers with no health complications   As the store will be online , we will be in charge of delivering the product to the customers. In order to achieve the estimated demand, we will need to rent 2 warehouses, one in the UK, specifically London, and the other in Washington D.C. We will also employ 3 other employs to manage and distribute our shipments more efficiently, globally.

What will be our costs? 

Our fund goal will be 200k £ in order to launch Glina. This amount includes the rental costs of the warehouses, maintenance, salaries and wages, as well as the costs of shipments.  

How will Glina be used ?

The product will be shipped in standard 12 bottle cases. It can be used as normal water bottles, but in order to gain the full health benefits, the customer would need to be consistent and frequent with the usage of the water, initiating what we like to call ‘hydro-therapy’ treatment.

Why people need to buy Glina?

The effects of Glina have been already shown above by many scientific studies for more than 60 years. Being a spring, the water coming from a mountain it’s surely a miracle of nature. What is the worst thing that can happen from drinking water? You will never believe us until you try it yourself. Give it a go and we promise results.

story:
Short Summary

Delicious, boozy biccies (cookies) from Northern Ireland - delivered to your door and available in retail stores. This is our plan. We've already created the biccies and proven they're popular, with regular online and offline sales, but to meet demand, get into shop and reach new countries - especially America, we need some automation. We also want to make an Irish-American combo cookie - Northern Ireland ingredients with American booze, the perfect gift combination.

After 15 years in marketing and sales, Mike took 5 years off to enjoy time with his new daughter. He also retrained as a chef, spotted a gap in the market for local biscuits, and designed a range of delicious alcoholic biscuits, which we are now ready to expand and export.

By contributing to the expansion of Boozy Biccies, you will be making Northern Ireland cookies available worldwide. You'll also be funding a new Irish-American cookie, plus a range of exciting new cookies, specially created to reflect famous Northern Ireland locations and events.

What We Need & What You Get

Making cookies isn't too expensive, with portioning machines and deck ovens costing around £5,000, but enrobers and bagging machines are £20,000-£100,000. Then there's maintenance, premises and people. But we're not going mad just yet. We just want delicious biccies widely available, with your favourite alcohol, at a reasonable price.

So we have a plan for a mini factory - partly automated, partly manual, all delicious. Our first target is £14,000. This gets a mixer, portioning machine and manual bagging machine. 

For £35,000 we can do all of the above and automate bagging, reaching new markets with multiple bagging options for retail and hospitality.

The Perks

We can't give away alcohol as perks - but we can give you discount vouchers to order your alcoholic cookies (Boozy Biccies) on our website.

We also have some exclusive Boozy Biccies beer mats.

Funds

  • £69,000 provides the funding needed for dedicated premises, equipment and staff.
  • £49,000+ is a 75% automated mini factory, allowing for worldwide expansion.
  • £28,000+ is higher production speeds and simple bagging, essential for seasonal surges.
  • £20,000-£28,000 is faster production with standard bagging and boxing.

Where We Are

Based on current production capability, we can make about 60 boxes per week, that's 600 iced biscuits, bagged, boxed, postage wrapped and shipped. At the weekend we rent a bakery for a morning during their production down-time. During the week we're icing, bagging, boxing and labelling in our own small (licensed) production kitchen and work area.

Our kitchen is in Hillsborough, County Down, a village in the rolling hills, about 30 minutes from Belfast. Our suppliers are no more than a couple of hours away, with most just 20 minutes down the road, making delicious Northern Ireland butter, brewing beer or harvesting honey from their hives.

This is ideal for handmade biscuits, but to serve all of our customers, especially this coming Christmas, we'll need the minimum of portioning machines and bagging equipment. But we'll remain in County Down, using our local suppliers and their unique, delicious Northern Ireland products.

Risks & Challenges

The two biggest challenges we face are sales targets and production capability. Sales can be achieved, with significant media attention already putting a strain on production, but further marketing will increase demand, which can't be fulfilled using the current handmade methods.

Funding will widen production capability and, increase the opportunity to reach hospitality markets through new bagging methods, which opens up new territories around the world, so everyone can enjoy delicious Boozy Biccies from Northern Ireland.

Other Ways You Can Help

Funding, however small, all helps, but there are other ways you can contribute to creating the mini biccie factory:

  • Share the campaign on your favourite social channels - maybe your friends or relatives could contribute or share too?
  • Keep our website in mind for gifts and delicious biccies: boozybiccies.com
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools - they're built in and free to use!
  • Add a link to your blog or website to boozybiccies.com

Thank you from us here in the Boozy Biccies kitchen in Northern Ireland!

story:
Lu-Lu, the modular coffee maker

 

Lu-Lu was my attempt of having some fun with a Phin filter I got in Vietnam. I took it apart to learn it a bit and saw that separating the parts allow me to configure my drip in different ways for making different brewing methods.

After many variations of shapes, materials, and filters - Lu-Lu was born. A modular brewer, the Lu-Lu allows you to make a Vietnamese drip, a flat-bottom pour-over, a "French-press", a cold-brew, a mudless Turkish, and other recipes.

The modular system, that allows for different brews when assembled differently, is now patented.


I'm Omri Almagor, living in Milano Italy. I've been working in the espresso industry as an engineer and designer for several years. I've worked for Kees Van Der Westen and then Faema, when i decided to start my own activity - Del Creatives S.R.L. - A company focused on innovative products in the field of food extraction, mainly coffee. The Lu-Lu is the first product we're launching, still as a one-man operation, but surrounded by friends and partners (see thanks). 

You can (and totally should) follow us on:
https://www.instagram.com/del.c.coffee/

 

The Lu-Lu launch was planned last summer. April was charted down because of the international festivals, that were all cancelled due to the Covid-19 pandemic. Corona also caused delays in receiving different parts, made me cancel marketing events and forced me to substitute a professional photo-shoot in a cafe with computer-camera videos made in my son's kindergarten.

 

Worldwide, the effects of the Corona virus have been devastating. Lives lost, medical workers overwhelmed and our way of life challenged. This is why I've decided that all the profits from this campaign will be donated to corona related charities around the world and in accordance to the location of the buyers. For every unit you buy, you're giving towards the fight against Corona - you'll be getting your coffee toy and create good karma along the way. 

The list of foundations to which the money is directed to will be published and I urge you, if you can, to donate more independently from the Lu-Lu. Also, I'd appreciate your advice in finding other efficient and relevant charities.

To start with, we'll donate directly to Direct Relief. 

https://www.directrelief.org/

 

What's in your Lu-Lu box?

 

Your Lu-Lu box contains the following:

  • Your Lu-Lu in the color you've chosen - Body, Cup support, Lid, Spacer
  • 2 sets of metal filters - one large holed set (0.8mm squared holes) for coarsely grounded coffee. One fine holed set (300 micron round holes) for finer ground coffee. Notice - The box doesn't contain paper filters! We urge you to buy the original Aeropress round filters and the small Kalita flat-bottom filters.
  • 2 units of silicone gaskets.   
  • Animated instruction stickers.
  • Good Karma.

Lu-Lu currently available colors (all semi-transparent) - Blue, Red, Purple, Yellow, White, Grey

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • The Lu-Lu is ready for production, having gone through different versions of prototyping and testing. However, to start production a first amount is needed for molds and bulk orders. Therefor we've turned to Indiegogo to pre-sale the required amount of units that will supply the remainder of the sum needed to start production.
  • All the profits will go towards Covid-19 related charitable organizations. This is a fixed-funding campaign, which means failing to reach the minimum amount needed to start production will cancel the orders that were received and each buyer will be refunded. 
  • After the campaign concludes (60 days) and given that we have reached the minimum sum of the project, the money will become available to us in Del-Creatives S.R.L. and production will get on the way. Customers should expect their orders within 6-8 weeks from that point. Once reaching the minimum, we will start to gradually transfer the profits towards the chosen charities. The profits will be donated on a quarterly basis. The more we sell through this campaign, the higher the profits are and the more money is directed towards fighting Corona.

 

 

To make some things perfectly clear:

--- All the profits from the Lu-Lu will go towards Corona relief efforts:

All the profits made from the Lu-Lu campaign on Indiegogo will be transferred to charities aiding in Corona relief around the world. The charities will be chosen according to the advice and local of the contributors to the campaign. There are certain limitations to this:

The profits will be donated as long as Corona is deemed a world pandemic and not prior to donating at least 250,000$. After reaching that donation goal, we will continue to donate 5% of the profits towards other social projects indefinitely.  

Profits are not gross proceeds. The amount of money shown on the campaign's page is the gross proceeds from the Lu-Lu. Profits represent the net proceeds after covering all expenses, fees and taxes.

We will constantly update on the amount of profits donated. We expect the donate-able sum will increase in a non-linear way the more the campaign gains momentum. Also, there will be always be a quarterly delay between the gross proceeds and the donations.

 

--- Making the delivery date

Lu-Lu is in pre-production state. This means we've already had a first small production series using short-life tools. We're now ready for the next step, having validated all the designs and functions. As mentioned before, this is the first product the company is launching, and to reduce risks, we've decided to use the pre-sale option of indiegogo. Only when reaching the sales' goal, do we transfer the initial payments to the suppliers and start production. We've estimated to be ready for shipment within 4 weeks of reaching the financial goal, but as Corona has proven to us, our time tables are not our own any more. We will convey all the information and update you on the progress and any delays we're expecting.

 

About our producing partner:

INNOLAND PRODUCTS DEVELOPMENT, LTD is a contract manufacturer in Taiwan focused on quality, and manufacturing efficiency.

INNOLAND are the proud producers of Orphan Espresso's products and are specializing in coffee related products.

If you're a coffee enthusiast with a concept in-mind, contact them and move from idea to product in no-time.

https://www.ipdl.com.tw/ 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • please follow the campaign on instagram @del.c.coffee and spread the word however you can.
  • I was asked to remind you to also use the Indiegogo share tools!


Special thanks to the people who influenced the creation of the Lu-Lu and helped in realizing the project:

Carlos Bitencourt, Cafezal

Joanne and Duncan, Innoland 

Brent Jopson, Orso-Nero

Barb & Doug, Orphan Espresso

Daniel Tock, coffee specialist at BWT

Malte Wehr, Third wave machinists

Mattia Intorre, Roaster at Starbucks Reserve

Valentina and Luca, Specialty Pals.

Paolo scimone, His majesty the coffee

story:
What if you can have control of something you´ve always struggled with? Perfect temperature anywhere you want, with any drink you like, all day long?

Now is possible with Sleevo, a customizable electronic mug that adjusts and mantains the temperature of your drink, so you can enjoy it, as you´ve always wanted to. 

Welcome to the new generation of mugs that allow you to experience and enjoy your drink throughout the day.

 Aren´t you tired that your insulated mug keep your drinks dangerously hot for hours? And, what about the traditional paper cups or regular mugs, where your drinks cool too quickly? With Sleevo, now you can have the best of both worlds. 

How it works?

The Sleevo´s heating mechanism is design to be modular so you can easily remove it if you need to wash it, or just leave it charging. It works because of its own autoregulation system with an indicator that shows you at what temperature you are enjoying your drink. 

Sleevo, can keep your beverage temperature between 130°F and 160°F, so you can enjoy that perfect sip every time. Just twist the dial to choose your perfect temperature. 

If your drink is hotter than the temperature you choose, the indicator will turn red. 

If it is cooler, it will turn blue. 

When the temperature is just right, Sleevo will turn white, and now it´s ready for you to enjoy it.

 

Sleevo has a 360° drinking experience so you can take your sip from any angle, being absolutely sure that it won´t be any spills involved.

Use it anywhere you want.

At work, at school, at home.

Sleevo has a capacity of 350 ml, with a height of 22 cm and 7.5 cm of diameter. 

In Sleevo, we are focused on embracing and maintaining the heat of people and their drinks. We love coffee, and we have always struggled with the temperature of this drinks, we couldn´t find any mug that was flexible enough to be customized as we wanted to, but also there was no mug that completely maintain our desire temperature all day long.

We have made thousands of different designs, tenths of 3D printed prototypes, we´ve tested for hours the heating mechanism and the LED indicator, and we have finally achieve to create the perfect mug for you to enjoy. 

We are very close to make Sleevo a reality, we have the machinery ready to begin the production. 

This is Sleevo´s first Indiegogo project, we´ve studied and overcome every problem that has come along the way. We´ve got some great experience working and producing products with great quality and in a relatively short amount of time. We know and we are prepare to overcome every possible setback during this process. 

No matter what, we promise to work and be completely honest to meet the expectations of every backer!

story:
Village Box Café, LLC, located in Los Angeles, California, is accepting investment(s) to open a new location.

Dubbed as the ultimate dining experience, a full-service restaurant, bar, grill, and events venue space sure to delight. A new way to dine and entertain, consisting of an in-house branded "bar & grill," themed events, lounges, bars, comedy, and nightclub.

This modern, yet stylish and happening 10,000 plus square foot restaurant features four (4) main areas of dining and entertainment space.

The main restaurant features a 200-person dining room complete with a walk-up bar and flat-screen TV's for your enjoyment. To include a signature indoor performance stage for dine-in entertainment.

The second dining experience leads you to a "signature" outdoor patio known as "The Box." Private cabanas, an open-air "beer box," covered and open-air dining, flat screen TV's so you'll never miss a game or that special event, along with a stylish, upbeat environment that awaits you at the patio Box.

The third dining experience leads you to a "signature" outdoor patio known as "The Gardens." Covered outdoor dining area, fire pits, posh seating, a waterfall and running garden's await you for an intimate evening at Village Box Cafe Bar & Grill.

The fourth dining experience leads you to a rooftop terrace which comes with rooftop seating, a walk-up bar, flat-screen TVs, a signature lounge open daily, and a signature nightclub open every Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights.

From live cooking demonstrations, to weekend brunch with bottomless mimosas, to private cabanas, food bars and more await you at Village Box Cafe.

The Company offer's such events as their highly anticipated "food bar," held nightly on the Box patio from 5-9 pm. From taco night to soul food, pasta, and Asian cuisine, happy hour couldn't be any happier. You can check our updates page for more information.

As a new entry into the hospitality and entertainment sector, Village Box Café, LLC  with the contributions of it's supporters hope to secure funding to complete their planning and engineering phase.

The Company is seeking an initial contribution of $500,000 that would be used for the purpose and completion of our architectural and engineering blueprints, site demolition, pre-construction and administrative cost.

For your generous contributions they've assembled a worthwhile list of Perks. From the Box to the Box Royalty they have you covered.

The Company intends to produce a documentary book with the history and making of Village Box Café Bar & Grill. Following the restaurants opening, construction and writing of the book, this perk will be made available to its contributors.

The Company will provide the following (“perks”) to contributors in this Offering, at each level of contribution defined in the rewards section.

 Their list of Perks include: 

Limited edition T-Shirt.
Limited edition travel mug.
Limited edition poster.
Limited edition cookbook.
Limited edition documentary book.
Two (2) free drinks.
Two (2) free drinks plus appetizers.
Name published in book. (With your permission).
Launch party news letter featuring all contributors names.
Tickets to pre grand opening event. A red carpet event.

Village Box Café Bar & Grill is owned and operated by Village Box Café, LLC, a California limited liability company. Its CEO, Oliver B. Mitchell III, is responsible for running all facets of the business. He is also a former U.S. Marine who has well over 30 years in corporate retail, government, and entertainment industry experience. Mr. Mitchell has a proven track record having held numerous key positions over the 30 years of his career. Working with reputable firms such as Blockbuster Video, Staples, Dominos Pizza, and Footlocker he has driven sales and exceeded growth during his tenure.

The Mission Statement of Village Box Café LLC is to provide “the ultimate dining experience” and we invite you to become apart of the experience. 

FYI, in the event you may not be able to contribute will you please help us spread the word and pass this campaign to a friend or place on your social media page?

Thank you for your interest in Village Box Café Bar & Grill.

Some additional stats for your consideration.

Risks and challenges

The market in which we operate is highly competitive and could become increasingly competitive with new entrants in the market. Village Box Cafe, LLC competes with many other businesses, both large and small, on the basis of quality, price, location, and customer experience. Changes in customer preference away from Village Box Cafe, LLC’s core business or the inability to compete successfully against the other competitors could negatively affect Village Box Cafe, LLC’s financial performance.

ALL IMAGES ARE SUBJECT TO COPYRIGHT. VILLAGE BOX CAFE, LLC. COPYRIGHT 2020.

story:
Here at BatchBuddy, we have created a range of 'Cocktail Batching Bottles' that transforms how cocktails are made. Simply pick your BatchBuddy bottle, gather your ingredients, fill to the lines, chill & garnish. Perfect, consistent cocktails.

 

 

 

BatchBuddy's cocktail making kits harness the power of batching, a technique used by expert mixologists that's based on mixing a large quantity ingredients all at once. BatchBuddy's cocktail batching kits allow its users, regardless of experience, to create perfect cocktails in record time without the hassle of complicated recipes or expensive equipment.  BatchBuddy kits come complete with a specially-created batching bottle for a specific classic cocktail to create a world-class perfect serve every time.

 

 

We all enjoy and appreciate the art of mixology, hence why cocktails continue to become more and more popular. However, cocktail-making is historically an expert craft taking years to perfect just one recipe.   

 

 

We are launching our first set of batching bottles, focusing on the much-loved classic cocktails, such as the gin-based Bramble and the vodka-based Cosmopolitan.

 

 

 

 

The BatchBuddy team spent over 15 years in the industry as the owner of various venues and has always championed the power of batching. The technique has become more popular as cocktail popularity has peaked because it streamlines cocktail service so that customers don’t have to wait. We’ve taken the technique and made it consumer-friendly too.

 

BatchBuddy aims to take the hassle out of cocktail-making for bars, restaurants, and consumers alike to recreate their favorite drinks in record time at home without experience, fancy equipment or traditional recipes. The biggest benefits to our product are convenience, consistency, and cost.

 

John and Damian both have been involved in the cocktail world for more than 15 years each, training, competing and innovating in all aspects of the increasing vibrant mixology scene. Throughout these years of perfecting their craft one unassuming technique was called upon time after time…. Batching!

 

 

Batching is the technique of making multiple servings of a particular cocktail at one time. The guys at BatchBuddy have been using “batching” in all sorts of cocktails, from 50 servings of the cocktail of the week at any number of busy cocktail bars to 1500 Cosmos at a live music event. Batching ensures quality, consistency and saves a bucket load of time. It’s just made cocktails easy. Oh, and did we mention you don’t need all the fancy pants cocktail equipment like measures, shakers, strainers and the like?

So, we got to thinking, why isn’t everybody batching their cocktails? Why are people constantly struggling with that cocktail shaker that they got for their last birthday? How do we make it easy for everybody to get involved in the batching revolution?

Well, now we have…. Ladies and gentlemen……. BatchBuddy!

 

Risks and challenges

There may be some unexpected situations that occur. However, we will minimize the risk best we can and welcome any challenges as they come with the problem-solving attitude that already runs through the BatchBuddy team. We have our first Batching Kits prototypes made, tested and already bringing delight to the glasses of many of our early adopters. We have signed agreements with our suppliers and taken as much time and care as possible to ensure the whole process goes smoothly from been fully funded to delivering our first orders. To ensure our backers stay fully informed we will be updating regularly on our progress throughout the campaign and delivery process.
story_txt:
Here at BatchBuddy, we have created a range of 'Cocktail Batching Bottles' that transforms how cocktails are made. Simply pick your BatchBuddy bottle, gather your ingredients, fill to the lines, chill & garnish. Perfect, consistent cocktails.
 
 

 
BatchBuddy's cocktail making kits harness the power of batching, a technique used by expert mixologists that's based on mixing a large quantity ingredients all at once. BatchBuddy's cocktail batching kits allow its users, regardless of experience, to create perfect cocktails in record time without the hassle of complicated recipes or expensive equipment.  BatchBuddy kits come complete with a specially-created batching bottle for a specific classic cocktail to create a world-class perfect serve every time.
 


 
We all enjoy and appreciate the art of mixology, hence why cocktails continue to become more and more popular. However, cocktail-making is historically an expert craft taking years to perfect just one recipe.   
 

 
We are launching our first set of batching bottles, focusing on the much-loved classic cocktails, such as the gin-based Bramble and the vodka-based Cosmopolitan.
 

 

 

 
The BatchBuddy team spent over 15 years in the industry as the owner of various venues and has always championed the power of batching. The technique has become more popular as cocktail popularity has peaked because it streamlines cocktail service so that customers don’t have to wait. We’ve taken the technique and made it consumer-friendly too.
 

BatchBuddy aims to take the hassle out of cocktail-making for bars, restaurants, and consumers alike to recreate their favorite drinks in record time at home without experience, fancy equipment or traditional recipes. The biggest benefits to our product are convenience, consistency, and cost.
 
John and Damian both have been involved in the cocktail world for more than 15 years each, training, competing and innovating in all aspects of the increasing vibrant mixology scene. Throughout these years of perfecting their craft one unassuming technique was called upon time after time…. Batching!
 
 
Batching is the technique of making multiple servings of a particular cocktail at one time. The guys at BatchBuddy have been using “batching” in all sorts of cocktails, from 50 servings of the cocktail of the week at any number of busy cocktail bars to 1500 Cosmos at a live music event. Batching ensures quality, consistency and saves a bucket load of time. It’s just made cocktails easy. Oh, and did we mention you don’t need all the fancy pants cocktail equipment like measures, shakers, strainers and the like?
So, we got to thinking, why isn’t everybody batching their cocktails? Why are people constantly struggling with that cocktail shaker that they got for their last birthday? How do we make it easy for everybody to get involved in the batching revolution?
Well, now we have…. Ladies and gentlemen……. BatchBuddy!
 
Risks and challenges
There may be some unexpected situations that occur. However, we will minimize the risk best we can and welcome any challenges as they come with the problem-solving attitude that already runs through the BatchBuddy team. We have our first Batching Kits prototypes made, tested and already bringing delight to the glasses of many of our early adopters. We have signed agreements with our suppliers and taken as much time and care as possible to ensure the whole process goes smoothly from been fully funded to delivering our first orders. To ensure our backers stay fully informed we will be updating regularly on our progress throughout the campaign and delivery process.

story:
1- HOW IT ALL STARTED

I am a keen sailor and that is why 3 years ago I was surprised that my vitamin D3 was low and bone density test has been OK for my age but was getting closer to bottom limit. I called my 81yo mum who by the way is not on any medication and told her I am about to start taking vitamin D3 tablets and Calcium etc. It was at that point she reminded me of existence of Korytnica. 12th century old 100% pure and natural mineral water from European National Park as child I loved to drink. Eastern Europe knows of Korytnica's health benefits. I asked my sister to start sending me bottles by air and I paid $10 AUD per each 500ml bottle. After while we went to Europe on holiday and popped to Korytnica (place) and rest is history. We got initially few pallets and the news and stories spread quickly.  

Not only we no longer pay $10 AUD for a bottle but thanks to generosity of people in Korytnica we can now help Australians who can benefit from drinking 12th Century old pure awesomeness once loved by kings as well. 

So here we are hoping that with your help more and more Australians will enjoy health benefits of Korytnica proudly wearing upcoming T-Shirts or sticking stickers on window of their cars.   

Our 81 years "young" mum who started it ALL - WE LOVE YOU MUM :)   

 

2 - MAGIC CONTENT OF KORYTNICA

We have decided to approach all Australian entrepreneur minded indiegogo people & teams to help us with the Launch and produce great underdog winning story benefiting health of all Australians in need. 

Just look what kind of natural goodness is in 1 liter of Korytnica "as nature intended". 

Every bottle of Korytnica also contains 48mg/L of silica which is great for hair/skin/nails and 1300mg/L of alkaline buffers (bicarbonates) helping with digestion. 

By all means we do not say to people to ditch pure water and start drinking nothing but Korytnica. What we saying is that if you make Korytnica part of your drinking regime even if it is occasional but regular it helps. 

 

2 - HEALTH BENEFITS  

Korytnica is simply a mineral water brewed by nature for centuries. But unlike other brands the mother nature happened to mix levels of Calcium, Magnesium and other minerals in such levels and ratios that it perfectly fits RDI needs of human body. 

Looking at table above you have probably guessed it. Korytnica positively helps where minerals like Ca, Mg, Silica, Buffers, Iron ions are known for: Osteoporosis, Osteopenia, Digestion, Anemia, Bones Health, Muscles. 

Note for geeks: Bones are like muscles "They get stronger not just by drinking Ca, Mg but crucially also by healthy diet and safe mechanical loading and exercise so your body knows you use bones". Plus it is a matter of regularity not occasionality.  

Mum's wisdom note: "Regular occasional" is in most cases better than "Sporadic Spike Quantity". 

For more info: info@korytnica.com.au

**Consultation with experts to get ideal drinking regime is recommended. 

*** Korytnica is not supplements!. It is simply a very rare mineral water perfected by nature that happened to be produced by nature while constellation of stars was right. 

**** There are only 3-4 other mineral waters in Europe with similar composition but Korytnica has lowest level of salt (suitable for cardiovascular and diabetic consumers). Further it contains highest level of Ca & Mg our of all mineral waters in Europe in correct RDI ratio for human body. 

 

3 - PARTY TIME

We have not forgotten young generation that likes to party. And why not to party with some cool health benefits too? Why? Because each of the flavored Korytnica is based on Korytnica Sparkling still containing all goodness in form of minerals (Ca, Mg, Si, etc.). Only high quality syrup from Austria is used in production complimenting quality of mineral water used as base.

There is around 90mg/L of sugar which is about 30% less than those is Coke and similar drinks. Plus Korytnica has 100% natural bubbles (no artificial CO2!!) and as such you will not get "brain freeze" drinking Korytnica:) 

If our kids ask for soft drink on Birthday Party we as parents go for Korytnica adding some 

non-flavored just in case.  

 

4 - PERKS

We tried our best to design Perks to maximize chances to minimize bad statistics of >10 million Australians (as shown in video). We want to spread Korytnica around so it rather becomes regular occasional than sporadic lot. Hotels, restaurants, gyms and geeks behind computers playing games - do your body and bones a favor. 

PERK 1: CHRISTMAS GIFT DELIGHT

Only Indiegogo early adopters can purchase this Christmas Health Gift at distributor like price. We have allocate 20 perks at that crazy price. Plus delivery is only $15 AUD/box of 30 to all Australian major cities. anyone choosing this Christmas perk will also receive right to purchase Korytnica in 2018 on regular monthly bases at this crazy not to be repeated prices. Normal standard price will be >$4-20 per bottle. MERRY HEALTHY CHRISTMAS EVERYONE. 

 

PERK 2: SUPPORT BONES CLINIC BRISBANE

This cute 1 liter bottle of KORYTNICA OSTEO will be donated to Bones Clinic (1 bottle for each $4-00 perk) in Brisbane for their patients. Bones Clinic is doing fantastic job helping people to reverse Osteoporosis by custom designed regime of Calcium, Magnesium and other minerals intake, diet, exercises and special care of experts. With >10 million Australians in need bones issues and young generation clicking computer mouse there is a great need for it. There is a nice video attached within images and link here to find out more:

http://www.goodhealthcare.com.au/osteoporosis/r...

   

PERK 3: JOIN KORYTNICA FAMILY CLUB

For $10-00 AUD you will not only help to spread health benefits of Korytnica among Australians but you will also: 

- Join Korytnica Family Club as member enjoying long term cost savings , information & health benefits

- Receive color eBook about Korytnica history, stories, benefits in very detail. 

- Reserve right to purchase Korytnica later at indiegogo today's prices valid till 31st May 2018. 

 

PERK 4: SAMPLE OF EACH HEALING & HEALTHY RANGE

This is perfect for those who simply want to see what the big deal Korytnica is and try 1 of each. 

1 bottles 500ml - OSTEO

1 bottle 500ml - IRON

1 bottle 500ml - SPARKLING

1 bottle 500ml - SOFT

 

PERK 5:  12 pack STANDARD HEALTHY RANGE

If you know which one you want why don't you do yourself a favor and purchase this perk of 12 bottles 500ml of your choice. Iron or Osteo or Sparkling or Gently Sparkling (see below). 

 

PERK 5: 30 bottles BOX

Very economical choice of 30 bottles packed in box and delivered to major Australian cities.  

PERK 6: 5 BOXES of 30 BISTRIBUTORSHIP

Purchase 5 boxes of KORYTNICA (30 bottles each). You can re-sale 4 boxes each month and drink 1 bottle a day as a reward.   

PERK 7: PALLETS

For few more serious and ambitious supporters we have 10 perks for 1 pallet full of 500ml bottles of your choice. Either for your consumption or for re-sale. Korytnica loves cold places and dislikes sun like any other mineral water of even wines. 

PERK 8: DC40 CONTAINER 

There is ONLY one perk like this at almost cost level for one huge serious player who thinks that can take onto a full DC40 container delivered to your door to any major city in Australia. 

28500 bottles = 95 packs = 25 pallets of awesomeness. Proof of suitable storage (out of sun below 12 degrees C) is required.      

 

PERK ???

You still scrolling? What does it take to convince you Korytnica is unique worth of support and trial? If you can not find perk you like suggest and we might just add it.

 

5 - OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

Please join our social media and help us to spread goodness news of Korytnica hidden away from Western World since 12th Century - TILL NOW!  

There is always something to improve: websites, marketing, warehouse, solar power for HVAC... 

Please visit our website and social media and say hello. 

www.korytnica.com.au

www.instagram.com/korytnica_australia
