story:
The latest drink evolution of Caskai. Our new Cold Brew Cascara with Black Elderberry is 5x stronger than our original award-winning Sparkling Cascara Infusion.


Made from Upcycled Cascara, the dried fruit of the coffee cherry, and European Black Elderberry extract. Caskai Cold Brew gives you sustained energy while supporting your immune system. 

"Tastes like fruit, not coffee"

We Like our Coffee Like We Like our Grapes ... Seedless!

Coffee is a fruit. We are used to the roasted seed of that fruit, what we know as coffee today. Cascara, the dried fruit portion of the coffee cherry, was overshadowed by roasted coffee for the last 1,000 years. Ironically, it is the most nutritious part of coffee, cascara was forgotten and tossed aside and viewed as a mere byproduct of the coffee drying process. Now, Caskai upcycles cascara into amazing drinks that boost your energy and immune system.

Cascara and Nutrition
— The Untold Story —

Did you know that 100 grams of cascara (a small handful) has the same amount of Potassium as six bananas? Cascara is the most nutritious part of the coffee and packs quite a punch. Over the centuries, cascara was overshadowed by roasted coffee, and its nutritional benefits were mostly unknown... until now. Cascara contains vitamins, minerals, essential amino acids, protein, fatty acids (Omega 3, 6, & 9), and bioactive compounds such as caffeine and polyphenols. Over 1,000 years ago, Oromo warriors and traders, from the area that is now Ethiopia, mashed the entire coffee fruit (cascara and the seed), mixed it with animal fat and used it as food on long journeys away from home.

Poly what?

Polyphenols and Health
Polyphenols are compounds produced by plants that protect the plant from disease and insects. Polyphenols are also greatly beneficial to human health and are being researched for potential anti-inflammatory, anti-viral, anti-bacterial, anti-diabetic, cardio and neuroprotective, energetic and other properties. Having a diet high in fruits and vegetables whereby you also eat the skin as this is where polyphenols concentrate, is one way to get polyphenols in your diet. Red wine, chocolate, coffee & tea is another. Drinking Caskai is a new way. Caskai contains three classes of polyphenols derived from the cascara and the black elderberry extract used in the drink - flavonoids, phenolic acids, and condensed tannins.



Not all Cascara is the Same

As founders, we select each lot of cascara we use in Caskai. We only use cascara that meets our strict nutrition and flavor requirements. We are so selective on the cascara we use, we trademarked it Premium Sun-dried Cascara™. Our cascara is sourced from fully ripened and hand-picked Arabica coffee grown in the Chriqui highlands of Panama in the shadow of Volcano Baru. We use cascara from what is the called the dry or natural process whereby the whole coffee fruit is sun-dried first, locking in the flavors, and then de-husked. It is the most sustainable form of coffee cherry drying.



European Black Elderberry

European Black Elderberry (Sambucus Nigra L.) has been used for centuries as a traditional remedy for colds, flu, and other ailments. Hippocrates, the Greek philosopher known as the "father of modern medicine", referred to the Elder tree as his "medicine chest." The Elderberries used for the extract we use is produced from a special variety called "Haschberg" grown in the foothills and valleys of the Austrian Alps in a region in SE Austria called Styria. The extract is produced to maximize the antioxidants and polyphenols contents. European Black Elderberries are high in a polyphenol called anthocyanins, a flavonoid. Anthocyanins also give the elderberry its purple color.



The Founders

Hi and thank you for visiting our Indiegogo campaign. We are not new to the coffee or the drinks business. We met years ago while serving as early executives for Red Bull working in the United States, Europe, the Caribbean, and Central America. Uschi, originally from Salzburg, Austria, is also the founder of a green coffee import company, Panama Varietals, and a coffee roastery, Goldkind Coffee, both based in Austria. She is also a partner and serves as the Managing Director of Latorre & Dutch Europe, a green coffee producer, processor, and importer. Joel, originally from Seattle, WA, is a driving force behind cascara nutritional research and promotion.  In addition to being cofounders of Caskai and fans of coffee, cascara, and upcycling, we are also married and the parents of four great kids.

YOUR PERKS

For our backers, we have great deals on Caskai Cold Brew to fit any budget. A special treat for your office colleagues? Need a case to keep on hand at your home office? Do you own a coffee shop that needs a few cases and some POS to get started?  An organic cotton t-shirt sporting our logo and tag line? We have you covered. 

 

Caskai Cold Brew Cascara (4-packs, 12-packs, multi-case deals)

 

Organic Cotton T-Shirts

 

Travel to Panama's Coffee Growing Region - La Cosecha Special Event
For those who want the ultimate Caskai experience, we have four all-expense-paid trips to the source of our cascara, the country of Panama. This five-night excursion will begin in Panama City's historic Casco Antiguo neighborhood, a Unesco World Heritage Site, and one of the oldest cities in the Americas. From there you will travel to the Chiriqui highlands, Panama's coffee-growing region and home to some of the world's finest coffee and cascara, as a special guest of the 3 day La Cosecha event. La Cosecha celebrates Panama's coffee and cuisine where you will visit Panama's renowned coffee farms and culinary delights that ends in a grand finale closing night event.

 

Your Support Impacts More than Our Campaign

First, we could not produce Caskai Cold Brew without your support, particularly considered the current situation and the impact of Covid on startups. So, a big thank you from us, we are eternally grateful. But your support has an impact that goes further...

As our primary ingredient is upcycled, you will also be supporting a movement to reduce food and agricultural waste and help the world to see that there are amazing benefits in what we are throwing away. The nutritional story behind cascara is still emerging, but it is amazing the irony of the fact that a byproduct of coffee has health benefits beyond the coffee seed itself. 

Finally, your support will create an additional income stream for coffee farmers. We pay our farmers between $1.50 and $3.00/lb for cascara that meets our requirements, not cents per pound like some importers. Coffee farmers have not had it easy. Climate change is reducing yields, commercial coffee prices remain artificially low, and the effects of the current crisis are creating huge issues in the supply chain. 

FUNDING OU​R FIRST PRODUCTION
Your contribution to our campaign will fund our first production of Caskai Cold Brew in the United States, approximately 10,000 cans. We are working with one of the best cold brew coffee copackers in the United States who has been our partner in developing this new product and getting it ready for production on a commercial scale. We are insistent on great flavor and quality. Our partner fresh brews the cascara. We use no cascara concentrates nor do we spike the product with caffeine or other flavor or nutritional enhancers. The benefits from Caskai come from the cascara and black elderberry extract only.

 

Risks & Challenges
Covid's disruption to the supply chains and logistics is creating the greatest risk to our project at the moment. These disruptions could lead to product delivery delays, but we are prepared to minimize the impact. We have our primary ingredients in stock, and have already lined up our other suppliers (packaging) and logistics providers. However, any shutdowns could disrupt their operations as well, and we are staying on top of this.

We have chosen a set target amount vs. the flexible funding model that Indiegogo offers. We will not go forward with the production until we have hit our goal that will provide the necessary funding for the first full production. It is all or nothing as we all work hard for our $.

Launching a new beverage and being a startup is not easy. We have been down the road many times before and realize the perseverance it requires. After much trial & error, we believe introducing consumers to a unique product like Caskai Cold Brew via crowdfunding is the way to go vs. raising a ton of money and making a big push into retail and hoping for the best.

The success of the campaign will help us determine our next steps.
 

Spread the Word

Indiegogo has some great tools for you to share the campaign via your own social networks. If you like what we are working on at Caskai, spread the word, chances are you have some friends or colleagues who would be into Caskai Cold Brew also.
story_txt:
The latest drink evolution of Caskai. Our new Cold Brew Cascara with Black Elderberry is 5x stronger than our original award-winning Sparkling Cascara Infusion.


Made from Upcycled Cascara, the dried fruit of the coffee cherry, and European Black Elderberry extract. Caskai Cold Brew gives you sustained energy while supporting your immune system. 



"Tastes like fruit, not coffee"

We Like our Coffee Like We Like our Grapes ... Seedless!
Coffee is a fruit. We are used to the roasted seed of that fruit, what we know as coffee today. Cascara, the dried fruit portion of the coffee cherry, was overshadowed by roasted coffee for the last 1,000 years. Ironically, it is the most nutritious part of coffee, cascara was forgotten and tossed aside and viewed as a mere byproduct of the coffee drying process. Now, Caskai upcycles cascara into amazing drinks that boost your energy and immune system.


Cascara and Nutrition— The Untold Story —
Did you know that 100 grams of cascara (a small handful) has the same amount of Potassium as six bananas? Cascara is the most nutritious part of the coffee and packs quite a punch. Over the centuries, cascara was overshadowed by roasted coffee, and its nutritional benefits were mostly unknown... until now. Cascara contains vitamins, minerals, essential amino acids, protein, fatty acids (Omega 3, 6, & 9), and bioactive compounds such as caffeine and polyphenols. Over 1,000 years ago, Oromo warriors and traders, from the area that is now Ethiopia, mashed the entire coffee fruit (cascara and the seed), mixed it with animal fat and used it as food on long journeys away from home.


Poly what?
Polyphenols and HealthPolyphenols are compounds produced by plants that protect the plant from disease and insects. Polyphenols are also greatly beneficial to human health and are being researched for potential anti-inflammatory, anti-viral, anti-bacterial, anti-diabetic, cardio and neuroprotective, energetic and other properties. Having a diet high in fruits and vegetables whereby you also eat the skin as this is where polyphenols concentrate, is one way to get polyphenols in your diet. Red wine, chocolate, coffee & tea is another. Drinking Caskai is a new way. Caskai contains three classes of polyphenols derived from the cascara and the black elderberry extract used in the drink - flavonoids, phenolic acids, and condensed tannins.

Not all Cascara is the Same
As founders, we select each lot of cascara we use in Caskai. We only use cascara that meets our strict nutrition and flavor requirements. We are so selective on the cascara we use, we trademarked it Premium Sun-dried Cascara™. Our cascara is sourced from fully ripened and hand-picked Arabica coffee grown in the Chriqui highlands of Panama in the shadow of Volcano Baru. We use cascara from what is the called the dry or natural process whereby the whole coffee fruit is sun-dried first, locking in the flavors, and then de-husked. It is the most sustainable form of coffee cherry drying.

European Black Elderberry
European Black Elderberry (Sambucus Nigra L.) has been used for centuries as a traditional remedy for colds, flu, and other ailments. Hippocrates, the Greek philosopher known as the "father of modern medicine", referred to the Elder tree as his "medicine chest." The Elderberries used for the extract we use is produced from a special variety called "Haschberg" grown in the foothills and valleys of the Austrian Alps in a region in SE Austria called Styria. The extract is produced to maximize the antioxidants and polyphenols contents. European Black Elderberries are high in a polyphenol called anthocyanins, a flavonoid. Anthocyanins also give the elderberry its purple color.
The Founders

Hi and thank you for visiting our Indiegogo campaign. We are not new to the coffee or the drinks business. We met years ago while serving as early executives for Red Bull working in the United States, Europe, the Caribbean, and Central America. Uschi, originally from Salzburg, Austria, is also the founder of a green coffee import company, Panama Varietals, and a coffee roastery, Goldkind Coffee, both based in Austria. She is also a partner and serves as the Managing Director of Latorre & Dutch Europe, a green coffee producer, processor, and importer. Joel, originally from Seattle, WA, is a driving force behind cascara nutritional research and promotion.  In addition to being cofounders of Caskai and fans of coffee, cascara, and upcycling, we are also married and the parents of four great kids.


YOUR PERKS
For our backers, we have great deals on Caskai Cold Brew to fit any budget. A special treat for your office colleagues? Need a case to keep on hand at your home office? Do you own a coffee shop that needs a few cases and some POS to get started?  An organic cotton t-shirt sporting our logo and tag line? We have you covered.

Organic Cotton T-Shirts

From there you will travel to the Chiriqui highlands, Panama's coffee-growing region and home to some of the world's finest coffee and cascara, as a special guest of the 3 day La Cosecha event. La Cosecha celebrates Panama's coffee and cuisine where you will visit Panama's renowned coffee farms and culinary delights that ends in a grand finale closing night event.

story:
Una investigación del origen de los ingredientes que usamos en la cocina colombiana hoy en día.

Durante años he experimentado con cientos de ingredientes, y en la obsesión por producir un alimento cada vez mejor, me dí cuenta que lo más importante es la selección del ingrediente.

Pero, cómo hacerlo? Cómo saber qué es un buen ingrediente? De dónde viene la comida que comemos?

Creemos que Colombia produce todos los alimentos que consumimos, pero cada vez importamos más y producimos menos.

El resultado de esta investigación sería expuesto mientras se trabaja, en un canal de vídeo en dónde puedan seguirme en la exploración y experimentación desde el ingrediente al plato.  Y luego un documental en video y en libro.

Por qué tanto dinero?  Porque la idea es poder trabajar con un equipo de producción audiovisual, editorial y culinario.  La idea es comenzar a trabajar en la planeación en febrero de 2018, luego la producción como tal tomaría alrededor de 5 meses, para luego plasmar el resultado en libro, y poder entregarles un libro completo de la cocina colombiana vegetariana.  Tocaría el tema de las carnes, pero sólo como información de su origen, y no en recetas.

Si la meta no se alcanza, el dinero se devuelve,

___________________

Conoce más de lo que hacemos en instagram y facebook.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Andrew Bast.  I have been in the restaurant business for 25 plus years.  I want to start my own concept called Zapanini.  It will compete with Pizza Hut and Dominos.  It is Pick Up and Delivery only.  Initially it will start out as a food truck to serve college campuses and then expand into a multi chain unit.  It offers Pizza, Paninis, Pasta, Salad, Soup, Wings, and more.

What We Need & What You Get

I am hoping to raise $15,000 to purchase a food truck.  That is only $10 for 1500 people.  Spread the word.  With your donation you will get a $10 gift card to use at any Zapanini location once we are up and running.

The Impact

Creating Zapanini will create exciting new flavors and new jobs.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hello, we are Martin and Constantin.

We have met working in a restaurant in 2020.

Martin is the chef in the kitchen and I am the manager of the room. In 2020 due to Covid-19 our restaurant closed the doors. But we want to continue to make people happy and create our jobs, that's why this initiative came up for us. 

Growing fresh food and the cooking is a passion that resonates deeply within people of all ages. 
It consists of a mini fer of organic shiitake mushrooms that you can grow at home and 30

recipes of delicious dishes developed by Martin for our backers.

Our goals:

  • Deliver a farm-to-table growing experience that everyone can enjoy. 
  • Teach people how to grow food for themselves, and taste a level of quality that's hard to match anywhere else.
  • Teach people to cook healthy organic food.
  • Develop a farm with growing and delivering fresh mushrooms.
  • Distribute organic mushroom farms to you (backers) before March 2021

You have to follow the instructions on the recommended temperature, humidity and light.
With the money raised we want to build a ship with the capacity to produce 50 tons of mushrooms a year.

Shiitake Mushroom Farm

Your personal farm to table experience. Grow and eat organic mushrooms at peak freshness.

Key Features

Personal mushroom growing and tasting experience.

Harvest 2-3 crops of your own fresh, organic Shiitake mushrooms.

Easy to use - fun to watch as you grow.

30 different recipes of different healthy and tasty dishes. 

Product Benefits

Harvest and taste organic Shiitake mushrooms at peak freshness. 

Learn the basics of mushroom cultivation while you grow.

Learn how to cook simply and easy dishes. 

Makes a great gift for anyone!

Risks and challenges

The number one risk with this project is contamination of growing substrates during the colonization phase. In order to overcome this, we will plant Micelium in the substrate in out storage that fills with all normative and regulations. It's also important to note that Quality Inspections will be performed during the production process and right up until the products are shipped to the customers, ensuring products are contaminant free. Another risk associated is that customers will not be able to harvest any mushrooms due to a number of environmental factors. In order to prevent this we will be putting in the effort to educate the customer on how to use our products to achieve optimal results. With a Stories on Instagram videos we'll teach customers and potential customers how to grow mushrooms they can eat.

story:
Food Bowls in 10 Minutes

Food bowls are the most tasty and versatile meal on the planet and with WhataBasket and WhataMeal kits, you can go from hungry to enjoying a tasty, fresh food bowl in under 10 minutes.  WhataBasket is a multi-tier cooking system that uses the steam rising above your rice & pasta to make food bowls fast & all in one pot.  Steam cooks super fast and has many other health benefits.  WhataMeal is a complete spice and rice (or pasta) meal kit designed to reduce prep time and crafted by award winning restaurateur Kent Lyon.

It's an easier, healthier & faster way to cook!

Making of Margarita Chicken Bowl

 

 

 

WhataBasket keeps the rice off the bottom of your pot so that you can rapid boil the rice!  Our WhataBowl meal kits always include a spice boil packet to drop in the water so that your rice absorbs all the great flavors as it hydrates... it will be the best rice you have ever had!

WhataBowl meal kits are designed to reduce prep time and are perfectly crafted to cook large food bowls (2 to 3 servings) in your WhataBasket in 10 minutes or less.  Each kit includes the rice or pasta and all the different blended spice and sauce packs you need to make the large food bowls shown below.  We will also include an instructional video link to help you make your amazing WhataMeals in your WhataBasket. 

 

Support Our Local Farmers 

We purposely are not including meat or vegetables in our meal kits because of the large amount of waste generated from the large boxes, thick foam insulation and freezer gel packs that many times end up in our landfills.  And the substantial additional fossil fuels burned to ship such a large and heavy box.  We also feel it is extremely important to eat fresh products and to support our local farmers.  Please purchase your meat and vegetables for your WhataBasket from your local farmers market

Risks & Challenges

Mass production is complete and we are shipping WhataBaskets now!

story:
In this text I have chosen to use the words ‘plant based’ and ‘vegan’ referring to the food being made from 100% plant sources without any added animal products. Detailed information on why plant based foods are positive and a necessity for maintaining a sustainable environment, health and ethical treatment of animals will not be discussed in this text.

VIDEOS & ARTICLES

Watch videos about Selina and her project here.

 

About GRUB:

alltomstockholm.se/restaurangbar/crowdfundar-oppna-veganburgarhak/

livetsgoda.se/crowdfundar-for-att-starta-vegansk-burgarpub

vegobox.com/crowdfundar-att-starta-vegansk-burgarpub/

 

Selina's catering and entrepreneurship:

driva-eget.se/nyheter/foretag/selina-inspirerar-till-hallbar-matkonsumtion

drommenommalajord.wordpress.com/tag/selina-hami/

 

Selina's catering and food projects in Syria:

expressen.se/nyheter/selina-aker-till-syrien--och-hjalper-till-pa-plats/

expressen.se/nyheter/selinas-kanslosamma-resa-till-krigets-syrien/

thelocal.se/voices/view/this-swedish-woman-drove-to-syria-to-bring-food-to-desperate-families

biojournaal.nl/artikel/20894/Nature-and-More-levert-bio-dadels-voor-Syri%C3%AB

 

SUMMARY

BACKGROUND

My name is Selina Hami, 25, and I’m a food entrepreneur and the founder of the company Selina’s that creates plant based, innovative food concepts in Sweden.

 

Since August 2015, I’ve been running the catering Selina’s POME Stories (previously Selina’s Organics) where the idea for GRUB came to life. In my catering I focused on plant based Middle Eastern dishes but over time became fascinated with how to create vegan burgers and street food from scratch that everyone can enjoy. I tested my burgers in my catering, my non-vegan as well as vegan customers cheered, I did a happy dance. Now- after having built a concept around this menu- it's time to take the next step: starting the franchise concept GRUB to open the first funky, vegan pub in Stockholm.

 

THE FRANCHISING IDEA

Since starting my catering, I’ve received requests from customers to open a restaurant and requests from restaurant owners to create a concept for them to run- while at the same time the customer demand and the planet’s need for us to switch to more plant based food is constantly growing.

Before I went vegan, I loved hanging out at the typical rustic, gourmet burger and steak places in Stockholm. Today, the vegan restaurants available are oriented towards health, raw, or fast food while other restaurants offer vegan options that are marginalized on the menu.

I have created a rustic franchise pub concept where gourmet, plant based street food is made from scratch with quality produce and served with handicraft beer in a social, inviting environment of live jam session nights, board games and art exhibitions.

To run a restaurant you need to partner up with others in order to divide the workload and the investments. Being the creator of the brand and having the desire for it to stay on the right track without steering away from the ethical, environmental and culinary ideas that I have carefully created, I have decided to partner up in a way that makes each part independent in their share of the business:

To run and grow this concept in an effective way, I have chosen to focus on the best of my competencies- concept development, recipe creating, marketing, PR & business strategy- to run a franchise that I can sell to and run together with my partners; the restaurant owners who want to run their own business but need help with a concept to run. This way, I will be able to focus on what I do best to support my partners (the franchisees) while they can focus on what they do best to grow the concept while staying independent with their share of the business- running their own restaurants.

 

WHAT I NEED & WHAT YOU GET

 

ABOUT GRUB

  • THE PHILOSOPHY

The aim of GRUB is to offer plant based dishes that are appealing for both vegans and non-vegans in order to normalize plant based foods.

I have created a concept that reflects customer demands for environmentally sustainable and ethically sourced products, as well as tasty food and a welcoming social environment. In a survey done by Inizio it was shown that, although 37% of Swedes are striving towards eating less meat, 82% justify eating it because if the good taste. It is time to revolutionize the Swedish restaurant scene to show that plant based foods can be bloody (well, not literally) delicious.

My food philosophy is not to try to imitate meat or create substitutes for it. Rather, I create dishes that stand on their own and have the core elements that makes a satisfying dish such as umami and consistency.

 

  • THE BURGERS

What is different about my vegan burgers in comparison is that I prepare them in 4 steps; 1) A slow cooked stew simmers with herbs to draw out the umami, 2) a cereal or flour is added to the stew (e.g. oats, chickpea flour) to create a formable patty, 3) the burger is baked or steamed in an oven, 4) the patties are glazed with a variety of sauces when fried.  

The burgers I have developed are all made from whole, natural produce such as legumes, oats, mushrooms, and root vegetables. Although the main focus isn’t to be the healthy place, using quality produce and non-fabricated is a crucial part of the concept for it to maintain high quality dishes and develop the culinary skills of the chefs.

I have created 10 burgers, of which 3-5 will be the signature burgers while the rest, and coming ones, will be a part of the “living menu” where new dishes are created and changed once every week or month. This way, the kitchen staff can work with seasonal produce and be motivated by maintaining high creativity levels in the kitchen.

 

Some non-vegan customer comments about the burgers:

“The burgers were magical”

“It was sincerely one of the top 3 burgers I’ve ever had, strongly competing for the no. 1 positions!!! And I have lived in the USA, the land of burgers.”

“Oh. My. God.”

 

Some customer comments about my catering food:


"This wasn’t food. This was heaven.”

“The food was fantastic! You make it with so much love and creativity.”

"Selina, you did it again. I didn't know vegan food could be so delicious.”

 

  • THE MENU

The menu is mainly inspired by the south of US and Latin America with burgers and arepas being the signature dishes of the concept.

Arepas are gluten-free, Latin Americans streetfood- a filled cornbread. I’m currently working on creating a gluten-free burger bread without compensating taste or fluffiness.

When it comes to beverages, handicraft beers, floats and agua frescas will be available. However, I have chosen to also offer sodas, such a cola drink, from ethical brands.

 

Except for the burgers, signatures on the menu will be:

- Arepas

- Patacones con ají (double fried plantains with cilantro salsa)

- Monkey bread

- A range of handicraft beers

- Floats

 

  • THE PUB

The atmosphere of the pub is relaxed and inviting with the social activities live jam sessions, board games and art exhibitions of the walls- where there is already a range of Swedish artists waiting to showcase their work.

 

The interior will have an underground feel and the furnishings will mainly be sourced from second-hand sources for sustainability reasons. This also enables each pub to have its on quirky touch to it depending on what is available.

 

TO LAUNCH THE CONCEPT

Up until this point I have built the brand GRUB on my own; creating the recipes, concept development, prototype branding, market positioning, communication, marketing, press. A successful franchise concept needs continuous work where the main task is to enable the pub to live up to its brand.

Running my own catering and with a background in cafe operational management, and 11 years of employment within the restaurant industry, I know that managing a restaurant is a task that gives little or no time for the overall concept development. The workload must therefore be divided into two managerial roles (also listed in detail further down below):

The franchiser (me): The owner and creator of the brand who runs the concept.

The franchisee: The owner of an individual restaurant who runs the everyday tasks of the business.

Before I partner up with a franchisee, I need to take the following three last steps that would create the finished, well-packaged and customer requested concept ready to be launched in Sweden:

  • WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?

Attention! Due to Indiegogo fees, the unclear regulations of the Swedish Tax Agency regarding crowdfunding and on what perks are considered tax-free, it is difficult to determine beforehand the exact amount that will be recieved. This crowdfunding will be presented to the Tax Agency for an individual analysis to how it should be accounted for.

  1. Creating a franchise contract: 30’000 SEK. I have teamed up with a group of lawyers in Stockholm who are ready to create the franchise contract- which explains the brand in detail and states the responsibilities of the franchiser and franchisee. The contract forms the base of the company as it enables the partnering between me and the restaurant owners.
  2. Creating a Limited Company (Aktiebolag- AB): 50’000 SEK. As many of you might know, one usually sees the fruits of one’s work in a startup after about 2 years. Although my catering business was profitable within 1,5 years, it still isn’t enough to use as investment. The share capital requirement to open a Limited Company in Sweden is 50’000.
  3. Refining the branding: 20’000 SEK or more. The rest of the final investment- left after tax determinations from the Swedish Tax Agency (see disclaimer above)- will be used for brand design. Although I have created a concept and prototype branding, it needs to be refined into a proper logo and other digital elements as well as interior design that truly represents the concept and atmosphere of the pub in a coherent way. A good digital design is crucial for communicating the brand effectively and the interior, together with the lighting, sets the right atmosphere. I have already teamed up with a group of designers in Stockholm who specialize in branding food and beverage concept.

 

  • WHY HAVE I NOT PARTNERED UP WITH A RESTAURANT OWNER ALREADY?

There are three reasons why I have not yet partnered up with a franchisee:

  1. Protection of the brand- before presenting and selling in the brand, it must be protected through the franchise contract where the concept will be clearly explained. Furthermore, recipe copying is not unusual within the restaurant business and I have therefore been developing the concept discretely until now.
  2. Customer demand- usually, franchises are built from an existing restaurant that is then ‘duplicated’. In this case, the concept has not been used in a restaurant which lowers the credibility of the brand since there is no evidence of customer demand or profitable numbers to show. Previous customers’ feedback, this crowdfunding campaign and online feedback is a way to show the demand for this brand to franchisers.
  3. Incomplete brand- the concept still needs the finishing touch by designers to have a proper, coherent brand that can be presented when searching for partners.

 

  • WHY CROWDFUNDING?

I have chosen to use crowdfunding for the following three reasons:

  1. Control- To be independent as a franchiser enables me run the concept without compromising the fundamental philosophy of the brand, the food style or quality instead of being steered by other partners’ interests. While still running my startup business, I simply don’t have enough to invest in my concept alone.
  2. Transparency- The crowdfunding engages future customers and becomes a platform for communicating with you at an early stage. This enables me to listen to your ideas and feedback while remaining transparent in my process of building this business so that my intentions and goals of the business are understood by the public.
  3. Credibility for franchisee- Engaging future customers and getting feedback at this stage is crucial to get more credibility for the future partners to believe in the brand. The crowdfunding therefore serves as a way to fund, but more so as a tool to show the demand for this brand. A loan would not provide this information or publicity.

 

WHO WILL RUN THE RESTAURANT?

Today, there are two common ways for a restaurant owner to get help with creating their concept and brand:

  1. Consultants within brand development, menu creating, design or kitchen flow* help restaurant owners in these separate fields. Each one can be hired for a specific project related to their field (e.g. creating the interior design or branding) which then is owned by the restaurant owner when the project is finished. This gives the restaurant owner independence in running the business. However, it can cause a ‘loose’ brand since the concept is something that needs care and attention. This can cause an incoherent concept where the food quality, food style, service, atmosphere, design, don’t live up to the original brand idea and customer expectations.
  2. A franchise business means that a franchisee pays a licence fee to a franchiser for using an existing and established brand which also already has the kitchen flow* worked out, an established contact with suppliers as well as other thought out systems needed for running the restaurant. This gives the restaurant owner a business that only needs to be run strictly according to the provided instructions. While this is a perfect package for fast food chains, it requires a high starting fee and does not entirely fit the sustainable gourmet brand in mind. The interior design cannot be exactly duplicated since GRUB will focus on second hand, while the creativity in the kitchen will be kept at a high level by professional chefs by having a ‘living’ menu that changes monthly. My franchise will provide a smaller package, listed down below, and thus a smaller entry fee.  

The idea is therefore to create the brand GRUB that customers back up to show their interest. The restaurant will be run by a partner which the competencies listed below as well as the services I will provide for the entry and monthly fee.

* Kitchen flow= the term for the routines created for a kitchen for a working flow of service, cleaning, storage, food preparation and cooking.

  • RESPONSIBILITIES AND COMPETENCIES OF SELINA HAMI

I have run and managed cafés as well as created and run my own business. All after working in the restaurant industry for 11 years. By creating this concept, the franchisees are provided the main services listed below (the details are presented in the contract with the franchisee) for an entrance fee and a fixed monthly fee.

- A developed package of an external brand with recipes, market positioning, logo, web design, interior design and more.

- An established customer demand and smaller existing customer base.

- Continuous consulting regarding the external and internal brand.

- Continuous marketing for brand

- Continuous establishment and development of the brand

- Established contact with suppliers

- Training of the brand, cooking, recipes, food philosophy for management staff

- Since this franchise has not been tested as a physical restaurant, it lacks an established kitchen flow or recorded success rates and will therefore have lower fees than an established franchise.

- The fees for the first franchise restaurant will be lower than the future ones since the kitchen flow, success rates and internal brand will be fully developed in the first location.

 

  • RESPONSIBILITIES AND COMPETENCIES OF THE FRANCHISEES

The franchising contract is the base of the company and will be signed by all parties involved. The will clearly state the responsibility of the parties, where the franchisee’s include:

- Paying an entry fee and a monthly fee for the licence to use the brand and the services provided by GRUB.

- Owning and running the physical restaurant, which means paying for any fees involved such as suppliers, employers, administration fees, furnishing, etc.

- The location will be picked out together with Selina Hami.

Are you interested in becoming the first partner and franchisee of GRUB? Contact me at selina@selina.se for further details.

FUTURE PLANS

My plan is to partner with a franchisee and run the restaurant for three years before thinking about franchising further. This is the time it usually takes to establish a restaurant, develop the routines and see if it is a profitable business with a strong enough brand. A second restaurant would be opened in another location in Stockholm to further build the routines and the concept while enabling the two franchisees to communicate and cooperate. When the two restaurants are established, one can start thinking about expanding to other cities such as Gothenburg- which already has a demand and an established market for plant based restaurants.

 

ABOUT THE REWARDS

If you click the button “BACK IT” you can choose to donate an optional amount which will not be taxed- this means that I will receive the full amount you chose to donate. When choosing a perk, the amount you pay will be taxed- which means that I do not receive the full amount.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

IF I DON’T RAISE THE MONEY

If the crowdfunding’s total stated amount is not fully raised during this campaign, your contribution will not be drawn from your account. I have chosen Indiegogo’s Fixed Funding which means that I only receive your contributions if the total amount is raised during these 40 days.

The E-book contains 30 of my favourite lunch/dinner/brunch recipes. Arabic nacho plate? Baba's Sandwich? French toast without eggs? Anything is possible.

IF I DON’T FIND A FRANCHISEE

To find the right franchisee will take time to find, such as any partner for a company. However, with a well-packaged, well-presented, right fees and provided services to the franchisee, a partner will be found. Some details of the package will be negotiated with the partner but if no-one is found during 2017, the package will be re-evaluated and altered to suit the newly found requests and needs while still maintaining the core concept that affects the external brand. In other words, when negotiating, my philosophy, food style or core brand will not be altered- only the internal brand and organization which communicates the brand properly.

WHEN AND WHERE

Since there is no partner yet, and good locations take time to find in Stockholm, the exact time and space cannot be promised. The goal, however, is to have a contract signed with a partner to then go on the big quest to find a great location in the city by then end of 2017.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Money. That sneaky little fella that inevitably seems to disappear whenever it is needed. If it has succeeded in escaping your rulership and turned into another one of those cool pants from the retro shop that you will actually never use (which you totally should, just to funk things up), don’t worry. I will be forever grateful if you share the news of the crowdfunding or send me feedback on what I could improve.

CREDIBILITY

For further information about my previous work, articles and videos you can go to the links presented down below.

 

Cheers!

 

Selina Hami

Founder

selina@selina.se

 

www.selina.se

www.selina.se/resume

www.selina.se/grub

In this text I have chosen to use the words ‘plant based’ and ‘vegan’ referring to the food being made from 100% plant sources without any added animal products. Detailed information on why plant based foods are positive and a necessity for maintaining a sustainable environment, health and ethical treatment of animals will not be discussed in this text.VIDEOS & ARTICLESWatch videos about Selina and her project here.

 
About GRUB:

Selina's catering and food projects in Syria:

In my catering I focused on plant based Middle Eastern dishes but over time became fascinated with how to create vegan burgers and street food from scratch that everyone can enjoy. I tested my burgers in my catering, my non-vegan as well as vegan customers cheered, I did a happy dance. Now- after having built a concept around this menu- it's time to take the next step: starting the franchise concept GRUB to open the first funky, vegan pub in Stockholm. THE FRANCHISING IDEASince starting my catering, I’ve received requests from customers to open a restaurant and requests from restaurant owners to create a concept for them to run- while at the same time the customer demand and the planet’s need for us to switch to more plant based food is constantly growing.Before I went vegan, I loved hanging out at the typical rustic, gourmet burger and steak places in Stockholm. Today, the vegan restaurants available are oriented towards health, raw, or fast food while other restaurants offer vegan options that are marginalized on the menu.I have created a rustic franchise pub concept where gourmet, plant based street food is made from scratch with quality produce and served with handicraft beer in a social, inviting environment of live jam session nights, board games and art exhibitions.To run a restaurant you need to partner up with others in order to divide the workload and the investments. story:
Welcome to the Re-Opening of
Cassinelli's Restaurant!

Cassinelli's is coming back to Clay County, AL. To start with we will be serving Lunch and Dinner Tuesday through Friday and will be available for private parties on weekends and Monday. Dine-In will be available at no more that 50% occupancy until the threat of Covid-19 is over. We will also be offering On-Line and Phone ordering and accept Credit and Debit cards online and over the phone for Take-Out and Local Delivery. Catering to Local Businesses is also available. Owned and operated by Angela Cassinelli. I have negotiated a long term lease on the building, with an option to purchase.

I will be moving back to Ashland the first week of August but we have already started to fix up the building. This time Cassinelli's will be a little different. Cassinelli's will be offering Memberships and giving every member 25% off on every purchase for the member and one guest. I'm asking you to become a Member.

  • The purpose of this Campaign is to give back to all my loyal supporters.
  • Cassinelli's was Rated The best restaurant in Clay County by AL.com

What We Need & What You Get

Opening a restaurant is not easy! Fortunately, I have this covered. Keeping it going takes your support. I'm looking for at least 100 of my loyal customers to commit to a Four-Month Community Membership in Cassinelli's. Show your support for Small Businesses. #SHOPLOCAL

Membership is on a month to month basis and only costs $25.00 per month. Membership starts on the day you join and entitles the member to a 25% discount on all purchases for food and drink for you the member and one guest. This 25% discount is good for dine-in or take-out.
The average meal costs about $12.00 but members get that same meal for $9.00 a savings of $3.00 and if you dine with a friend the saving doubles to $6.00. What that means is if you dine-in or take-out for two people just once a week you have covered $24.00 of your $25.00 membership fee. You can start and stop your membership anytime you want.

  • Cassinelli's is looking for 100+ people to commit to a Four-Month Membership ($100.00).
  • Get a 25% discount on all food and drink purchases for you the member and one guest.
  • As a Founding Member, you also receive a Cassinelli's Hat and T-Shirt a $27.00 value.
  • Our goal is 100+ Founding Members signed up by August 15th, 2020. We must reach 50 Founding Members to trigger funding. 

The Impact

Cassinelli's made an impact on the Clay County Community serving the area for over 6 years. Our unique menu offers a variety of specialty sandwiches, salads, and soups, along with Italian Dinners and are local catering services. We will continue to offer the community a huge variety of Fresh Food... Made to order for dine-in, take-out, and catering services.

The Cassinelli's Menu

(NOTE: Weekly specials will be added to the menu

like sandwiches, soups, salads and meals.)

  1. Cuban Sandwich...... Pork Roast marinated in Mojo sauce, house-cooked ham, Swiss cheese, pickles and mustard on Cuban Bread and pressed.
  1. Reuben Sandwich...... Corned Beef, Sauerkraut, Swiss Cheese and 1000 Island dressing on Marble Rye Bread and pressed.
  1. Ham and Cheese Panini.... House cooked Ham, Provolone Cheese, Mayonnaise or Mustard on Panini Bread and pressed.
  1. BBQ Sandwich...
  1. Cheesesteak Sandwich.... with Provolone Cheese, Mayonnaise or Mustard, Sautéed Onions and peppers on Cuban bread and pressed.
  1. Chicken Philly... Grilled Chicken, Provolone Cheese, Mayonnaise or Mustard, Sautéed Onions and Peppers on Cuban Bread and Pressed.
  1. Grilled Chicken Pita Wrap...Grilled Chicken Breast; Shredded Cheddar Cheese, lettuce, Tomatoes and topped with Nelli’s House Ranch.
  1. Veggie Wrap... Spinach and Herb Tortilla, Sour Cream, Lettuce, Black Beans and yellow rice, shredded cheddar cheese, and diced tomatoes and lightly pressed.
     
  2. Grilled Chicken or Cheesesteak Quesadilla .... on Spinach and herb Tortilla with sour cream, grilled onions, and peppers, shredded cheddar cheese served with a side of salsa and lightly pressed.
     
  3. Grilled Cheese… Provolone and American Cheese served on Pressed Panini 
     
  4. Chicken Salad Sandwich... with Mayonnaise, Grapes, Celery, Walnuts, Scallions on Cuban Bread.

Salads:

12. Chicken Salad Plate... with Mayonnaise, Grapes, Celery, Walnuts, Scallions. Served on bed Iceberg Lettuce, Spring Mix with Sliced Tomatoes, and side of toasted Pita or Cuban Bread.

13. Garden Salad... Iceberg Lettuce, Spring Mix, diced tomatoes, cucumbers, green olives, and shredded cheddar cheese. Served with toasted Pita bread or Cuban Bread. Add Grilled Chicken Optional.

14. Chef Salad... Iceberg Lettuce, Spring Mix, diced tomatoes; cucumbers, green olives, diced ham; shredded cheddar cheese, and boiled egg. Served with Toasted Pita Bread or Cuban Bread. Add Grilled Chicken Optional

Dressings: Nelli’s Ranch, Italian, Buttermilk Ranch, 1000 Island, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Blue Cheese, and Honey Mustard.

Sides... Black Beans and Yellow Rice topped with shredded cheddar cheese and onions, House Cut Fries, Toasted Cuban, or Pita Bread with Nelli’s Ranch.

Other Ways You Can Help

Becoming a Founding Member is not the only way you can help.

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the return of Cassinelli's.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

story:
THIS IS NOT A COMMON ENERGY GUMMIE, THIS IS THE PERFECT, MUST COMPLETE GUMMIE, ALL CAFFEINE PRODUCTS DON´T HAVE  ALL VITAMINS AND MINERALS THAT THUNDER GUMMIES HAVE. AND ALSO, ALL VITAMIN PRODUCT DON´T HAVE  THE ENERGY THAT THUNDER GUMMIES HAVE.

FOR THE SKIN: Vitamin E and Betacarotene that are presents in fruits and vegetables.

FOR THE TEETH: Calcium, Vitamin A, C and D that are presents in fruits and milk.

FOR THE HAIR: Vitamin F (linoleic acid) and Vitamin B3 (Pantothenic Acid) that are presents in fish and eggs.

FOR THE BONES: Calcium and Vitamin D.

FOR THE HUMOR: Vitamin C that are present in citrics

FOR THE SIZE GROWTH: Vitamin B for the muscle and Vitamin D for the bones that are available in milk, fish, eggs and wheat.

FOR THE PREGNANCY: Vitamin B9 (Folic Acid) and Calcium is present in green vegetables and avocado that prevents bad baby formations and milk.

AFTER 35 YEARS OLD YOU SHOULD INCLUIDE DAILY: Vitamin C, E and Betacarotene.

FOR OLDER PEOPLE: Calcium, Vitamin B and Vitamin D

 

HAVE YOU EVER TASTE ENERGY FOOD OR BEVERAGE WITH REAL TEQUILA, BOURBON, IRISH CREAM LIQUEUR, CHOCOLATE OR COFFEE? DO YOU KNOW ANY ENERGY PRODUCT THAT YOU CAN CHOOSE THE FLAVOR THAT YOU HAVE IN MIND?

 

I DON´T THINK SO!!

MAYBE YOU DON'T LIKE OUR OWN FLAVORS, CAN YOU EVEN IMAGINE THAT YOU COULD CREATE YOUR FAVORITE FLAVOR OF AN ENERGY GUMMIE?

THERE IS NO COMPANY THAT CAN CREATE YOUR FLAVOR! I COULD BET THAT YOU, MOST OF THE TIMES DON´T LIKE THE ENERGY DRINK´S FLAVOR.

I DARE YOU TO TRY US WITH YOUR CREATION! YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.

THE PACKAGING IS PERSONALIZED TO! YOU WILL BE THE CREATOR OF IT!

 

OUR GUMMIES HAVE NO ARTIFICIAL INGREDIENTS!! NO EXTRA SUGAR ADDED!! NO FUNNY THINGS!

 

What our gummies gives you it´s the energy you need to complete a perfect day without feeling any time tired.  NO ENERGY CRUSH.... NO SHAKENESS

 

 

Also, when you receive your order, you will easily see a discount code in our online store that will be good for 1 year long, not for 12 sales, it will be for 1 year long. You will want to give it to your family, friends, coworkers, anyone!!! The same price on INDIEGOGO will be for you during one year! 

GET YOUR THUNDER T-SHIRT

  

We are ready to produce and send you as soon as possible. We have the handmade experience producing gummies and we know that you will not regret buying!

Try them and give us the opportunity to reach our goal.

Anyone can buy Thunder Gummies because we produce VEGAN and TRADITIONAL gummies. All gummies, no mater if its vegan or traditional, has the perfect amount of ingredients that you will love them.

In less than 10 minutes you will have the energy you need for more than 5 hours.

We would love to send to any corner of the world Thunder Gummies.

We need from you it's to try it just one time and you will receive:

- A perfect energy gummies,

- A perfect package,

- A perfect packaging

- A perfect flavor OR YOUR OWN FAVORITE FLAVOR

- 1 Year long special discount (THERE IS NO MAXIMUM PURCHASES)

- Special samples in some orders so that we can receive a feedback from you.

 

The reason we ask for this amount of money is for a special packing design and process that will make our Thunder Gummies more perfect! Unfortunately it´s never enough, so we need more!

 

We hope to have you in our team!

 

Thanks and Best Regards,

 

The Thunder Team

story:
Das Projekt:

Wir haben eine großartige Eventlocation im Taunus nahe Frankfurt: eine alte Fabrikhalle aus dem 19.Jahrhundert welche bereits eine Restauration beinhaltet und als besondere Attraktion einen kleinen Indoor-Hochseilgarten über den Restauranttischen. Ferner gibt es eine Indoor-Kletterwand, einen kleinen Boulderbereich für Kinder in dem diese sich auf weiche Matratzen fallen lassen können und einen großen Outdoor Hochseilgarten, nur 10 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt. Angeschlossen ist ein Eventbüro, in dem man Veranstaltungen für Gruppen mit sportlichen Aktivitäten, Kletteraktionen, Floß-Bau an nahegelegenen Teichen als Gruppenaktivität oder auch als Team-Building-Maßnahme buchen kann. Wir möchten nun die Restauration, welche derzeit fast nicht betrieben wird, ausbauen und dazu noch eine feine Brauerei installieren. Diese soll nicht nur für Aktivitäten wie „selber Bier-brauen“ genutzt werden, sondern das tolle Naherholungsangebot erweitern und zwar mit Braukursen. Der Erholungswert des frisch und klassisch gebrauten traditionellen Bieres, welches nicht mit Zutaten gepanscht wird (die explizit im sogenannten „Deutschen Reinheitsgebot“ nicht genannt werden, aber gerne auch von großen Brauereien genutzt werden, oder die zum sogenannten Craft-Bier-Wahn gehören), ist besonders. Die Spielwiese der Geschmäcker, die man aus den vier Grundzutaten Wasser, Malz, Hopfen und Hefe zaubern kann, ist gewaltig und mehr braucht es auch nicht! Wir haben in den letzten drei Jahren Bierrezepte entwickelt, die dem Genießer ein Schnalzen entlocken und den ursprünglichen Biergenuss, der in unseren Breiten nicht mehr so leicht anzutreffen ist, hochhält. Es soll die höchste Brauereianlage Hessens werden (ca 600m ü.NN, laut aktuellem Kenntnisstand gibt es keine höhere Brauerei in Hessen) und auch in ausgewählten Hotels und Restaurants (es gibt bereits Vorbestellungen!) erhältlich sein. Für den heimischen Genuss werden wir auch Flaschen abfüllen und an ausgewählte Restaurants und Hotels in und um Frankfurt vertreiben. Ziel ist jedoch eine überschaubare Größe, machbar in unserer besonderen Location.

Auch soll dieses wunderschöne Restaurant mit großer Kapazität für Livekonzerte und große Get-together genutzt werden. 

 

Wer sind wir: Wir sind ein drei Mann starkes Team.

Dazu gehört Simon, ausgebildeter Glaser und Einzelhandelskaufmann, zudem ehemaliger Lehramtsstudent für Englisch sowie Politik und Wirtschaft, der sich seit drei Jahren intensiv  mit der Thematik des Bierbrauens, welches uns alle drei die letzten Jahre stark beschäftigt und motiviert, befasst hat. Simon ist unser Bierbrauer und wird das flüssige Gold herstellen.

Dann ist da Felix, gelernter Koch und kreativer Geist in allen gastronomischen Belangen. Derzeit als Geschäftsführer und Mädchen für alles in einem bekannten Frankfurter Cateringunternehmen beschäftigt, wird er sich der kulinarischen Anforderungen der Gäste der Events und des Restaurants annehmen und diese mit einer anspruchsvoll bodenständigen und extrem leckeren Küche, natürlich auch passend zum Bier, verwöhnen.

Der dritte im Bunde ist Jan, Rechtsanwalt, LL.M. und diplomiert von einer renomierten Schweizer  Hotelfachschule, zuhause in der Gastronomie,  bereits seit 23 Jahren sowohl im Service als auch der Küche tätig, letztens noch in einem 2* Michelin Restaurant.

 

Was wollen wir von Euch:

Von Euch wollen wir Lust auf coole Events, einzigartiges handgebrautes Bier aus der Gegend und verdammt leckeres Essen. Lust darauf das Angebot im Taunus, dem Einzugsgebiet Frankfurts um eine großartige Möglichkeit zu erweitern und den durstigen Feldbergwanderern, Radlern und Bikern eine tolle Einkehrmöglichkeit zu bieten, wo sie sich von den wunderschönen und anstrengenden Touren in gepflegter Atmosphäre erholen können. Wenn ihr eben darauf Lust habt, unterstützt uns finanziell, damit wir unser Vorhaben rasch verwirklichen können!

Eure Hilfe soll aber natürlich auch eine Gegenleistung erhalten!

 Wenn Ihr es uns ermöglicht diese Brauerei zu eröffnen (der Gesamtkapitalbedarf liegt bei über einer halben Million Euro, mit eurem Zutun können wir aber starten), werdet Ihr für Eure vorgreifliche Unterstützung mit dem herrlichen Göttertrunk belohnt. Unseren Dank für euren Vertrauensvorschuss könnt Ihr auf der Unterstützungsseite mit den Beträgen ersehen. Wir brauchen nicht viel um eine einmalige Institution im Frankfurter Einzugsbereich zu schaffen. Macht mit, feiert mit, trinkt mit! Vielen herzlichen Dank und hoffentlich sehen wir uns bald im Feldberger!

story:
How many times have you gone out to eat lunch or dinner and the food was not fresh, hard (dry) or simply wasn't up to your standard?  You probably said, I could have stayed home and cooked my meal myself and saved all the money I spent out for the terrible experience.

Why do you think the majority of food you buy at a restaurant or hotel is simply not prepared properly? It's really quite simple, some restaurants and hotels do not use fresh ingredients and / or quality meats including produce.  

In the U.S., 48 million people get sick & 3,000 die each year from eating contaminated food. 4 million Canadians fall ill each year resulting in over 11,000 hospitalizations & 240 deaths due to food-borne illness as reported by Dr. Paul Roumeliotis, MDCM, MPH, FRCP, CCPE.

For Food Lovers aim to change this terrible misfortune to your stomach and soul by preparing and developing food with the best freshest ingredients, freshest vegetables, freshest seasonings, freshest meats, freshest poultry, freshest fish and so on...

Food Lover's don't go hungry and please don't get sick while eating out, just help "For Food Lovers" Campaign prepare and develop the freshest ingredients for you when you visit each location.

You should have delicious food on your mind because we will certainly entice your stomach with all types of over the top seafood entrees from:

Black’n Salmon (served with dirty rice and steamed vegetables).

Black’n Mahi (served with dirty rice and steamed vegetables). Grilled Salmon (served with dirty rice and steamed vegetables).

Grilled Tilapia (served with dirty rice).

Grilled Snapper (served with dirty rice).

Fried Catfish Dinner overflowing with fries with Shrimp included.

With Delicious Toppings Like:

Black’n oysters, mushrooms, and crawfish tails in spiced lemon garlic butter sauce.

Shrimp, spinach, crawfish tails, and mushrooms in Monterrey Jack cheese sauce.

Shrimp and crawfish tails in wine-lemon garlic butter sauce.

Shrimp, mushrooms, and crawfish tails in white wine cream cheese sauce.

Shrimp, crawfish tails, and fresh sliced avocados in a creamy American cheese basil sauce.

Don't forget about the Steak seared to perfection with a plenty portion Caesar Salad and more.... 

The only hotel & resort that will have you coming back for the food and excellent service. Our hotels will provide award winning seasoned food, yoga , fashion, technology, health awareness, music, business events and wellness education which is loaded with nutritionist food. "Let's help the world and create better food together."

Established in April, 2018., Farr Hotels & Resorts is an Eco Friendly Hotel & Resort, whose mission is to transform economy hotels into Eco Friendly 4 Star Luxury Hotels & Resorts that serve the most awesome food on the menu. Over the past few months, Farr Hotels & Resorts has been identifying and researching hospitality properties that could be added to the roster with value added improvements.

We are in need of your support to continue our work. Think about how delicious the food would taste knowing that you are directly and indirectly supporting / backing this "Food Lover" Campaign.

I would like to introduce you to the founder. I am Ken Farr, Founder & CEO of Farr Hotels & Resorts. As CEO Ken Farr leads the company’s strategic, executive and managerial efforts for acquiring real estate properties like motels, hotels and multifamily. His 25 years of construction improvements (and new construction) of residential, commercial properties including hotels, motels, multifamily and residential gives him a special expertise when it comes to improving / upgrading property. Ken Farr also served 3 years for the City of Dallas as a Board Member for The Permit and License Appeal Board that was responsible for overseeing building permits, zoning citations and city ordinance violations. 

As you can see, Ken has the experience to improve hotels and resorts which will improve the overall restaurant equipment that will certainly improve the food ingredients regarding better preparation.

Farr Hotels & Resorts aims to be different from the rest of our competitors by seeking out the freshest seafood prepared daily with the utmost care in mind by consulting some of the best chefs in the industry. We will also purchase vegetables daily from local farmer markets and coop programs that are aligned with similar beliefs. In addition, we plan to upgrade all of our internal equipment, which includes appliances from HVAC to water-filtration systems and beyond, to high-quality levels.

Farr Hotels & Resorts Food Lover Campaign is very important to us because we are focused on disrupting the $500 Billion hotel and resort market by integrating more food that is easily prepared, healthier while developing some of the most sought after meals provided by our wonderful guest chefs. Farr Hotels & Resorts Founder, Ken Farr, has always believed in better food and preserving the Earth while also providing a better customer experience to hotel customers.

As a contributor(s), you will help us acquire hotels in Arkansas, Texas, Chicago, Atlanta, and other desirable locations that can benefit from our Food Lover transformation and soften the negative image on the hospitality market by participating. Every Farr Hotels & Resorts you see will make you smile because you played a very significant part in bringing this campaign to the masses with your generous contributions.

Farr Hotels & Resorts Needs Are:

We Need $1.8 million to purchase our first hospitality property located in Arkansas.

We are seeking $30,000.00 (first phase) to develop and enhance our meals.

$1.8 million (second phase) will be used to buy our first hotel including improving restaurant equipment, market to more social media customers, restaurant construction improvements, hire chefs, upgrades, working capital, hiring  employees, taxes & legal fees, aggressive digital marketing / advertising campaigns that target business / casual travelers including the Millennial's. 

USE of Funds:                                                

The funds will go to developing better ingredients for our hospitality menus, attracting more customers online, opening a corporate location(s), identifying, selecting (phase 1.) and closing on a smaller hotel if we do not reach our entire campaign goal (phase 2.) and / or securing additional business loans to raise the additional amount necessary to purchase our select hospitality property.

The Impact:

Farr Hotels & Resorts is a startup aiming to disrupt the $500 Billion Hospitality Industry, while also helping to improve the food and menus that are available at hotels throughout the country. 

Many if not all of you have purchased food from a restaurant or a hotel during your life. Very few of you have probably stopped to think about how bad the food could be if not prepared properly.

Now, you have the opportunity to change all that by supporting "For Food Lovers", Campaign and asking your family and friends to support the campaign as well.

Farr Hotels & Resorts will work extremely hard to become the world leader in better hotel food.

Help us reach our goal, and help make the world a taster place.

Our Food Lover Project is very valuable to the contributor(s) because everyone must eat whether you like salads or you are a vegan - we all must eat to live. The world benefits immensely because a penny earned is a penny saved (energy earned is energy saved) (“A penny saved is a penny earned?” is a quote which is attributed to Benjamin Franklin, one of the most famous Americans of his and our time.. 

Ken has a very successful track record in transforming nothing into something better and greater.

Support us and we will support you with every location we acquire.

Risks & Challenges:

There are risks associated with these projects such as a larger hospitality competitor(s) entering this exciting improved fresh food market and delays by food suppliers(s) including suppliers, equipment and services - but, we feel the benefits certainly outweigh the risks that could be associated with any industries (there also, could be delays in product shipping and delivery from suppliers).

Here is what qualifies us to overcome these hurdles by strategically selecting the best ingredients, hotels that can be transformed quicker and studying the market as to offset any change(s) or fluctuations that may be foreseeable as well as unforeseeable.

My plan is to utilize my over 25 years of experience to solve these challenges by keeping on schedule, hiring the most effective experienced employees, implementing strong quality assurance and evaluating better solutions to improve our hospitality market including integrating state of the art software with marketing analytics.

How We Intend To Use Your Donations:

Develop more menus with better ingredients that our customers would embrace.

Acquire or manage our first hotel while transforming the restaurant customer experience.

Legal expenses (legal Fees, legal documentation and accounting).

Sourcing and identifying new menus including onsite visits. Food workshops, nutritional seminars and more...

 Advertising & Marketing - To raise awareness via media such as TV and radio segments, press release, digital marketing, email marketing / brochures, 30 seconds commercials published in online / offline and various newspapers/ magazines.

 Coordination and hosting meetings with brokers and all relevant parties.

Regular press conferences

Regular public appearances including trade shows.

Print media - Brochures/ Catalogues.

Promotional videos with direct email marketing.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you are not able to contribute, how about retweeting, sharing or posting our information on social media website(s):

Ask your family and friends everywhere to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

We know it’s not always easy to contribute financially, and that’s completely fine. You can still help us by just spreading the word! Reach out to people who you might think is interested in supporting our cause. You can also use the Indiegogo platform to promote this campaign with friends, family, and on social media networks. Hope this didn’t take up much of your time and a big thank you for all the support!

For more information on FHR and what we do, visit https://farrhotelsresorts.com

Can’t contribute but would love to get involved?

Drop us an email at contact@farrhotelsresorts.com

Looking for more information or have a question?

story:
Help Us Launch Our New Colors!!

In December of 2019 we launched the original DraftBottle, our Steel-Blue model that you see in our video. After our launch, we've had great success selling DraftBottle on our website, at beer fests, to local breweries (even national craft breweries like Shipyard!) and local/regional retail. DraftBottle has gained traction as more and more people are looking for new and fun ways to enjoy their favorite drinks outside of traditional settings. Along with that success comes challenges and also product suggestions/expansion.

Two of the suggestions were producing more colors and adding a silicone bottom for slip and scratch protection. We went to our manufacturer in January 2020 and added our two new models Brushed Stainless Steel and Gunpowder Black! Also, we have added a silicone bottom to help with slip and scratch protection.

Ugh...2020!

We all know what happened next, the world changed in March 2020 and our production was delayed for over six months. We were able to obtain a small amount of our new colors with the silicone bottoms in late 2020 for the holiday season. But, now we need your help with producing our full production run!

In exchange for your gracious consideration, we are offering you the chance to order our new colors of DraftBottle at a discount, normally $24.99, now $15 for Earlybird backers (that's 40% off)! The funds raised will go directly to the production of the new colors, retail boxes and some marketing. 

The best thing: We have everything set for production! Once funding piece has been solidified, we will have the bottles produced and shipped to you by late March, early April 2021, just in time for the Spring/Summer!

Small batch of our new colors, Gunpowder Black & Brushed Stainless!

 

Sweet Full Color Retail Boxes, With Your Help!

 

So Wait...What is DraftBottle?

DraftBottle is a new beverage tumbler which unscrews below the neck allowing you to easily fill it with 22oz of draft beer, mixed drinks, iced coffee, water, glass bottled beer, beer from a growler, or any other beverage!  It’s made from 18/8 food grade stainless steel, and the base cup is  double walled and vacuum sealed to keep your brew cold! The reusable cap helps to stop spills and prevent unwanted debris from getting in. The  exterior is powder coated to help durability, it’s sweat-proof, has a leak-proof seal around the separation and a silicone bottom for slip and scratch protection. DraftBottle is Eco-friendly,  BPA free and is dishwasher-safe and super easy to clean!

DraftBottle was a 2020 Finalist for QVC/HSN's "The Big Find"!

 

DraftBottle Has Been Featured In:

 

The Features of DraftBottle

 

 

The DraftBottle Story

Like most  inventions or ideas, they are born out of a need to help solve a  problem, and if it involves beer (or jack 'n coke), you better believe I will be motivated  to solve it! So, what is that problem? How do you enjoy your draft beer/glass beer or other beverages in places where do don’t want plastic cups/glass bottles but you still want the feel of holding a classic beer bottle? – That is where DraftBottle comes in! A  few years ago I was getting ready to do some yard work and I wanted to  enjoy the beer I had on tap in my kegerator. There were a few problems,  the plastic cups are too open, and grass and bugs fall into it, it gets warm, it spills easily, etc etc etc. Then I thought, why isn’t there a  beer bottle that opens below the neck so I can fill it up with draft  beer?? DraftBottle was born! What you see below is what I scribbled down on a piece of paper to remember my idea. What you can also see, is those years of art school, really paid off....lol! I sent that masterpiece to a friend who is a patent attorney and the journey began!

Design Patent Approval

In March of 2019 we were informed that our 2 design patents for a screw and snap  together convertible container were approved, we immediately went to work finding a manufacturer and began the process of making production molds and putting together a launch budget.   We were initially going to run a crowd-funding campaign, but decided to fund the first run of Steel Blue DraftBottles internally and get them out to market as quickly as possible. By the time our patents were issued in June of 2019, we had begun production on samples, had our 1st production run scheduled and our launch date set.

Uses? - Unlimited!

 DraftBottle has unlimited uses, which include but are not limited to:

  • Easily fill draft beer from a tap/kegerator
  • Perfect for around the pool/beach/boat, or any non-glass areas
  • Fun and easy for tailgating & the golf course
  • Use around the house when you don’t want a drink to spill
  • Craft Brew Promo Item/”Go-Cup”
  • Great as a water-bottle as well, easily add ice to a drink
  • Easy to clean, so great for shakes and other beverages

 

Risks & Challenges

The risks of this project are low, we have already worked with the manufacturer to produce our first color model and small batch of the new colors, so the mold is already "in-house" and we have built a great working relationship with them over the past year. We have a production date scheduled for early March, the only issue, as with any manufacturing project, is the funding, that is where you fine people come in!

We are proud of everything we have achieved so far, and we look forward to creating more design styles, sizes, and new products with your help, as we grow. Thank you for taking the time to learn our story, and we hope you enjoy DraftBottle, cheers!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please remember that you can always share, tag & mention @DraftBottle on all the social platforms to help spread the word! Please use use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank You!

 

Our pint ring cap and bottle holders are available as as add-on!
