story:
Please have a look at the video of the new prototype

 

Take a break

Living in China, just like in any other place on earth, can be exhausting, you got pressure from work, from home, from society and from yourself to make the most out of you. Older Chinese people have a trick to fade out, they get a tea ceremony going.

The particular aspect of the tea ceremony I like the most is the performance of making tea, it's a unique moment to experience. It's taking that break and just enjoy the time of doing nothing, let the water and tea leaves do the work. If you can't go to a teahouse next door you should check T_Flip. T_Flip goes on the endeavor to solve this by bringing a new kind of tea ceremony to your home, your office or even with you on a trip.

 

Flip yourself a cup of tea

Add tea leaves and Filter

 

Add water and rinse the tea leaves

 

Add Rinse Cup and flip it

 

Put the Rinse Cup away

 

Add water and the Drinking Glass

 

Flip your cup of tea

 

And enjoy

 

Lose a bad habit and get a new good one

I was always using tea bags before but after getting to know loose leaf tea I switch completaly.  The advantages are its unbroken leaves retain that matchless flavors, diverse aromas and especially preserve all these health benefits that a body needs in today's hectic life. And what better way to take a moment for yourself by flipping yourself a cup all of that.

 

Upgrade your tea

T_Flip has the Chinese tea ceremony moment but it's also convenient to use, to clean, store and to take with you. It's so many things in one but comfy in size and weight. The only waste that remains is the used tea leaves, which you can reinfuse several times, compared to just one single  cup with tea bags.

An apple a day keeps the doctor away

I think " A cup of tea a day, keeps the doctor away". In China, the daily ritual of drinking tea has a long history, it's not just about the taste but also about the side effects on the body and health. So getting in the habit of your daily cup of tea can have a long-term benefit for your health. 

 

Small things can create big things

The idea of T_Flip came when I saw the first time the aroma cup, it's traditionally used to smell all the aromatic flavors of Oolong Tea. You can clearly see where the inspiration came from.

 

To develop the very minimal and simplistic design I had the support from 4 very talented designers from all over the world. They helped me find the formal language, adopt elements and fix all the tricky parts for the final production need to start.

 

Do you rinse it?

I do, for some teas, it cleans the leaves from dust and opens them up so that the proper infusion will be more successful. T_Flip is the only western teaware that includes that step into its design.

 

The toolkit for fixing your day

 

Recommended by babies around the world

If you have kids you probably already came in touch with it, Bamboo fiber. It's a material getting popular for tableware that shouldn't break too fast, is dishwasher friendly, heat resistant and most importantly will decompose naturally when discarded. I liked these aspects a lot, so for as many parts of T_Flip as possible, I used bamboo fiber. Also, I live in Zhejiang province the main place for bamboo production, so it seems like a perfect fit.

 

 

The China survival kit

I also had the chance to have great partners here in China with Lucas that makes setting up companies in China looking like a piece of cake. My great friend Ka who orchestrated all the shootings and filmings. I would be definitely lost without the help of Jade, the best partner to have if you need to navigate through the waters of Chinese marketing. 

 

 

Help me flip it into reality

Your support would help a lot to start a project like that. The production of the mold for all the parts of T_Flip is the most costly part of the process that I can't, unfortunately, afford by myself. The glasses, by the way, are already produced and wait in the factory.

We have very good perks with up to 50% on the future retail price, your backing would make a difference, so I hope to hear from you. If you like the project you can also share it with your friends who need a break or could be potential new tea lovers.
story_txt: Please have a look at the video of the new prototype Take a breakLiving in China, just like in any other place on earth, can be exhausting, you got pressure from work, from home, from society and from yourself to make the most out of you. Older Chinese people have a trick to fade out, they get a tea ceremony going.The particular aspect of the tea ceremony I like the most is the performance of making tea, it's a unique moment to experience. It's taking that break and just enjoy the time of doing nothing, let the water and tea leaves do the work. If you can't go to a teahouse next door you should check T_Flip. T_Flip goes on the endeavor to solve this by bringing a new kind of tea ceremony to your home, your office or even with you on a trip. Flip yourself a cup of teaAdd tea leaves and Filter Add water and rinse the tea leaves Add Rinse Cup and flip it Put the Rinse Cup away Add water and the Drinking Glass Flip your cup of tea And enjoy Lose a bad habit and get a new good oneI was always using tea bags before but after getting to know loose leaf tea I switch completaly.  The advantages are its unbroken leaves retain that matchless flavors, diverse aromas and especially preserve all these health benefits that a body needs in today's hectic life. And what better way to take a moment for yourself by flipping yourself a cup all of that. Upgrade your teaT_Flip has the Chinese tea ceremony moment but it's also convenient to use, to clean, store and to take with you. It's so many things in one but comfy in size and weight. The only waste that remains is the used tea leaves, which you can reinfuse several times, compared to just one single  cup with tea bags.An apple a day keeps the doctor awayI think " A cup of tea a day, keeps the doctor away". In China, the daily ritual of drinking tea has a long history, it's not just about the taste but also about the side effects on the body and health. So getting in the habit of your daily cup of tea can have a long-term benefit for your health.  Small things can create big thingsThe idea of T_Flip came when I saw the first time the aroma cup, it's traditionally used to smell all the aromatic flavors of Oolong Tea. story:
https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=41767178866
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Shipping Details

We are glad to be able to provide people all around the world with IRISgo reusable cups, with shipping available to more than 150 countries worldwide. Depending on your country, you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes, or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information.

As we provide worldwide shipping, it is impossible for us to cover all potential local charges. The prices are therefore for the product without additional costs such as customs duties and possible taxes. We give everything so that you can enjoy your drinks asap from an IRISgo.

We are working closely with our manufacturing partner to ensure that every single IRISgo cup meets our quality standards. In the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit. Please note, we cannot offer returns or refunds for any other reasons. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at support@conceptiris.ch.

Risks and challenges

We have been working on the IRISgo Cup for over three years now, which means that many of the initial challenges are behind us. As we developed an innovative- closure system and unique design, we went through a long and complex prototyping period. By working with the Institute of Innovation and Technology at Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts, we were able to test our product in numerous important tests, such as durability tests with the closure system and so on. We also spent a lot of effort into the supplier selection to find the partner who meets all our criterias. Together with our selected manufacturer, the final development steps were completed so that today we can present a product ready for mass production. Numerous rounds of prototypes were rigorously tested in a variety of materials to perfect the IRISgo. Everything up to this point has already been paid for, thereby minimizing the risk of unexpected manufacturing costs or hidden delays. We do everything we can to ensure that the IRISgo cups can be delivered as soon as possible. The goal is to deliver the IRISgo cups before 31.03.2021. However, as we are bound to external processes that can't be influenced by us, this delivery time cannot be guaranteed. The worldwide Covid-19 pandemic makes it additionally difficult to estimate a precise delivery time. We are doing everything possible to ensure that you will soon be able to enjoy your drinks out of an IRISgo cup. To ensure that our project runs as smoothly as possible, we draw on expert knowledge in the different project phases. Our network includes experienced industrial designers, business engineers, internationally active manufacturers, and experienced entrepreneurs. Besides, we can count on entrepreneurial support from established foundations and start-up organizations with whom we are in constant contacts, such as the Gebert Rüf Stiftung, Venture Kick, Innovation Transfer Central Switzerland, Smartup, Zünder, and Swiss Innovation Challenge. Of course, there are always obstacles on the way until all IRISgo cups are in the post box of every single supporter, but on our already very long journey we have proven that we can handle various obstacles.

 

Commitment to environmental protection

 

Durable design

The IRISgo is manufactured with durable and reliable materials, in combination with our unique design we aim to provide a highly ergonomic and user-friendly product. The product has been tested for durability with the help of permanent test benches and robots at the Institute of Innovation and Technology at Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts. We place a high value on the sustainability of our product.

Reuse and recyclability

When the product has reached its lifetime, we offer our customers to return the IRISgo cup to us. We disassemble the cup and then we will recycle the individual parts. As we are following the cradle to cradle approach, we selected our suppliers to ensure that all the parts can be recycled. We have also racked our brains over the packaging concept. In our opinion, it is a thorn that the packaging of a large number of products is oversized and only serves the pure purpose of packaging. When choosing our packaging, we tried to design a minimalistic packaging made of sustainable and recyclable materials that can further be used as a storage box or pen holder and is not just a disposable paper tube.

Sustainable materials

IRISgo is made primarily from stainless steel, which is durable and highly resistant to staining, corrosion, and other forms of wear. The non-metal parts of the IRISgo are made of recycled polypropylene, also a very durable material. The third component is silicone which is also a durable material and can be recycled after the lifetime of the product.

Environmentally friendly production 

Our product will be Swiss-Made certified. Swiss companies are obliged to undergo strict environmental controls. Furthermore, we compensate for our total carbon emissions. IRISgo is 100% carbon neutral.

Sustainable Distribution

We also compensate for emissions caused by the distribution of the IRISgo cups.

Something else

Our goal is to achieve a positive impact on the environment with our product. In our opinion, the enormous use of disposable products such as one-way cups is a huge social and environmental problem. Our way to lead society away from the use of these disposable cups is to transform reusable cups into a hyped product which is nice to have and enables perfect drinking enjoyment anytime, anywhere. That is exactly what we want to achieve with the IRISgo. IRISgo convinces with its design, branding, user-friendliness and solves the problems of existing reusable cups. This encourages consumers worldwide to use reusable products more often.

story:
The concept is simple – Make Good Beer, Do Good Things.

Norwalk Brew House (NBH) is a beer company dedicated to leveraging our products, our influence and our brand to give back to the greater community.  From production, to distribution, to brand incubation; the goal is to create an ecosystem of like-minded Latino/POC owned beer companies.  This will allow us to create jobs, build ownership, equity and diversity in an industry where less than 1% of  beer businesses are owned by Latinos. 

Our long term plan is ambitious, but it's not impossible and we believe we can achieve it! 

Step one is to properly launch our fan favorite, "Bidi Bidi Blonde Blonde" - A refreshingly crisp Mexican American blonde ale.  This will be the beer that starts it all and you can proudly say, "I helped make the dream a reality," while you drink the best blonde out there!  

Ray Ricky Rivera is the guy behind Norwalk Brew House. 
As a teenager in high school, Ray joined a local Latin/hip hop band and embarked on a career in music.  Over the next 20 years he toured internationally, released a solo album, ran a record label and started an artist management agency.  He did all these things independently and free of any corporate funding - just pure heart and hustle.

In 2015, Ray cofounded the largest Latino homebrew club in the country – SoCal Cerveceros (SCC). Utilizing his marketing and promotional skills learned in the music industry, Ray helped to establish SCC as one of the fastest growing homebrew clubs in California.  In 2018, SCC was named, “California Homebrew Club of the Year” by Anchor Steam Brewing Company.  Along with the other SCC cofounders, Ray helped create and produce the Coldxela craft beer festival - which today is the largest Latino craft beer fest on the west coast! 

It was at a sold-out Coldxela 2019 when Ray realized a beer company is like a record label.  He can source up and coming brewers like musical talent.  He could develop and market beer brands the way he developed and distributed  music for artists.  Inspired by this idea, Ray set out to create something new - and that's how Norwalk Brew House was born. 

We have already secured a warehouse space which allowed us to apply for our wholesaler permit with the Alcohol and Tobacco Tax and Trade Bureau (federal government).  We have  also applied for our CA state wholesaler license with the Alcoholic Beverage Control.  We've applied for our business permits, DBA's, trademarks and all other legal fees needed to be a legit company.  We've even started paying rent.  Starting a business is not cheap, especially a beer company! We still need a few  crucial things to get us past the finish line. 
 

Goal Breakdown

  • Production (1st batch of beer) = $5,500 / ingredients, labor & packaging 
  • Cold Box (commercial grade cooler to properly store our beer) = $5,000
  • Kegs (to distribute to our restaurant/bar accounts) = $1,200
  • Marketing & Public Relations (promotion & advertising to media) = $1,500
  • Hand Truck aka dolly (cases of beer are heavy!) = $150
  • Keg Trolly (kegs of beer are really heavy!) = $150
  • Indiegogo Fees + holdings = $1,500 (10% of goal)  

 

With these things in place we will be able to produce, properly store and distribute fresh beer to our retail partners.  For marketing/PR, we will work with a professional publicist to help us reach new customers and bring attention to what we're building. 

If the good people of the world get us past our $15,000 goal, the extra funds will help us with buying a used delivery van.  For now, we'll be making deliveries in our cars, but we'll need to upgrade to a proper delivery vehicle as we grow the business.  How cool will it be to see us cruising around your neighborhood in a NBH wrapped van? Super Cool! 

Together, we have an opportunity to make a great impact throughout the Los Angeles beer industry and in our local communities.  NBH is dedicated to fostering new entrepreneurs by incubating other Latino owned beverage brands.  By supporting Norwalk Brew House you will help create new jobs,  and help build a pathway for others to launch their dream. 

NBH beer collaborations will have generated an estimated $10,000 in donations for nonprofit organizations in 2021.  Every single Norwalk Brew House beer collaboration has been created to support various local nonprofits doing important work.  By bringing our flagship beer to market, we will be able to generate revenue and scale our business; allowing us to continue partnering with and supporting nonprofit organizations through future collaborations. 
 

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

WE REALLY APPRECIATE IT! 

 

We understand not everyone is able to make a monetary contribution, but you can still help!  Here are a few ways you can help us reach our goal: 

  • Share this campaign on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & LinkedIn pages. 
  • Email or text the campaign link to friends & encourage them to support. 
  • Follow Norwalk Brew House on Instagram, Facebook & Twitter.
  • Sign up for our newsletter via www.norwalkbrewhouse.com 

 

MAKE GOOD BEER, DO GOOD THINGS

story:
G-Glove – the most complete work and kitchen glove is available for order right now!  Combining all the features users want in an attractive, functional, and affordable package. Protect your hands and get the job done in style with the new G-Glove.

 

 

Cut through everything but your hands. The G-Glove’s cut-proof material stops even the sharpest blade in its tracks. Protect yourself without compromising the task at hand. 

 

 

The G-Glove is nimble and flexible for full comfort and precision cutting in the kitchen and beyond. Cut down to the smallest detail like a pro chef without the glove getting in the way.

 

 

Easily wipe and clean while keeping all your fingers intact. 

 

If you can’t handle the heat, get out of the kitchen. With the G-Glove you won’t have to! Built to handle the hottest objects with heat proofing up to 1000°F (540°C), it’s a must have for any home cooking enthusiast.

 

 

 

No more burnt barbeque. The G-Glove has you covered in any cooking scenario, inside or outside.

 

 

Keeps you protected from fire, grease, and anything else that may jump out at you. Perfect for the campsite or outdoor fire. Impress your group. 

 

 

 

Get as close as you need, hot steam is no match for the G-Glove. So good you’d wish you were covered in it from head to toe. 

 

 

Enjoy the satisfaction of a job well done in full comfort and bliss.

Touch functionality to use with any touchscreen device or appliance. The G-Glove won’t leave your hands. So comfy you won’t even want to.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Easy to keep your take-everywhere, clean-anywhere glove ready for its next task. No matter where you are, the G-Glove is made specifically for easy cleaning and ease of use in any scenario. 

 

 

Life can throw anything at you, the gloves’ waterproofing ensures that you stay dry and comfortable underneath. Synthetic insulation helps you stay warm and dry by trapping and holding body heat while allowing moisture to escape.

 

 

Built tough for the toughest jobs, the G-glove is cut-proof and with special padding that keeps your hands protected from calluses all day long. 

 

 

 

The perfect outdoor companion that protects your most important tools - your hands.

 

 

 

 

The G-Glove is made completely from fully-recycled eco-friendly materials. We have ensured zero waste and zero environmental damage during the production of the gloves. We have used artificial leather so that no animals are needlessly harmed, and made the internal synthetic insulation from recycled plastic. All in all, we’re pretty proud of what we’ve created here and hope you’ll use it with equal pride. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank You for Your Attention!
